title: DroidCam Webcam & OBS Camera
description: Use your phone as an advanced webcam for video calls, live streaming, and video production. - Chat using "DroidCam Webcam" on your computer, including Sound and Picture. - Direct OBS Studio integration via DroidCam OBS plugin (see below). - Free unlimited usage at standard definition (640x480). - Up to 1080p Full-HD as a PC Webcam, and up to 4K UHD as an OBS Camera (see below). - Both WiFi and USB connections supported*. - HW assisted coding (if possible) and multiple video format options. - DSLR -like features including exposure, white balance, and focus controls. - Works with the phone screen off and in the background for extra efficiency. PC WEBCAM ‚Äì droidcam.app Get the DroidCam PC Client to use your phone as a webcam. The client is available for Windows & Linux systems, and works with Zoom, Skype, Discord, and most other programs. üëâ Go to https://droidcam.app/ on your computer to download and install the DroidCam Client, and to learn more about usage. OBS CAMERA ‚Äì droidcam.app/obs Use DroidCam DIRECTLY in OBS Studio by getting the DroidCam OBS plugin, no need for a separate client. The DroidCam OBS plugin is available for Windows, Mac, and Linux (Flatpak) systems, and seamlessly integrates your phone to your setup. üëâ Go to droidcam.app/obs on your computer to download, install, and learn more about usage. Bonus: You can use the 'OBS Virtual Camera' for Zoom/Skype/Discord integration, still no need for extra client software! Simple & Efficient DroidCam is designed with simplicity and efficiency in mind. What you see is what you get. The app is free to use at standard definition with no time limits. You can try HD video, but will need to purchase the pro upgrade to remove watermarks. Pro Upgrade The pro upgrade includes more than just HD video. Unlock all options, manual camera controls and PC remote controls, remove advertising, and get the most from your phone camera. Check the in-app Upgrade and Settings pages for more. A Bargain! With optimized power usage and low-latency video transfer, DroidCam can replace webcams and capture cards saving you $100s. Use it for remote work, remote learning, teaching, and content creation. ‚ÑπÔ∏è Note: If you are having trouble with the pro license, make sure the app is installed with the correct Play Store profile and your device can access https://www.dev47apps.com. *USB connection may require additional setup. Consult droidcam.app/help for usb setup information.
descriptionHTML:
Use your phone as an advanced webcam for video calls, live streaming, and video production.

- Chat using "DroidCam Webcam" on your computer, including Sound and Picture.
- Direct OBS Studio integration via DroidCam OBS plugin (see below).
- Free unlimited usage at standard definition (640x480).
- Up to 1080p Full-HD as a PC Webcam, and up to 4K UHD as an OBS Camera (see below).
- Both WiFi and USB connections supported*.
- HW assisted coding (if possible) and multiple video format options.
- DSLR -like features including exposure, white balance, and focus controls.
- Works with the phone screen off and in the background for extra efficiency.

PC WEBCAM ‚Äì droidcam.app
Get the DroidCam PC Client to use your phone as a webcam. The client is available for Windows & Linux systems, and works with Zoom, Skype, Discord, and most other programs.

üëâ Go to https://droidcam.app/ on your computer to download and install the DroidCam Client, and to learn more about usage.


OBS CAMERA ‚Äì droidcam.app/obs
Use DroidCam DIRECTLY in OBS Studio by getting the DroidCam OBS plugin, no need for a separate client. The DroidCam OBS plugin is available for Windows, Mac, and Linux (Flatpak) systems, and seamlessly integrates your phone to your setup.

üëâ Go to droidcam.app/obs on your computer to download, install, and learn more about usage.

Bonus: You can use the 'OBS Virtual Camera' for Zoom/Skype/Discord integration, still no need for extra client software!


Simple & Efficient
DroidCam is designed with simplicity and efficiency in mind. What you see is what you get. The app is free to use at standard definition with no time limits. You can try HD video, but will need to purchase the pro upgrade to remove watermarks.

Pro Upgrade
The pro upgrade includes more than just HD video. Unlock all options, manual camera controls and PC remote controls, remove advertising, and get the most from your phone camera. Check the in-app Upgrade and Settings pages for more.

A Bargain!
With optimized power usage and low-latency video transfer, DroidCam can replace webcams and capture cards saving you $100s. Use it for remote work, remote learning, teaching, and content creation.


‚ÑπÔ∏è Note: If you are having trouble with the pro license, make sure the app is installed with the correct Play Store profile and your device can access https://www.dev47apps.com.


*USB connection may require additional setup. Consult droidcam.app/help for usb setup information.
summary: Use your phone as a webcam on your computer via WiFi or USB.

scraped_reviews.content: I didn't want to buy a Webcam, and have to constantly unplug and re-plug it in with my current setup. I knew my phone's camera was amazing, so I found this app! You can have the application running on your pc in the background, so that when you tap the app on your phone, it automatically connects. Super cool! The only thing I have found - which had me so confused - is the apps IP changes sometimes. Other than that, this is nice to have.

Works decently, but when I was just about to purchase pro for $14.99 (or however much it wasn't, can't 100% remember), the next day, it changed from a one-time payment to a yearly $5.99 subscription. It's incredibly dumb, and sure, while it might be cheap, I cannot stand subscription services and would've rather just paid $15 now. Now I won't be purchasing it at all.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. The one-time payment model has not worked well for long-term app maintenance and support. The new yearly pricing is very reasonable, and gets you access to updates and maintenance for as long as you wish to use the app - whether its for 1 year, or 5+ years.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app! I stream live concerts and while I use 4 cameras running through an ATEM, this app allows me to use cellphones and tablets as additional wireless cameras during shows. With some tweaking, the cellphone cameras look as good and match my other cameras and because they are wireless, I don't have to worry about cable reach. Would love to be able to set color temperature as a number instead of presets, but not a big issue. I contacted the developer with an issue and received a reply very quickly.

I use this app regularly and I have to say it is very easy to use and intuitive. There was a time lag and times where the picture was cut out when I used the WiFi connection, but when I use the direct USB connection, it is flawless. You will need to follow the instuctions on your mobile device to enable the USB mode, and the directions on the developer's site were easy to follow. Definitely would recommend over buying a separate camera!

REVIEW TIME As a small time streamer I started looking into options to improve my camera visuals, to move away from a webcam. This has been 100% worth it. I'm giving this a 4/5 for the upgrade to premium (paid version). The camera quality, and the ability to choose wifi or wired connections are beyond reproach for less than $20 investment. Aside from not being able to scroll on my phone while streaming, I haven't seen a negative yet. I would really like to see some more control via the PC

App is great and I really wanted to pay for the pro version but it is subscription based and I am very reluctant to do subscription options... Reason being is that I forget about them and all too often end up paying for each year for something I am no longer using... I would be totaly happy to pay for 12 months of use, and have the app stop after 12 months until I pay again - but not doing the subscription method.. Lost a star for the subscription option..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: One-time payment option is (once again) available in the app. The feedback is appreciated.

scraped_reviews.content: it's good enough I was willing to buy pro within the first 5 minutes however I would like to note that none of the tap focus functions seem to work, at least on my device. thankfully, with it being designed for OBS, you're likely stationary. in that case, the manual focus slider works fine. great little app if you have a phone on hand and can't pick between/afford the wide variety of higher end cameras. quick and easy fix for only $10.

Liked the free version and decided to pay for pro, that's where the issues started. When I would select 1080 resolution the image was blurry, I tried everything, even lowering the resolution wouldn't work because I guess my device or the app itself doesn't support the lower resolutions? Regardless, it also had connection issues. I was literally 5 foot from my router. No other device and even the device I was using ever had connection problems with other apps and services. Needs a lot of work.

Works great except I bought the pro version and can't seem to make the remote control work. Firefox tells me the web site is busy and it can't connect (it's running on the same computer). Tried connecting from another phone. Nope. Other than that this app works great. Better than any of my webcams and better than Irium webcam. It is easy to add into OBS. One glitch is that if you deselect Droidcam OBS then you must exit OBS to regain the video.

The fact it has USB and good Wifi and integrates directly with OBS makes this the best of the "use phone as webcam" tool out here. Some lag way too much. Some don't have great support. This one has been around. Version 7.1 is years old and well revised. I love it and use it daily. Plus - It's Canadian!

This camera always connects. with other free ones I have the problem that no matter what I do it wont connect or they want 80 a year. It always works, and the price for pro is super cheap comparably, and i love u can pay yearly or once, and although I only just bought pro, the features it comes with are really nice and convenient. Also so easy to use, and i tested (obs plugin through wifi), it automatically reconnects without reconnecting every time, and if I needed to it isn't even hard to.

the app works great. I love it. im only giving it a 3 star because I purchased its predecessor for no ads or water marks and then they released the new app and closed the old one so the money I spent on it just gets brushed under the rug. Id like the money I paid for the old app back or a code to redeem for the updated version of the app.

perfect for My needs. Also the price for full version is cheaper than a wired webcam, and this gives you the freedom to have your camera mobile. for setting up I would recommend having a wallet or flap phone case so you can have your phone on top of your monitor

It's a really good app and I've had no issues with it so far. It records in 4K with OBS, which is great! I just wish it had a background removal feature as well, and I hope the developers will add this in the future.
"Ad tier" is a scam. Tried it 10 times in a row, either the ad never ends or it's "camera fails to open", then you have to watch another ad to try again. Very clever, scammers.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, please contact support@dev47apps.com if you are having issues with the Ad Tier option inside the app.

scraped_reviews.content: Does what it needs to do, though options are somewhat limited. What I love though, is that it works on android 6 and up, which means old phones can be re-used as webcams through this app. Hopefully it will continue to work, as to not turn my older devices completely obsolete.

UPDATE : for a few weeks now, the app won't connect to OBS. whatever I do, nothing works. It's very annoying, even so that I paid for that app. I bought the pro version almost a year ago and it works very well. I'm using it while streaming on twitch from my portable setup!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please check your email support query for help with the connection issues.

scraped_reviews.content: I've purchased the Pro upgrade in 2023. Coming back in 2025, the purchase is gone. I had PURCHASED it. I'm neither talking about the subscription nor DroidCam X. I had purchased this very app to be able to use it until I die. I'm not dead yet, but I can't use it anymore.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, please contact support@dev47apps.com if you are having issues with your Pro upgrade.

scraped_reviews.content: Frills free way to get a working camera and mic to your computer. All you have to do is it install their client (which reminds me of OBS) and connect to it via wifi on the same network.

No more in OBS This has been a great help with everything involving a phone as camera for video conferencing but with the latest update on OBS the feature to add droidcam as a source has been removed. please find a way to fix this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, you can find the latest plugin download on the website. It includes support for latest OBS.

scraped_reviews.content: Great application which has great capabilities in its free variant itself. i take all my meetings with my phone camera using this connected to my PC over my wifi ( PC on ethernet, but works fine with laptops that have wifi only )
Good application! I use it during my painting workshops to project what I'm painting on the wall connected to my smartphone and a laptop.

It works, but where is a link to purchase it? Or this "pro" version that I keep seeing when I visit the webpage for my camera? At one point and time, there were 2 versions in the Play store, the normal with the watermark(or ads) and the paid version that did exactly what it was supposed to do. I used to use Camo, but I recently switched operating systems(Pop OS FTW!) and this is my best bet.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Please tap "Get Pro" inside the app (found in the Settings and the Info pages), where you'll have the option to upgrade via a one-time or annual payments. There is also an Ad Tier available to remove watermarks.

scraped_reviews.content: it doesn't connect like 95% of the time when I try to connnect with USB. there is no button to trigger connection, and when it fails, it doesn't show any error message or something like it and this makes me so angry. but when it connects, it performs well.

Phenomenal. Does what it says on the tin: stream the outputs of your phone cameras directly into OBS via USB. I use it with a phone bracket screwed to a mic stand every day for meetings and recording podcasts, and in the long run it saved me a lot of money because the phone I already have does a better job than the $1,000 camera I was going to buy.

I was considering purchasing but not with the subscription model. Yuck. I'd much rather pay for a webcam with a one-time fee even if it's more expensive. This subscription stuff needs to die down and if you want more money, INNOVATE.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, DroidCam does offer a one-time option, please check the Get Pro page.

scraped_reviews.content: Easy to use app, great for getting started with live streaming or content creation on a small budget or just for getting some extra functionality out of your phone for video chats with friends and family. Resolution is limited with free version but the paid app is a great value for your money.

I love it the interface is easy to explore u give us various customization options plus there isn't much lag thx lad you've done great how it even supports wireless is what. lows my mind mostly I am familiar with the usb ones you've really done well.üòÅüòÅüëçüëå
App is not working at all It cannot share screens. Both devices on same network. Misleading instructions.
The pro version is activated with a touch of restore purchase button. works cool. much appreciated developer and time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, this usually happens if you have multiple accounts on the device. Please consult the Help page at https://droidcam.app/help or contact support@dev47apps.com on how to resolve it.

scraped_reviews.content: don't work even after connecting to the same wifi, connecting to the hotspot and doing all possible tweaks, just a waste of time, the device does not show up and even if show you. have to manually input ip. address then what is freaking use of connecting to same wifi if need to input things manually . use iruin webcam best
I don't usually review, but this app works excellently, and it was one of the few apps I was willing to pay for.
Use it for an OBS input every week, works great even providing the ability to zoom remotely
Still on free app, but must note it handles low light better than others i have tried.
I love this app. I saved to buy an expensive webcam. my phone has great cams, I'm glad I can use them as webcams
Requires some basic technical knowledge to use, but amazing to have a low-lag way to use my phone's already good cameras as my webcam...
Totally recommended. Almost refunded my pro payment until I figured out it was my firewalls blocking the checker site for this app.

My experience with the Galaxy S23+ and laptop has been positive. If I were to upgrade, would adding a second phone, such as the Galaxy S25, incur an additional cost? Furthermore, how would this impact the synchronization of settings and overall quality, and would simultaneous streaming be supported?

While the web server in the app is somewhat useful to control the settings, the control app itself is pretty bad. Not only does it constantly drop the connection, it doesn't retain the white balance setting (the most inconvenient one to set), and no API is offered, so the website on the device is the only way to control the settings. The battery is drained in no time, too, even when actively charging the device. Painful experience.

app is fantastic when you paid for it there no monthly payments one time payment and that's it very easy to set up no adds it asked me to rate the adverts I gave it 5 star as there no add so I can't rate it love the app

This used to be great. Now, however, across months and different versions, it just stops working on the phone. It has become totally unreliable. I switched to another app like this, and it actually works.

I use this to remotely monitor and record activity at a group of bird feeders. It works "right out of the box" and is simple to use. Some hints for best performance: 1. Use the highest bandwidth wi-fi you have available. We added a 5GHz extender and dropped connections are no longer a problem. 2. If the phone is at a distance, then software to remote control the phone will save a lot of steps, however if the connection drops, then the remote control is useless too.

Exactly does what is says, works fine over wifi, and compatible with OBS or it's own software. The free version is fine as well, only a small watermark is visible, but the pro version is cheaper than a half decent webcam.

Somewhat pricy for what it offers. I paid around $5 for a yearly subscription, only to find out that the 'remote control' function requires internet connection (USB won't cut it), and that I still cannot control the shutter speed. If these two get fixed, I will turn my rating into a fove star one and pay for the lifetime licence immediately. Until then, while I do like the app, I feel like Iriun Pro is a cheaper and better alternative
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, and thanks for the feedback. The remote control feature will prefer WiFi if available, but USB is also supported. Manual shutter/ISO is on the potential feature list. Feel free to use the developer contact area to get more info.

scraped_reviews.content: This is the best webcam app out there. However the remote control panel in the client is sometimes buggy but nothing major.
Proper app, great job. Could we get a manual shutter speed + manual / auto ISO ? This would make life easier for content creators.

For as far as I used the free version it's a great app. Sometimes when I may need some extra features the temporary Pro version access from watching an ad does the job. Although I've considered getting the all time or monthly paid versions the app is a bit buggy and I end up not buying. Those bugs don't ruin the experience neither they bother me as a free user but the chance that they might still be present if I choose to pay is just enough for second thoughts.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for the feedback. Bugs and crash reports are continuously monitored, and you are welcome to email support@dev47apps.com to report whatever issues you encounter.

scraped_reviews.content: Love the app and worth it's price. If your cam is turning off after some time, you need to lock droidcam in your settings to avoid it to be closed by the system.
Game Changer, honestly one of the best things to buy if you need to upgrade your camera for work or for content creation.
sometimes its easy to connect to OBS sometimes it aint hit still good

title: Suno - AI Music & Songs
description:
Amplify your imagination. Powered by the world‚Äôs most advanced AI music model, Suno transforms your ideas into songs‚Äîno instruments needed, just your creative vision. Whether you‚Äôre a shower-singer, aspiring songwriter, or charting artist, Suno empowers you to create and discover music like never before.

Generate music from prompts, images, or videos with the world‚Äôs best AI music model:
‚Ä¢ Transform your ideas into fully-produced songs and beats with a single prompt. Create 10 songs or beats per day at no cost.
‚Ä¢ Inspiration begins with you. Write a text prompt like "Create a rap song about walking my dog," sing a melody, hum a tune, or tap out a beat.
‚Ä¢ Record or upload audio to personalize your music, or generate songs from images and videos.

Write original lyrics with effortlessly:
‚Ä¢ Whether you're in your feels with emotional ballads, hyped on energetic rap verses, or hooked on catchy pop, our lyrics generator and AI songwriter helps you craft custom lyrics that match your style and creative vision.


Create playlists for every mood and moment:
‚Ä¢ Curate your personal AI music library and organize your favorite tracks, beats, and instrumentals into playlists you can revisit anytime.
‚Ä¢ Manage your AI songs, view track details, and fine-tune your playlists‚Äîyour music making journey is uniquely yours with Suno.


Discover new music and connect with artists:
‚Ä¢ Stay inspired by listening to tracks created by other users and explore the best AI music across genres like rock, rap, hip hop, pop, and more.
‚Ä¢ Find fresh favorites by browsing trending music and follow artists to stay connected.
‚Ä¢ Discover new voice styles, AI covers, rising talent, and beat makers from around the world.

Music has no boundaries at Suno. Anything you imagine can take shape as a song to share. Whether you're taking your first steps in music making or chasing your next hit, infinite possibilities begin with a simple prompt in our AI song generator. Feeling pro? Take full creative control: adjust vocals, tweak structure, fine-tune melodies, and edit every detail to your vision.

Suno is how imagination becomes music, and music becomes yours.

‚Äî

‚Ä¢ Your subscription will be charged to your Apple Account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

‚Ä¢ Your current subscription may not be canceled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your Apple Account Settings after purchase.

‚Ä¢ Our Terms of Service: https://suno.com/terms

scraped_reviews.content: Just started playing with it but so far I prefer it to any other option I've come across. Pricing is reasonable and quality of sound, and even lyric generation, is phenomenal. just an update, still love Suno, but don't put in your ads that you can turn the Raven into a song, one of the first things I tried and it exceeds your character limit. Increase it and we'll be back up to 5 stars.

For someone like me who has written a ton of songs but had no way to get that music out of my head and into the real world, Suno is a blessing. There are a few tweaks I would like; for example, an easier way to change lyrics over a track you like but were misspelt or that got mispronounced, and also I'd like the ability to give more musical direction such as key changes, or "musical swell here" etc. But other than that I am getting a lot of fulfillment with it. Be warned: it's addictive!

Good for what it is. Some songs go missing and won't show up in your library. So make sure you write the lyrics on another app such as Word, Google docs, notepad, etc, and then copy and paste them into the generator. Otherwise, you might lose your only record of any lyrics you write if it disappears from your library. This used to be a much bigger problem, but, even though it happens less often now, it does still happen. So protect your lyrics by creating a backup first.

The world is changing right before our eyes, or in this case, ears. Science Fiction transmuted into science fact, first in decades, then years, and now, a few short months can see revolutions sweep through and swirl around the planet faster than we could have ever thought possible. For good or ill, "artificial intelligence" is quantifying everything about us and what it can do with those numbers... oh man! This app can create endless numbers of songs filled with what I like most in music. Wow.

App struggles to load and won't let me log in with my phone. Gives a login error message. After logging in with my tablet (which does load properly, PC too) I paid for the pro plan but the app doesn't recognize the plan. I've contacted support so 10.70 down (i have a receipt) and no access. Guess I'll keep waiting for a response. Maybe I'll get access before my next day off. Will update my review if needed after a response.

Don't get me wrong, Suno sounds great, but the app is ridiculously buggy. I changed the image on two of my songs with no problem, but suddenly I can't change the image on one song in particular, and I've tried to change it multiple times over multiple days. It's a small jpg image, well under 1MB, so it shouldn't be a problem, but it is. Second, for all things good and Holy, allow us to edit the description of our songs! I have a great song, but the description is wrong and I can't correct it!

The software isn‚Äôt allowing me to use my voice to create music, which caused me to use up all of my credits. I followed YouTube tutorials and all the steps correctly, but it still doesn‚Äôt work. Every time I record my voice and give it instructions, the result sounds completely different ‚Äî it even gives me a male voice instead of mine. If someone from the team can help me figure out and fix this issue, I‚Äôll be happy to change my review.

This is an amazing app for ai music and beginner song artists looking for some inspiration. the only thing I noticed though, it says you can get 250 credits for inviting people, but when inviting people, and they join the app, I didn't get a single credit for it. I would recommend fixing this please. other than that, everything else is perfectly fine.

WOW. I've written so many poems that it's nice that I can listen to them in song form. I like mostly everything about the app! I did only give it 4 stars because I've had issues where the app wont load, or it wont play, or it wont pause. There are several little "annoyances" but not enough to take me from the app. Its really pretty cool what it can do!

It's a great idea and was working great. Now, not so much. Acts like it's going to, then the song it's "working on" dissappears. Might end up canceling my subscription. There's a free version and that version was doing the same thing. I've created about 12 songs already so it WAS working, just not anymore. I'm thinking they're struggling with the app because it was even struggling to play one that I had just created. I've gone into settings and cleared cache thinking it was just stuck. Nothing.

It's fun, but lately, my edits and songs aren't being completed. They get cut off halfway, or it changes everything I wanted to be. Male voices are now female and viceversa. I keep reporting them, but there's no option to be more specific with the issues. Also, extending a song makes a separate copy. It no longer adds it to the previous sets. I'm wasting credits and contemplating holding out on further payments until these issues are addressed. I'm not sure if it's just me, but it's frustrating

Greatest. Music. App. Ever. Seriously, I saw a YouTuber use this app for their content in a few videos, and I was inspired to make some music myself. I tried it, and I was in awe. Literally makes bangers that I never expected from an AI. Only complaint is the free credit use. If you don't have a subscription (or premium) then you get free credits, no problem. Yes problem. I only will generate one song a day, and you get 10 credits every day. So not being able to make a song for no reason is a no

This AI app is pretty awesome! Me and my husband really love being able to make music! It's a great creative space! We have not gotten bass voices, or lower music yet. But that's only one of the potential negative things we have found so far. He has the pro, I have the regular, both of us love all the songs we have made!

It was able to generate some pretty badass music for my drone videos. The newer 4.5 model definitely makes better music than the older free ones, it has a fairly real sound when it comes to metal and guitar riffs. Whether that's worth the money to you I can't really say. For me I think it was worth it to make some pretty awesome instrumental music for my videos.

okay, so far it's been an incredible ride, filled with lots of amazing things. The bad will never outweigh the good so rest assured you'll love it! The sounds and voices are absolutely next to authentic and more than good enough to distribute, if one so chooses to do so. Be aware: The phone app has its share of issues from not having the ability to edit songs to the song dropping and being lost forever, unless you remember to always copy and paste your lyrics. Laptop is where it's at!

The results are incredible. Especially if you are interested in writing your own lyrics (my reason for getting the app) but have no idea how to pair them with musical instruments and vocals. The app turns you into a one person band and experimenting with the words and prompts you give to the AI can shape it into whatever you hear in your head, with a little effort and some trial and error. The free plan let's you generate 5 batches of songs per day, which is pretty fair. It's quite cathartic.

I would give this a 6/5 Star rating if you could clone your voice, and replace the song's voice with our own. I have Covers of songs that I made, that would sound a lot better if I could do this. Other than that, the paid version of this App is amazing, with the only problem I've had is some songs cut off before they are finished. which is not too bad. I've had a wonderful time with this, so thank you for making this software!! Peace and light!!

This app is a fun way to transform ur thoughts into music. or to hear ur own lyrics in an originql song! I've been creating some pretty decent music! I'm impressed! and I just have the free mode! But if I was financially secure, I would definitely pay to use the upgraded features! lol there's plenty of room for improvement, but again, with only the free version, I cant really say what all it is able to do!

As a musician, I managed to make some good content on it, but then it started getting glitchy and wouldn't create the songs. Then it went through the motions of making the "New groove", but would spit out old songs that I had deleted! I've been trying to get ahold of anyone who can help, but there is no phone line or text support despite my Pro paid subscription. I had wanted a premier subscription, too! Suno, please reach out, as I would like to upgrade this to a five!

I'm giving it a 1 (for now) until someone can figure out why it's not creating additional songs I am requesting since I paid to upgrade the subscription. it just keeps reposting songs it's already created. I'm about to ask for my money back. UI also keep changing languages on its own. First couple of free songs were awesome and fun, not worth the paid subscription, app is very buggy. Asking for a refund.

Great app. I try it out and it works fine. I would recommend adding more genre options, like hymns and gospel. Additionally, only one flaw was found, which was related to uploading audio. I tried it many times with different songs, and it failed. I hope this gets fixed. I want to try this option, but it has been impossible for me to do so. 5 stars if that gets fixed.

Absolutely love this app. I've tried a few different apps to make songs and this one gets you the closest to the sound you're looking for, unless there's others i haven't tried. I'm giving this 3 stars because I still can't use it on my laptop, where I can actually use the features I'm paying for. a notification screen just stays locked on the screen once you log in, stopping you from doing anything. Will switch back to 5* when that's fixed.

I absolutely LOVE this app! It helps me to express myself in ways that I would not be able to by speaking. I love music, it's healing. I just have one suggestion (when the free version was 3.5, I used to be able to listen to and rate short clips for free credits) since the free version has been updated, I cannot do so. I was just wondering if we can't listen to and rate clips anymore, would it be possible for the daily credits that were not used that day to roll over to the next days credits?

Good: Chrome version is more versatile with more features. You can edit the songs, the lyrics, and extract the layers. Bad: The edit features are very sloppily built that make it hard to use. When editing lyrics, trying to do multiple sections is basically impossible. so its best to do the whole song. All edits are locked behind a credit system and sometimes fail to render but will still charge the credits. You cant use pieces of other version to improve songs. There's more but I'm limited.

It‚Äôs a really good app. The only thing I dislike is that when your subscription ends, any remaining credits ‚Äî even if you have like 400 left ‚Äî get reset, and they only start giving you 50 a day again. In my opinion, they should let you use all your leftover credits before switching to the 50-a-day limit. To me, it feels kind of like a rip-off, because you could have over 500 credits, and once your time‚Äôs up, they just reduce it back to 50.

There needs to be an option on the app to edit the audio on a completed song. Sometimes, the AI mispronounces words. I have to spell a word phonetically sometimes, for it to more accurately pronounce it. (or if it's a slanted rhyme). Without a way to edit the song itself, you're making the corrections for an entirely new song with the same lyrics. Also bring back the character counter for the lyrics box when creating a song.

Great Job Guysüëçüëç, It is an Amazing platform I gave it 4 stars so you can work on the editing platform. 1) I wish the Ai can chat and confirm my commands so it doesn't redo the whole song, just fix the music in the one piece i need, I had to remake the song 10 times, while losing pieces I liked in other version and settle for the closest. 2) if the song is 3:39seconds and it remakes it, it might add intro music which I like, but it cuts off the verse at the end to keep the time the same??

Probably the best out there. There are others that are good too (Actually, waaay too many of them now), but Suno is probably the most consistently outputting great quality music with very little errors. Aditionally, they are the fastest. 2 songs in seconds where others can take 5-7 minutes for just 1 song. They are also affordable. I hate that so many others make you purchase tokens to spend per song. That's a lame way to do it. Probably a great $$ stream for the creators of those apps!

works for about 5 mins. made 1 song, kept saying it wasnt created. finally I saw they were all created. tried to make a completely different song and boom, nothing. ive tried several times and absolutely nothing. between the app crashing, and completely generated songs that never even show up. dang. what a shame. heard good stuff about the app but its been terrible from start to finish. moving on

I absolutely love this app, and I originally gave it 5 stars, but as of now,a few months in,not having the ability to edit lyrics without changing the melody is REALLY affecting how the music sound. Being able to change a word or two without changing the original melody and vocals is a big deal. I'm not the only one who has a problem with this. It would be extremely helpful and be a major improvement for the site and app if they would please consider it. Other than that I enjoy the app.

A lot of delightful stuff has been added over the years. The beloved Cover feature has finally spawned on the app. Of course, it has to be your own audio and you have to upload it, but thankfully you can download songs and remake them here! wharharhar A suggestion is making it so a full Playlist can be seen. It only shows 50 songs. I made the Playlist so I can listen to all of them, not just 50!1!!1!!1

This app makes me annoyed. I purchased the basic subscription. It made one really good song for me from the custom song/lyrics option, then wouldn't let me make any more songs unless I did the random option. I dont see anything on the app that restricts me from being able to make as many custom songs as I want. Its a a shame the custom song it made for me was great. Otherwise its a good app.

I used to like this app. Whatever you typed into it was what you got. Even if you wanted a didgeridoo, you can have one included. Now I hardly get the quality I used to get when it was version 3, and almost every song sounds the same. Something I don't like. and of course they lock the better features behind version 5. The superior version to version 4, which feels so dull to version 3. Please bring back version 3. version 4 doesn't work for me.

The Android app does not have the same features and usability as the regular web app. Cannot recommend it until this is fixed. No access to Persona, editing, Studio, etc. It is extremely limited. Good luck keeping your lyrics, prompts, etc in the clipboard trying to produce anything because they constantly get cleared.

Creates amazing music when it works. Have had for 3 days now and on the 2nd day it wouldn't create a song for hours. No error it anything, it would just stop creating. And now on the third day an "internal error" is preventing creation again, even after deleting cache and reinstalling. Paid $30 for the month and so far 2 out of the 3 days have been a bust...

Was cool for a couple songs but I had a significantly hard time getting it to play what I wanted. I would specifically emphasize "NO GUITARS" in one of the songs I was trying to make, and for some reason it insisted on turning it into some heavy metal lead guitarist shredding type song. Also, could not get the voices to pitch up or down more, so every song was basically the same 3 or 4 voices over and over.

I was giving it a five because it was awesome. it was the best AI music generator app I had found. keyword: WAS. but now there is a "glitch" that won't let me generate anything. it'll SAY my song is on the way and then... NOTHING. please fix ASAP. I love this app but I'm telling you if you don't fix the glitch soon I and a whole bunch of your other customers will jump ship and that's on you not us

I'm struggling with the app. I cannot upgrade. The button does nothing. I emailed support a few days ago. No response. Says I have 40 credits but when I try to create, the song just disappears like I did nothing. I deleted the app and reinstalled it. Wonderful concept if there were an app that could bring it to life.

worked once and hasn't since, paid for a monthly subscription but only the first prompt I ever put in has actually made a song which was great. however I tried three different prompts and it will start but then just goes to my library with 0 of the songs I made but the first one. doesn't even give an error code, waste of time and money

Suno AI is awesome, on a PC web browser. I only use the app to listen to my stuff on the go. As a music player, it's lacking even the most basic functionality, and lately barely even plays the music. Song just stop mid play and won't resume. You have to change tracks and try repeatedly to play another track before it eventually will, then you can finally go back to the one you were trying to listen to. No shuffle function STILL??? Playlist browsing is awful, STILL can't view other user playlists

I use suno to redo my own original songs and it does a incredible job if you know what you're doing with the prompts. a lot of times it plays things that I'm hearing in my head and plays parts like I would want them played. The final product is polished, mixed and mastered. Definitely radio ready as far as sounds quality. With that said, the app is very buggy. Randomly shutting down or freezing. On Apple it's more stable, but on Android it happens a lot and it's frustrating!

this app was great until I started getting an internal error message and can no longer create songs. my advice, I'm not the first one that this has happened to, I would recommend a different app especially if you just want a free version. I honestly think I'm getting the error message because I haven't paid for the app, there was supposed to be a certain amount of songs that you get per month for free, they let you enjoy it for a little while then rip it away like some parents in a candy store.

Update: Stats Reduced due to the fact that before version 4.0 was free, then it became paid but for a few days I remained version 4 and then I was reduced to 3.5 and I feel that I shouldn't have been downgraded being that I was already at that version. Otherwise, it's overall just a great time making music and I sure would like to try the newest version out, seems amazing

This app is the best of it's kind, definitely better than every other one. You can generate music five times every day, and you can actually put your own lyrics, title, and style you want your song in without having to pay money. Most of these apps won't even let you do more than three before you have to pay money. Definitely reccomend this app over every other one.

Awesome app love the AI and all the different songs you can make. One big difference between this and the website though is that the app won't tell you why it won't create a song. So if you try to make one and never see it you can guess that due to copyright it won't accept certain things in the style portion. Which is totally fair, but at least have it give a pop-up like on the website version.

you can give very specific requests, example:Male vocals, electric guitar, piano... and it will give you... female vocals, synth, and drums. You can give it very specific lyrics... and it will just sing entirely made up lyrics or repeat one line over and over. you can spend two days in a row trying to get a song to work, but it will just not follow your instructions at all. gets three stars though cause its free, and is still better than me, and on occasion, gives you an absolute banger.

I was really enjoying this app until a couple days ago, I just paid my subscription and like two days later I go to sign in, it glitched out sent me an error code and deleted my account, I lost everything, all the time and money wasted, plus some of those songs were very good, I wrote myself and I'll never be able to recreate those, just an FYI if you paying for this back it up or download all your songs, their support email hasn't messaged me back, it's been 2 days, I can't believe it's gone

Wow. I'm just blown away. I've always had random lyrics, melody ideas, and weird concepts for songs floating around in my head, but I have zero musical talent. Suno took my jumbled ideas and turned them into fully produced, incredible-sounding tracks in minutes. Hearing a silly thought from my brain become a professional-sounding song with vocals and instruments is pure magic. It's the most empowering creative tool I've ever used. 10/10!

Great music fun to interact with lots of things to do. One thing that needs to be clarified on the app entirely is the fact that you cannot get premium previews downloaded unless you literally try almost every type of subscription. mix trying to create things difficult when you are on subscriptions. i would add descriptions for each subscription. wasted money on this.

If I had rated this app when I first downloaded it, I would've given it 5 stars. But, now I can only give 3 at the most because I feel like the voice quality of the ai has decreased. When I first started using this app, I would generate songs with the free v4 generation quality, and it was really good. Now, when I generate a song, it sounds a little more garbled and robotic. I hope this wasn't done on purpose to make people pay for the subscription to get higer quality generations...

title: CNBC: Business & Stock News
description:
When global news breaks, it sends ripples in markets all around the world. Get real-time coverage on the CNBC mobile app to stay in the know on the latest current events affecting the market. Around-the-clock market coverage ensures you are always informed ‚Äì whenever and wherever the news breaks. The CNBC mobile app lets you access accurate and actionable business news, financial information, market data and primetime programming faster than ever. Breaking news alerts are delivered instantly to your phone, enabling you to stay on top of the market. Watch the live stream, video clips and episodes directly on your mobile phone or Android TV device so you can keep up with your favorite CNBC primetime television anytime, anywhere!
 
Following stocks and keeping up with the market is easier than ever with our mobile app. Stocks are easily tracked in customizable watchlists so you can get real-time stock market quotes and global market data on your phone throughout the day. View trading data pre-market and after-hours, with charts with customizable time frames, all from your mobile device.
 
CNBC Mobile App Features:
Breaking News & Stock Alerts
- Global stock market coverage around the clock - create and track your favorite company stocks from your mobile device in real-time.
- Investments made easy with stock quotes, interactive charts and customizable time frames.
- View trading data - pre-market and after-hours.
- Cryptocurrencies now available.
 
Business News
- Live stream news while you‚Äôre on the go so you never miss an update.
- Finance News updates can be sent directly to your phone, so you know all the latest in stocks, investing and economics.
- 24-hour coverage of top business news, economic analysis and expert opinions, personal finance, investment, technology, politics, energy, health care and more.
 
Stream TV Shows on your mobile device and Android TV:
- Watch news clips for free, or log in with your cable or satellite subscription to live stream full episodes.
- Search for topics and shows on Android TV with your voice or remote.
- Live stream your favorite CNBC TV business day and primetime shows.
 
CNBC PRO - Start your 7-day free trial today!
Subscribe to CNBC PRO for exclusive Information, Insights and Access!
- Early Access ‚Äì Sell-side analyst calls and the Pro Playbook before the market opens
- Real Time Updates ‚Äì Alerts and analysis on global investing news
- Exclusive Stories ‚Äì Investor, Analyst & Industry experts on what‚Äôs moving the market, stock picks, and investing trends
- Pro Talks - live discussions and Q&A with big names in investing
- Special Reports - access to numerous special reports including earnings playbooks, quarterly guides, and so much more
- Watch by streaming live TV or full show episodes on demand (U.S. only)
- Watch our daytime shows including: ‚ÄúSquawk Box,‚Äù ‚ÄúMad Money,‚Äù ‚ÄúClosing Bell,‚Äù ‚ÄúHalftime Report,‚Äù ‚ÄúPower Lunch,‚Äù
  ‚ÄúFast Money‚Äù
 
The Investing Club gives users inside access to Jim Cramer‚Äôs thoughts, behind-the-scenes analysis and real-time happenings of his Charitable Trust Portfolio - trade alerts, stock ratings and recommendations, price targets and more.
Daily live meetings with Jim and his team as they discuss the current market and provide insight for trading opportunities.
Monthly live, hour-long meetings with Q&A and guest appearances from industry experts to help you invest smarter.
Investing playbooks for expanding your investing toolkit and knowledge.
 

Your Privacy Choices, please go to https://www.versantprivacy.com/privacy/notrtoo?intake=CNBC
Notice link: https://www.versantprivacy.com/privacy/california-consumer-privacy-act?intake=CNBC

Please note: This app features Nielsen‚Äôs proprietary measurement software which contributes to market research, like Nielsen‚Äôs TV Ratings. Please see https://nielsen.com/digitalprivacy/ for more information.

summary: The world leader in breaking business news & real-time financial market coverage

scraped_reviews.content: I don't review many apps, but felt I had to try and protect others. The CNBC+ subscription service is woefully inadequate. It promotes access to current live streams of shows (which it does) and past video and audio show content... which is my issue: the videos (and audio) on demand content is so far behind the air times that it is no longer relevant.

The app just makes everything worse on Android devices. The livestream is stuck in a tiny window on Pixel Tablet with no way to go full screen. Using the website it does, but the app has to be uninstalled first or it will launch the app. On Google TV it doesn't even work beyond a few minutes "trial" which is worthless, unless you are paying for cable channels that includes it. Paying for CNBC Pro is not good enough. And there is no Chromecast support.

Still having ads talk over the top of the TV shows. It seems like something called "REAL TIME INSIGHTS " is more important to here than your actual TV program. What changed. I never used to have this issue. Now it is happening all of the time. I have un-installed and re-installed the app. Shut my phone down and re-started. Nothing I do on my end seems to help. Impossible to listen to with both sources talking at the same time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Our Customer Care team is happy to assist you with this issue. Please contact us by going to Settings ‚ñ∫ Contact Us in your app.

scraped_reviews.content: Think it is good if it is reliable. In the past versions, it lost my watchlists more than once. The news on watchlists for individual stocks is of little use. If those 2 issues were fixed, it would be killer. It seems to be stable now. no issues with lists disappearing. If the news feature on individual stocks in watchlists were better, it would be truly complete. That is the key, real time company specific news. Waiting for that. Still enjoying , but still waiting.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your thoughtful suggestions. Our app team will be sure to consider these ideas for future features and improvements. To avoid loosing your watchlist, you can sync your watchlist across devices with your Android by going to Settings -- Sync watchlists across devices. You can contact us by going to Settings -- Contact Us in your app.

scraped_reviews.content: Great source for news and quotes! My only suggestion for improvement is to have the stock watchlist on the home page or with a prominent link up front (you have to click twice, first menu then watchlist now). I don't like having to open up my brokerage account just to see what my stocks are doing... Other than that, it's great, and the best source of reliable news!

CNBC app is great for what it is, providing all the contents you need. what I have an issue with is it can not enlarge or shrink the text with the fingers. I am getting older and need the text to be a bit larger to read at times. but I still like to enlarge and shrink the charts for reading as well.

Fixed!! Thanks!! Articles no longer load with latest app update. Please fix!! UPDATE: Thanks for fixing Android App market index & watchlist data displays with current app update! 5 Stars! This is my favorite financial app by far, but the Android version is currently broken. The market indexes & some of my watchlists have failed to load for over a week now. I've uninstalled & reinstalled the app repeatedly without resolution. Please, please fix the app already!!

Outdated App. Does not work with the new CNBC+ subscription that is now being advertised all over. They updated their Roku App, but have completely abandoned Google TV's App. Sad that they are not too concerned with Google TV customers subscribing to CNBC+ and then canceling due to lack of functionality.

Most days I cannot open this app, and I have a 3 weeks new phone. I have uninstalled, reinstalled, powered the phone off and on, and nothing. What a disappointment, especially as an investment club member.

The app just launches my browser. It's like they're handing you a shiny wrapper for the exact same candy you already have‚Äîexcept now it tracks your every swipe and demands battery life as tribute. The "app" is basically a glorified bookmark with push notifications to guilt-trip you back in. Once in the app nothing I bought Pro for is available without extensive hunting through a fog. Where is my full portfolio? Where is the stock screen. Where is Best Stocks in the Market. Very very frustrating.

The hosts and guests REALLY need to stop saying that stock prices that seem to be increasing exponentially are going "parabolic". A parabola is U-shaped and can point in any direction. It really makes them seem like they haven't taken basic math classes in college. They are all VERY brilliant people, but this term is used often and detracts from that image.

I'm so over this app. Its constantly signing me out, then giving me an error message when I try to sign back in. The only reason I keep it is my subscription to the Investing Club. If not for that, I'd be done with it.
constantly getting this message "something went wrong and we can't process your watch list request.........." over and over for weeks now. have deleted and reinstalled multiple times to no avail.

1. the watchlist section has bugs 2. the sign in button isnt functioning 3. most news articles & push notifications arent opening. if you tap it just says "r Hold tight, we're working on getting that story for you" on a white background

when the ad banner in the middle of the page changes, the ad area collapses and the text shifts. This is a recent change. The sudden movement shifts the reading area and as soon as your eyes track to the text, the new ad appears shifting the text again. I close the app and read news elsewhere when this happens
Their app is great. I use it daily for quick updates on anything effecting the market and searching stock or ETF information. The only problem I have is that a maxed out on my Watchlists.

The latest update seems to have broken the app for me. I'm running it on a Kindle Fire 8 HD, with the Google Play Store sideloaded. It doesn't even start up, just immediately kicks me back to the homescreen.

News isn't loading, only started screwing up in the last couple of hours. Also when I start the app it takes forever ...I'm sick of looking at the peacock logo üò¢üò¢üò¢üò¢ Hold tight, we're working on getting that story for you... waiting forever for a story that never appears üò¢
while the app is open on the main screen, articles seem to load & unload, or maybe it's advertisements, but either way things keep jumping up and down making it difficult to scroll the headlines.

A Powerhouse for Professionals, But a Hassle for Casual Users The CNBC mobile app is a quintessential "power tool" in the world of financial news. Its ultimate value depends entirely on the user's needs and tolerance for a commercialized experience. CNBC app is the best at what it does for a specific, demanding audience. It delivers immense power, but you have to be willing to handle the noise that comes with it.
cache too much user viewing history, makes it very slow to start. many times user needs to go to app manager, to delete cache. There is really nothing valuable for the app to store, wasting storage.
Like many other comments, the login of this app SUCKS! It always says there is an error and to come back later. I can log in on a desktop no problem!
Even 1 star is much for this app. This app was so good but from almost a month its not working properly. There are login issues, issue in editing watchlist, issue in sync etc. Very disappointing.

update: removing 1 star as the wishlist no longer updates, you have to either restart the app or switch to news and then back to watchlist. utter trash of an app. Slow, clunky, unpolished and finally ugly. Much, much worse than their iOS version. The only reason I gave 2 starrs is real time quotes or at least mostly minimal lag.
I like their content, but it's very frustrating and annoying that you need to have a premium membership to be able to see certain content and you don't find out until you click on it.

Meh. Trying to get any REALLY USABLE info is mediocre at best. most good data is based around trying to get you to buy a subscription to one or all of their data services. I get much more information FREE on yahoo finance.
It keeps having issues. last year it wasn't playing videos in app. recently it has stopped opening stories front the main page. They open on the phone browser but not the app.
I can't read my news. it freezes and keeps saying "Hang tight we'll get that for you" Fix it!!! All your updates messed up my app!!!
Thanks for finally fixing video playback; first time it's worked in over a year! -2 for STILL lacking a dark mode. -1 for upsell/ad bombardment.
I hate this app. The news feed constantly refreshes and forces you to scroll back down through the list of stories to get back where you left off. Miserable experience.
Due to adverts, the entire layout keeps moving, making it difficult to scroll/look at the screen and to click on the article you want to read.
I like it. it's great but sometimes the watchlist is clunky, slow, freezes, kicks you out. not always but happens.
Doesn't update videos for Android so I have to remove and reinstall the app every time I want to watch an updated video. The app sucks!!
this app used to be good. now it jumps around up and down so much I can't read it. I uninstalled it and reinstalled and same problem.

Used to be a good app. Too bad they can't make enough money with the Ads and their TV channel and only let you see articles if you pay for membership even though you can find the articles elsewhere on the internet. Just makes it a hassle. Also often stick prices don't update sometimes. Yahoo finance is much better without the bs...

DON'T UPDATE:. now it just crashes whenever I get quotes (SMH, USBonds crash app now). Did no one test the app before publishing?!?! also has new annoying issue where headlines constantly jerk up and down - looks like they keep refreshing more and different size ads making navigation impossible.
this last update is horrible. please fix it, everything I go to my watch list I get an error message that something went wrong.
Worst app I've ever seen. it jumps all over the place. The headlines for stocks and what's happening don't match up. Ridiculous.

This was a really great app for tracking all my brokerage accounts, etc. Now nothing opens. Reading other similar complains, CNBC is aware of non-functioning app, but so far almot 2 weeks of nothing. Glad I did not pay for the upgraded version.

I had to update the app to continue to use it. Now it won't show me any stories, and when I look at an individual stock on my watch list, then go back to the watch list, it tells me "something went wrong". I turned my phone off and back on, nothing changed.

European version: you try to read the headlines to decide which article to read... and the app moves constantly up and down as new ads pop in and their size is also not fixed, so your screen moves up and down and you lose track where you were. sorry, did you let an intern develop that now? omg. amateurs

after looking up stock symbols you have to push back like 20 times to get back to the home page or the menu. quicker to delete the app and reinstall it than do that. who designed this, have they ever used it before? definitely not ai. or it would probably work.
Fantastic app. Vastly more economic & business information than Fox Business. Great military annual subscription deal on CNBC Pro.
apps seems to be moving slower than it used to since the update and I do not like the charts as much as I used to
Jittery. You can't just look at headlines without it reloading and losing your spot.
Best general source for stock market and finance info. Not as educational or as informative as the Wall Street Journal, but more accessible to the general public

update: they fixed it a week or so later. I I liked this app. last couple of weeks, the indexes aren't updating. it looks like I'm not the only one with this issue. force closing the app each time I need to view the indexes has worked, but this needs to get fixed, or people are going to delete this app.

This app use to work fine now almost every time I open it the stock averages are grayed out. if I go to the search function and check a stock's price then return to the home screen the averages are then displayed.
Great notifications and the site is easy to navigate and comprehensive for financial news.
this last update something is causing a glitch everytime I check my stocks. please fix. I keep on getting message that oops something went wrong.

title: Crunchyroll
description:
WATCH THE MOST POPULAR AND TOP-RATED ANIME ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
Stream new episodes, classic favorites, and anime movies with the Crunchyroll app‚Äîwatch for free or upgrade for an ad-free experience. Whether you love action-packed anime, heartwarming slice-of-life stories, or fantasy adventures, Crunchyroll offers the largest anime collection online, featuring a massive library of anime shows and movies available on your favorite device. Watch anime legally, free, and in high quality‚Äîall in one place.

EXCLUSIVE MUSIC VIDEOS AND CONCERTS
Get access to thousands of music videos, concert exclusives, and special performances from top artists worldwide. Watch unique behind-the-scenes footage, live performances, and carefully curated playlists that bring anime soundtracks and J-pop sensations to your screen.

APP FEATURES  
‚ñ† Watch anime subbed and dubbed‚Äîchoose from multiple languages (dub availability varies). 
‚ñ† Create Crunchylists‚Äîmake playlists of episodes and favorites.
‚ñ† Explore every genre‚Äîaction, adventure, romance, comedy, supernatural, fantasy, slice of life, and more. 
‚ñ† Stay up-to-date with simulcast episodes‚Äîwatch shortly after they air in Japan.
‚ñ† Discover Crunchyroll Originals‚Äîwatch exclusive anime titles created in collaboration with top studios. 
‚ñ† Enjoy interactive recommendations‚Äîget personalized suggestions based on your viewing habits.

PREMIUM FEATURES  
‚ñ† Upgrade to Crunchyroll Premium and save with the annual plan. 
‚ñ† Ad-free streaming‚Äîenjoy your favorite anime without interruptions. 
‚ñ† Early access to new episodes‚Äîwatch shortly after they air in Japan. 
‚ñ† Offline viewing‚Äîdownload episodes to watch anytime (available for Mega Fan and Ultimate Fan members). 
‚ñ† Multiple device streaming‚Äîwatch on up to six devices simultaneously with Ultimate Fan membership. 
‚ñ† Crunchyroll Game Vault‚Äîplay exclusive mobile games with no ads or in-app purchases (Mega Fan and Ultimate Fan members). 
‚ñ† Event perks‚ÄîUltimate Fan members get first access, early entry, and exclusive benefits at Crunchyroll events.

STREAM THE LARGEST ANIME LIBRARY  
Over 1,300 titles available, including critically acclaimed Crunchyroll Originals, such as Tower of God, The God of High School, and FreakAngels.

ANIME SHOWS  
‚ñ† One Piece 
‚ñ† Solo Leveling 
‚ñ† Attack on Titan 
‚ñ† My Hero Academia
‚ñ† Frieren: Beyond Journey‚Äôs End 
‚ñ† Blue Lock 
‚ñ† The Apothecary Diaries 
‚ñ† Dan Da Dan
‚ñ† Jujutsu Kaisen 
‚ñ† Demon Slayer 
‚ñ† Naruto Shippuden
‚ñ† Vinland Saga 
‚ñ† Dragon Ball: DAIMA
‚ñ† And more

ANIME MOVIES  
‚ñ† Suzume 
‚ñ† Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero 
‚ñ† Jujutsu Kaisen 0 
‚ñ† My Hero Academia: You‚Äôre Next
‚ñ† Demon Slayer: Mugen Train 
‚ñ† One Piece Film Red 
‚ñ† Your Name 
‚ñ† And many more

DOWNLOAD NOW AND START WATCHING THE BEST ANIME SERIES AND MOVIES‚ÄîALL IN ONE PLACE


IN-APP PURCHASING AND AUTO-PAY INFO  
‚ñ† Your account will be automatically charged upon confirming membership. 
‚ñ† Membership auto-renews unless turned off at least 24 hours before renewal. 
‚ñ† Your account will be charged monthly for renewal within 24 hours before the current period ends. 
‚ñ† Subscription pricing may vary based on region and selected membership tier.

Privacy Policy: https://www.sonypictures.com/corp/privacy.html 
Terms of Service: https://www.crunchyroll.com/tos
