scraped_reviews.content: This review has been changed from 5 stars due to a change in the platform. I am a PAYING subscriber. And I don't even have the lowest tier available. So you WILL be removing the forced ad at the beginning of every new episode I watch. I don't pay for Crunchyroll WITH ads, so stop showing them. Period. I will also be reimbursed for the last few months of being given Crunchyroll with ads. Edit: I do not care what you call them, an ad is an ad. and it breaks the ad free experience I PAY for.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Austin Weller! Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us. We truly value your feedback regarding ads. As a Premium subscriber, you may still see brief trailers for other Crunchyroll content, but rest assured, they‚Äôre skippable and not third-party ads. We hope you continue to enjoy your favorite shows! üòäüì∫‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: I've been a user of Crunchyroll for a while now. I'm not upset, but I am somewhat aggravated that the app refuses to play video on the phone I recently bought. The app works on old phones I still have, but not on the one I use. Apparently, it is a common problem. The app will load up, I can choose the anime I want to watch, but only audio, subtitles, and a black screen are what I get. I hope to see this get fixed soon.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Martin Belt! Thank you for your loyalty and for sharing your experience. We appreciate your feedback about the video playback issues on your new phone. Please contact Crunchyroll Support at https://got.cr/help-cr for assistance. We look forward to helping you enjoy smoother streaming soon! üòäüôè

scraped_reviews.content: So, I've been using this platform for a few years now with no problems. But recently(last few months), I've been having issues downloading episodes so i can see them while flying(I fly about 12 times a year for work) and most of the time nothing will download at all or it will take hours just to download one episode. I've tried changing settings both on the app and on my phone but nothing works. I've had no issues with other apps downloading videos for travel.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nathaniel Churchill! üòä We're so glad to hear you've enjoyed our platform for years! Your feedback about the downloading issues is truly appreciated. We want your experience to be seamless, especially on flights. Please reach out to our support team for more assistance: https://got.cr/help-cr. Thank you for being part of our community! üôè‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: I'm a long term user of Crunchyroll and sadly, it's gone downhill badly. Almost everything that I used to be able to watch on the free version now is suddenly considered premium content even though its several years old, sometimes decades old anime that I've wanted to rewatch for nostalgia. It used to be only new content was premium. Or you can only watch a few episodes of something and the rest is premium only. While I understand it costs money to run an app like this, that's what ads are for.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Holly Hunt! üòä Thank you for your long-term support and for sharing your thoughts with us. We completely understand how disappointing it can be to see changes in content availability. While we cherish those nostalgic shows, these adjustments help us keep the platform thriving. Your feedback truly matters! üôè‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: The subtitles continue to get worse. They are often incorrect, missing, illegible, and lagging. They also seem to have stopped translating text in a large number of shows. Additionally, the skip opening or closing is often missing as well. Every year, they decline further. Go to Netflix and Prime. They are starting to grow their catalog.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Dustin Hummel, thank you for your feedback regarding the subtitle issue! Please visit Crunchyroll Support [https://help.crunchyroll.com/hc/en-us/requests/new] and submit a ticket. We'll address it promptly! Thank you, and enjoy your streaming!

scraped_reviews.content: Even if you pay for an ad-free tier you will still receive ads! They recently added pre-roll ads to even their paid subscription tiers. Don't advertise a completely ad-free experience if you're not going to offer one! This is a "feature", not a bug. It's false advertising for them to tout ad-free subscriptions while simultaneously pushing out pre-roll ads. Edit: trailers are advertisements! It should not matter whether they are skippable or not. People should know what they are paying for!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Will Kyle! Thank you for sharing your thoughts about the ad experience. We truly value your feedback as a Premium subscriber. Just to clarify, the pre-rolls you see are actually skippable trailers for our own content, not third-party ads. We appreciate your understanding and hope you continue enjoying your time with us! üòäüôèüì∫‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: while the quality seems fine, I can not get over the ads in the free version. Just 11 minutes into the show and ive already sat through 7 mins of ads. ontop of that, it's the same ads. you watch 5 add and 4 are the same back to back. I get they need to make money, but it's too much. I havent even watched the full 22 min show before needing to give up.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kim! üòä Thank you for sharing your thoughts about the ad experience. It can feel a bit much at times, and we truly value your feedback. If you're using Premium and still seeing ads, those are actually skippable trailers for our own shows, not third-party ads. We hope you‚Äôll enjoy the content even more on your next watch! üçø‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: I can't download anything on the phone app, on wifi for mobile. app crashes half the time, then crashes when I start a video. It worked fine for a while, now I can't use the app at all. The Google TV app works sometimes, and others I can't navigate to a particular episode , it just stays stuck at the top, or if I do get to the one I want it doesn't open. I have to close an reopen it several times when I first select the app before I can watch anything.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Cody Large! It sounds like you've been having a challenging time with the app crashing and download issues. We truly appreciate you sharing this with us, as it helps us understand your experience better. Please reach out to Crunchyroll Support at https://got.cr/help-cr for more assistance. Thank you for your patience! üòäüôè

scraped_reviews.content: After having crunchyroll for only one day and only watching one anime series so far in that time, I must say the app seems quite good so far. Update: I have now run into a problem where, the anime series is not in english. After paying for the premium without ads, only to have some of the series not be in english it kinda makes it not seem worth the money you pay monthly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nathaniel! üòä Thank you for your feedback! We're delighted to know you're enjoying the app overall. We understand how important English options are, especially for subscribers. Your thoughts truly matter to us, and we're here to help. Keep exploring, and we hope you find even more content to love! üçø‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: when swapping between TV and computer it takes forever for it to know which device you are playing on, saying there's a limit. I'm only watching on one device, at least let me force log out the others so I can continue watching... honestly one of the worst services I've experienced, the skip ability never works, it pops up and goes away in 2 frames, other times it just drops to a low quality like 240p garbage, and I have to backout and replay to get the quality back.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, CORE CAGE (CORECAGE). Please reach out to us at http://www.crunchyroll.com/help?topic=contact with more details about the issues you're facing. We will work to assist you promptly. Stay crunchy!

scraped_reviews.content: It's really hard giving up on crunchyroll, mostly because of the convenience it provides through monopoly. But for $12 a month for an ad free experience. Yet I still get ads in the app. They removed the comment section so now there is no sense of community. They laid off employees to use poorly translated subtitles by AI. The new company they switched to had incorrect translations and inconsistent formatting. Finally, new episodes aren't always shown, or they are nameless. + App lags when watchi

No matter what I'm watching or where, Crunchyrolls subtitles do not work. I have tried on my TV, phone and tablet. I've tried multiple different shows that support English subtitles, and yet they never show. As someone who just recently bought a subscription I dont know if I'll be keeping if I can't understand what I'm trying to watch.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Annika Rozgowski! Please visit Crunchyroll Support [https://help.crunchyroll.com/hc/en-us/requests/new] and share the details about the subtitle issue. We will address it quickly! Thank you for your understanding, and enjoy your viewing!

scraped_reviews.content: I've had a Crunchyroll account since I was in high school, so over 10 years. I pay for ad free premium but when I watch on my phone I still have to skip an ad for every episode..... And now every week I'm having issues on both my TV and my phone where the subtitles either aren't there at all or they're super delayed. everything about this app would be great if they would actually get it to work properly and consistently
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Flora Clifford! Please visit Crunchyroll Support [https://help.crunchyroll.com/hc/en-us/requests/new] and share the details about the subtitle issue. We will address it quickly! Thank you for your understanding, and enjoy your viewing!

scraped_reviews.content: non-skippable ads with premium! this legit started today, while I was used to the occasional ad for other show, they were at least able to be skipped. now it's the same content, but the ads aren't able to be skipped and are in the middle of my episodes, I fast forwarded though the episodes and just ended up with five 30 sec ads. if your response says ANYTHING about the ads being skippable, you're wrong! they absolutely are not, and I'm not just missing it... please don't insult me like that
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Billy H, thank you for your feedback! We recognize that ads can be a bit distracting when you're eager to watch your episodes. Premium users may still see brief trailers for other Crunchyroll content, but they are skippable and won't interrupt your viewing. We appreciate your input! üòäüì∫‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: Recently subtitles have gotten so bad that some series are genuinely unwatchable, and from what I'm told its because crunchyroll has switched to an ai languange model. Its 'advanced' text to speech. Unfortunately, it does not work very well. I expect this from a pirating site, but a paid streaming service?? Lazy, sad, not worth the money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, wait no! Please visit Crunchyroll Support [https://help.crunchyroll.com/hc/en-us/requests/new] and provide us with the details regarding the subtitle issue. We'll address it promptly! Thank you for your cooperation, and enjoy your viewing!

scraped_reviews.content: I've had an account for a few years now. It's a great service, interface design, and large library. Recently they started playing ads. I pay for a fan subscription. That is the highest subscription. I expect no ads. Keep that for the lesser subscriptions. I can't even skip them like I can on my mobile app when I'm watching on TV. Change it back, or I'll just stick with Hulu, where when I pay for no ads, I don't get ads. Full on sub cancel. I can't stand ads, that's why I pay for subscriptions.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Aliah Myers! üòä We truly value your loyalty and are delighted to hear you enjoy our service and library! We understand your feelings about the ads, especially as a Premium subscriber. Just a heads up, those are actually skippable trailers for our own content, not third-party ads. Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us! üôè‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: The streaming service side of the app is nice. I don't have any real complaints, I currently have the mega fan subscription and I'd say it's worth the price for how often I watch, shop, and how many people use my account. As for the shop side of the app, it SUCKS. It's so sketchy, I often don't get a tracking number or a receipt with my purchases. Currently, however, the shop is so buggy and slow that I can't even use it
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Angelyn Sergeiko (Angel)! üòä We're delighted you're enjoying the streaming! Your feedback on the shop experience is important, and we‚Äôre addressing your concerns about tracking numbers and performance. For further assistance, please contact Crunchyroll Support here: https://got.cr/help-cr. Thank you for being part of our anime community! üôè‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: Keeps saying no network, but I'm fully connected to network and wifi and internet. Crunchyroll, please fix your end. My end is fine. I've been getting annoyed getting the notification in the middle of watching anime. I hate interruptions. If this does not get fixed, I'm going somewhere else. I have a subscription, and I'm getting ads. I'm supposed to not get ads.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Adrianna Hayes! It sounds like you're facing some interruptions while enjoying your anime, and we truly appreciate you sharing this with us. If you're a Premium user, those brief trailers you see are actually skippable previews for other Crunchyroll content, not third-party ads. Your experience matters, and we're grateful for your feedback! üòäüôè

scraped_reviews.content: I'm not sure if it's the app in general has started having issues as of a few updates but is being remarkably slow lately. when in power saving mode (normally it does not lag) it Jitters and rubber bands as if on a bad connection in a video game. also I'm not sure if this can be due to my having 129 GB(IK it's absurd, I lose connection frequently in my home I dll @work 5G UW) of episodes downloaded if that's the case, maybe set a limit on the amount of episodes you can have downloaded at once.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Josh Hurd! It seems you've encountered some slowdowns and connectivity issues in power-saving mode. Thank you for your feedback on the downloaded episodes; we‚Äôll take it into account. For further assistance, please contact Crunchyroll Support at https://got.cr/help-cr. Wishing you smoother streaming soon! üòäüôè

scraped_reviews.content: I pay for no ads, I received one when I went to watch a show for a different show than I started. Between that, the popups every day I open the app, and the experience with the PS4 app constantly buffering with a good connection, the service has been not only bad, but a literal lie. You advertise no ads, but frequently advertise your own games and series in pop-ups and before watching a show. I have canceled my subscription. EDIT RESPONSE:Call the ad what you want, trailer or whatever. I'm done.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Stephen Carter! Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us. We truly value your feedback regarding the ads and buffering on the PS4 app. If you're a Premium user, those ads are actually skippable trailers for our own content, not third-party ads. We‚Äôre here to help improve your experience! üòäüôè‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: I pay for premium yet I still get what I would consider ads. I get trailers/short videos of random animes when I start an episode, while its able to be skipped right away its still irritating. Edit. while it is showing only things on Crunchyroll its still an ad (proved by the googke ads service) , and therefore shouldn't show up for those who pay for ad-free viewing. simply add a option for premium users to turn off the trailers and my review will go up.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Zander Olson! Thank you for sharing your thoughts about the trailers before episodes. We truly value your feedback! üòä While these trailers are skippable and showcase our own content, we understand they can feel a bit disruptive. Your input is important, and we‚Äôll keep it in mind for future improvements. Enjoy your viewing! üçø‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: Okay selection. it has the majority of shows you'd want to watch. My only issues are 1) it constantly freezes up on me. I'll have to close the app out or I won't be able to select anything 2) sometimes the audio/subtitles won't work. ex: it'll play Spanish when I have English selected. and 3) (the worst one) I pay for the most expensive subscription and yet STILL almost everytime I click on crunchyroll it'll tell me i dont have a subscription and ill have to cancel and repay it or it won't work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your feedback! We‚Äôre addressing the freezing issues, audio, subtitle problems, and subscription access difficulties you mentioned. Your experience is important to us. For further assistance, please contact Crunchyroll Support here: https://help.crunchyroll.com/hc?utm_source=com.appfollow. Wishing you smoother viewing ahead! üòäüôè

scraped_reviews.content: It's really good, and ads aren't very ofton. I also like the payment methods for this service. But sometimes, the captions will cut off after ads, which isn't a big issue, but it only lets you watch around one season of anime. Which is great for being a free service, but slightly annoying on a budget. regardless. it's a great app for watching anime.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Felix! üòä It‚Äôs wonderful to know you‚Äôre enjoying the app and the payment options! Your insights on the captions are truly appreciated and help us enhance the experience for everyone. Thank you for sharing your thoughts, and happy anime watching! If you need anything, feel free to reach out to Crunchyroll Support here: https://got.cr/help-cr. üçø‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: It works. Nice selection. However, there is a ton of movies and shows that are not available on crunchyroll. I would like the option to save a profile to a device rather than having to choose my profile every time I open the app. Or an option to open a specific profile as a default. There's multiple profiles on my account, this would make things so much easier and convenient.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review, Rob Halford! We appreciate your feedback regarding the Crunchyroll app. Please contact us at https://help.crunchyroll.com/hc/en-us/requests/new with details about your device and the issue you're experiencing. Your input helps us improve! Stay crunchy!

scraped_reviews.content: Every time I use this app, when I click on a video, I just see blank screen. Nothing shows up. Closing the app and restarting it does not help. A lot of the times I see server side error message. It's like winning a lottery, chances of video working is pretty low. When it does work, then it will work for the entire day.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Saimon Lovell! It sounds like you're facing some tough challenges with video playback and server errors, and I can imagine how that feels. Your feedback is invaluable to us! Please reach out to Crunchyroll Support here: https://help.crunchyroll.com/hc?utm_source=com.appfollow. We're here to help! üòäüôè

scraped_reviews.content: Great anime selection, and the cost isn't bad, even if I perfered when it was just funimation. However, when you pay for no ads, you should get NO ads. You will have pop-ups for new shows and a skipable preview for a different anime at the start of your session. There is no way to turn these off. Good luck reaching support, an AI will ask you to repeat your problem at least 8 times. edit for response: No, it's an ad. subscription isn't worth my money anymore with tactics like that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your thoughts about the ad experience and support. Your feedback is truly valued, and we‚Äôve noted your concerns for our team to review. If you're using Premium, those brief trailers you see are just for other Crunchyroll content and are skippable. We hope you continue to enjoy our anime! üòäüì∫‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: Words can't explain how mad I am with this app, but I'll give it a shot. There are around 7 shows you can watch without forking over an absolutely insane amount of hard-earned cash, but the ones you can watch are almost always in Japanese. When you watch said shows, the subtitles turn off every time you get an ad break, which can get up to 6 mins long. Not to mention that, when you go to settings to turn on subtitles again, you're almost instantly greeted with another ad break. DO NOT GET THIS!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your thoughts! We value your experience and understand that interruptions can be annoying while enjoying your shows. If you're using Premium, please know that those are actually skippable trailers for our own content, not third-party ads. We appreciate your feedback! üòäüì∫‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: Really want to have manual resolution selection back instead of the three "High, Moderate, Data saver" options or at least both like on YouTube. Because I'd like to have control over how much data I consume on the go and I don't want the app to start eating away at my data by bumping it up to a higher resolution than the one I want.

I've been paying for premium for years and now I'm getting ads anyways? What? It constantly has connection issues, saying it can't connect to Crunchyroll even though my Internet is fine and I can connect with a laptop. The mobile site is better than the app at this point, and it's also terrible. They keep adding new paywall features like games and offline but aren't fixing the fundamentals.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your experience! We truly value your loyalty as a premium member. It‚Äôs tough to hear about the connection issues and the unexpected ads. If you're seeing brief trailers for other shows, remember they‚Äôre skippable and not third-party ads. Your feedback is so important to us! üòäüôè

scraped_reviews.content: September 1, 2025 update. I've had their highest tier subscription for 2 years now. I'm the beginning of August, I started getting pre-roll ads. I'm having to sign in every other time I go to watch anime (Roku device Only) they have recently gotten rid of the white outline that highlights which thumbnail you're selecting. that outline has been replaced by a very slight lighting effect that makes the thumbnail brighter. but it sucks. They're making it look like that Trash UI that HiDive uses.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Douglas Brandt! Thank you for your feedback on the recent changes and the issues with ads and the UI on your Roku device. Your input is valuable. scraped_reviews.content: Dude I'm watching Dragon Ball, don't interrupt me asking for a review. Good app though. No performance issues, wide catalog, I'd say the ads are a bit too much on the free plan (like, 2/3 minutes of adds at the beggining, after the intro, before the ending theme, and after the ending theme) but its still cool there even is a free option. I like the graphic design, profile customization, and of course the catalog of shows. Bonus points for the color scheme. 9.8/10, would recommend.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're so happy to hear you're enjoying Dragon Ball! It's wonderful that you appreciate our catalog and design features. Happy watching! üòä‚ú® If you need anything else, feel free to reach out to Crunchyroll Support: https://help.crunchyroll.com/hc/requests/new.

scraped_reviews.content: The anime options are great, and the quality is amazing. But the number of ads is just terrible. Every minute while trying to watch a show, 7-8 adds pop up. It starts to feel like you're watching ads, not the show. Disgusting.. Now, tell me why I have to pay for premium to watch more than 3 episodes.. this app has been nothing but trouble for me. It absolutely is disgusting to me... And this is the 2nd time I've had to write a review. The crunchyroll support app is just.. Not helping.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your thoughts, Jade Huskey! We truly value your feedback about the ad experience. Ads help us bring you more exciting content! If you're using Premium and still see ads, those are just skippable trailers for other shows, not third-party ads. We appreciate your input and are here to improve! üòäüì∫‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: I just changed my review to 1 star. I‚Äôve been paying for over two years and now, all of a sudden, I have to watch five ads before an episode starts. This is ridiculous. I watched 16 ads in one episode. Also to watch the things I used to watch, like season two of Solo leveling, I have to pay premium. And no, they are not skip-able Crunchyroll content. scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your thoughts, Stavros Gregoriou! We truly value your feedback about the ads and content access. scraped_reviews.content: Good service, but how come I paid for the ad free viewing but have 3 unskippable 30 second ads multiple times in one episode? Plus it is annoying not being able to watch episodes in the background when responding to messages or notifications from other apps. Edit to respond to their response: these were trailers, yes. But they were not skippable. I can deal with those, as i have seen them before. The ads I am referring to were 3x unskippable 30 second ads of shows like JuJits Kaisen and others.

Wouldnt be bad if it didnt play the show for only 3 seconds just to play ANOTHER 6 ads. If that could be fixed, that would be wonderful.

scraped_reviews.content: You can use this to watch anime for free. However, you can only watch the first few episodes maximum, with an insane amount of ads. In 4 episodes, I have watched 101 ads total. Which is the ad equivalent of 20 to 25 youtube videos and 10 hours of free cable. Frankly, service like this is exactly why people pirate, why offer free services in the first place if all you're going to do is not only dump an absurd amount of ads, whilst limiting the amount people can watch at the same time.

scraped_reviews.content: Knew it'd happen to me sooner or later. Saw a few months ago of Crunchyroll adding ads to people who pay for ad free. Started getting it myself the other day, and other people who pays for my account had been seeing it for months now too. If someone pays to not have ads, it should be illegal to give them ads under that tier. Trailers are still ads as they are advertisements. I pay for an ad free subscription, so I shouldn't receive ANY ads before, during, or after an episode. At all.

scraped_reviews.content: I pay for premium. I downloaded this app specifically to watch anime I couldn't find good subs / dubs elsewhere. It works just fine on my laptop, so long as I'm not streaming it through a call with a friend or something. On my phone, however, I can't watch anything. The app itself runs fine, it's not buggy or anything elsewhere, and the audio comes through just fine, but none of the shows play visuals. TLDR, don't download the mobile app, get it on a laptop or something for it to fully work.

scraped_reviews.content: Downloads Automatically Gets Deleted. What's the use of buying a premium subscription when your downloaded files get automatically deleted. I can be halfway through a series, not watch it for a few weeks, and when I come back to it, it doesn't recognize that I've watched any of it
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear Hunter Henderson (Hendersonpai), we value your feedback regarding ads. So I just couldn't create and account because this stupid app doesn't know how to recognize emails, I guess just don't use this app, I know another free anime app, it's not the best by a mile... But it can recognize your email, it's called "Anidub max" it may not have as much anime, but at least it can make an account

scraped_reviews.content: The app is great when it works but right now it isn't working great. I can only watch 1 episode before dealing with connection issues and the wifi I'm using is really good so I know it isn't a problem on my end, I have to disconnect from the wifi close the app reconnect to the wifi and open the app back up if I want to keep watching whatever anime I am in the middle of and that doesn't always work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Apologies for the inconvenience,Sebastian Annetts (Torchwick109). Kindly reach out to us at http://www.crunchyroll.com/help?topic=contact with more details about the bugs/issues faced. We'll do our best to assist you quickly. Stay crunchy!

scraped_reviews.content: Amazing selection of so much great anime, at a better price than most streaming services. I will actually watch most of what Crunchyroll has to offer in its catalog, as opposed to other modern streaming apps, that are now more than half full of junk shows and movies people often don't ever watch. The video and audio quality are also great! This is the best all around streaming service for anime fans, IMO.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It's wonderful to hear how much you enjoy the extensive selection and quality we offer! We truly appreciate your feedback and support. scraped_reviews.content: 8 or so years of my life, crunchyroll had been worthless to me. I couldn't watch anime without constant buffering no matter what I tried. However, I decided to give it another chance a few weeks back and there is a world of difference. The stream is smooth, the controls are decent, the search function isn't perfect, but works pretty well, and the wishlist is useful. My only big complaint now is the lack of an anime rate/review feature. Oh, and the occasional missing anime or subtitle error.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your experience! We're happy to know things have gotten better for you. Your insights about rating features and subtitle errors mean a lot to us. scraped_reviews.content: I started watching One Piece on Crunchyroll after realizing Netflix only has the first half of the show, and every time I've watched on my phone recently, the video keeps jumping back to different times within the episode, or just right back to the very beginning. I then reset to where I left off before being forced to watch what I've already seen over and over again. Nothing I've done has changed the outcome and I can't finish an episode in a normal amount of time because of the resets.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the review, Julian Atchison! title: Skyscanner Flights Hotels Cars
description: Skyscanner makes planning your next trip easy. Find the best prices on flights, hotels & rental cars ‚Äì all in one place. With Skyscanner, you can search for cheap airline tickets, low-cost flights, and the best airfare deals to destinations worldwide. Easily find and book flights with major airlines like Spirit Airlines, United Airlines, Southwest, Delta, and American Airlines‚Äîall in one place. Save time and money by comparing flight prices across multiple airlines, online travel agencies and travel booking platforms to get the best price. There are no booking fees or hidden charges‚Äîjust the lowest prices on domestic and international flights. Skyscanner is more than just flights. Find cheap hotels, luxury resorts, airport hotels, and vacation rentals with our hotel search, ensuring you have the perfect place to stay wherever you go. Need transportation? Compare and book affordable rental cars from top providers. Here‚Äôs how to use our app: Find inspiration Can‚Äôt decide where to go? Start by exploring everywhere first. Tap ‚ÄúEverywhere‚Äù in our search bar to find low-cost flights literally anywhere around the world and get ideas for your next vacation. Filter your search Know what you‚Äôre looking for? Use our smart filters to search by flight duration, airline, number of stops, travel class, departure and arrival times. Looking for last-minute travel deals? Use filters to find flexible options and spontaneous getaways at the lowest prices. The best time to fly You‚Äôve chosen where it will be, now we‚Äôll help you find the best dates to book your travel. Our calendar view breaks down the cheapest dates in a chosen month so you can find the right flight deal. Not ready to book yet? Set up a Price Alert and we‚Äôll let you know when the flight price changes so you‚Äôre always booking at the right time. The right hotel at the right price Thought we were just about discount flights? Nope, we‚Äôve got your stay covered too. Compare and book budget hotels, luxury resorts, vacation rentals, motels and hostels all over the world. Or, easily find hotel rooms near your current location and grab a last-minute hotel deal for your next vacation. Car rentals Choose where and when to pick up your rental car, and we‚Äôll show you affordable options from top car rental agencies. You can filter your search by vehicle type, fuel type and features. And our Fair Fuel Policy flag will make sure you‚Äôre not paying too much on fuel ‚Äì we‚Äôve got your back. Find the best rental car deals from top car rental providers like Hertz, Budget, Avis and Enterprise. Book with who you trust Compare all your top travel and flight providers, including online travel agencies (OTA), in one place ‚Äì Spirit Airlines, United Airlines, American Airlines, JetBlue, Frontier Airlines, Delta, Ctrip, Expedia, Kiwi.com, Trip.com, Agoda, booking.com and more. Plus, get recent reviews on our travel partners from our community of travelers. No added fees ever Did we mention we don‚Äôt charge any booking fees? Never. None at all. Book directly with airlines, hotels, and travel agency services with total transparency. Save your flights Want to look but not ready to book a flight? No problem. We have a ‚Äúsaved‚Äù feature where you can ‚Äúheart‚Äù flights or hotels you like. Then it‚Äôll show up on your trips, so you can pick up where you left off and book your travel. Why Skyscanner? ‚óè The Telegraph; ‚ÄúThe only 20 travel apps you‚Äôll ever need‚Äù ‚óè The New York Times; ‚ÄúApps for Travelers Dreaming of Their Next Trip‚Äù ‚óè Elite Daily; ‚Äú7 holiday travel apps that‚Äôll let you jingle around the world‚Äô ‚óè Pocket-lint; ‚Äú4 apps to get you ready for summer‚Äù Let‚Äôs get social ‚óè Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/skyscanner ‚óè Instagram: @skyscanner ‚óè X: @skyscanner ‚óè TikTok: @skyscanner ‚óè LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/skyscanner/ ‚óè Website: www.skyscanner.net
descriptionHTML:
Skyscanner makes planning your next trip easy. Find the best prices on flights, hotels & rental cars ‚Äì all in one place.

With Skyscanner, you can search for cheap airline tickets, low-cost flights, and the best airfare deals to destinations worldwide. Easily find and book flights with major airlines like Spirit Airlines, United Airlines, Southwest, Delta, and American Airlines‚Äîall in one place. Save time and money by comparing flight prices across multiple airlines, online travel agencies and travel booking platforms to get the best price. There are no booking fees or hidden charges‚Äîjust the lowest prices on domestic and international flights.

Skyscanner is more than just flights. Find cheap hotels, luxury resorts, airport hotels, and vacation rentals with our hotel search, ensuring you have the perfect place to stay wherever you go. Need transportation? Compare and book affordable rental cars from top providers.

Here‚Äôs how to use our app:

Find inspiration
Can‚Äôt decide where to go? Start by exploring everywhere first. Tap ‚ÄúEverywhere‚Äù in our search bar to find low-cost flights literally anywhere around the world and get ideas for your next vacation.

Filter your search
Know what you‚Äôre looking for? Use our smart filters to search by flight duration, airline, number of stops, travel class, departure and arrival times. Looking for last-minute travel deals? Use filters to find flexible options and spontaneous getaways at the lowest prices.

The best time to fly
You‚Äôve chosen where it will be, now we‚Äôll help you find the best dates to book your travel. Our calendar view breaks down the cheapest dates in a chosen month so you can find the right flight deal. Not ready to book yet? Set up a Price Alert and we‚Äôll let you know when the flight price changes so you‚Äôre always booking at the right time.

The right hotel at the right price
Thought we were just about discount flights? Nope, we‚Äôve got your stay covered too. Compare and book budget hotels, luxury resorts, vacation rentals, motels and hostels all over the world. Or, easily find hotel rooms near your current location and grab a last-minute hotel deal for your next vacation.

Car rentals
Choose where and when to pick up your rental car, and we‚Äôll show you affordable options from top car rental agencies. You can filter your search by vehicle type, fuel type and features. And our Fair Fuel Policy flag will make sure you‚Äôre not paying too much on fuel ‚Äì we‚Äôve got your back. Find the best rental car deals from top car rental providers like Hertz, Budget, Avis and Enterprise.

Book with who you trust
Compare all your top travel and flight providers, including online travel agencies (OTA), in one place ‚Äì Spirit Airlines, United Airlines, American Airlines, JetBlue, Frontier Airlines, Delta, Ctrip, Expedia, Kiwi.com, Trip.com, Agoda, booking.com and more. Plus, get recent reviews on our travel partners from our community of travelers.

No added fees ever
Did we mention we don‚Äôt charge any booking fees? Never. None at all. Book directly with airlines, hotels, and travel agency services with total transparency.

Save your flights
Want to look but not ready to book a flight? No problem. We have a ‚Äúsaved‚Äù feature where you can ‚Äúheart‚Äù flights or hotels you like. Then it‚Äôll show up on your trips, so you can pick up where you left off and book your travel.

Why Skyscanner?
‚óè The Telegraph; ‚ÄúThe only 20 travel apps you‚Äôll ever need‚Äù
‚óè The New York Times; ‚ÄúApps for Travelers Dreaming of Their Next Trip‚Äù
‚óè Elite Daily; ‚Äú7 holiday travel apps that‚Äôll let you jingle around the world‚Äô
‚óè Pocket-lint; ‚Äú4 apps to get you ready for summer‚Äù

Let‚Äôs get social
‚óè Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/skyscanner
‚óè Instagram: @skyscanner
‚óè X: @skyscanner
‚óè TikTok: @skyscanner
‚óè LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/skyscanner/
‚óè Website: www.skyscanner.net
summary: The travel app that makes booking cheap flights, hotels, and car rentals easy.

scraped_reviews.content: I was shown a bunch of flights for $650. But when I clicked to get more information, the lowest price jumped to at least $200 more. This app is not helpful other than to make someone extra money under the guise of offering affordable flights. I don't know if it's legally fraudulent, but the price they give and the actual price you pay are two totally different things.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thank you for your feedback - we‚Äôre sorry to hear about this experience. We expect the price shown on Skyscanner to be the price available at the time of payment. If you have the time, can you please provide further details here, then one of our support team will get back to you: https://help.skyscanner.net/hc/en-gb/requests/new

scraped_reviews.content: Overall a great app and somewhat accurate, but the price change notification is often delayed. I wish we could filter out 3rd party websites since I tend to book directly with the airline in case something goes wrong and not have to go through 2 channels to resolve it. Also, a filter to exclude basic economy would be awesome (google flight has this feature!)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Deion! We‚Äôre constantly evolving our app and it‚Äôs thanks to feedback like this that makes it possible. At the moment, you can choose dates but not time. We‚Äôll make sure this gets to the app development team!

scraped_reviews.content: This app is really convenient until you find out that they charge different people different prices for no reason. Any flight my girlfriend searches will have a list of flight prices and times. When I search the EXACT SAME FLIGHTS I am charged at least 200 more and at least 10 hours more of travel. I've tried to contact these people but their phone number is very well hidden. I do not know why I am being over charged for the exact same flights or why my searches do not yield the same results.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback, Jason. If you please provide further details here then one of our support team will look into this and get back to you- https://help.skyscanner.net/hc/en-gb/requests/new  Thanks, Skyscanner Support

scraped_reviews.content: Years ago, I found great flights on this app. I travel US to Europe. Now, all the cheapest providers that pop up are some BS companies nobody has ever heard of, with lots of negative reviews. No thank you. This app is now nothing but a waste of time. Uninstalling. Here's a tip: Every time I have flown for the last twenty years or so, Expedia has had the best deals and I booked through them. (For me, it's regular flights, no hotel or car, no last minute or standby.) Always a great experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Kristin. Thanks for your review and we are sorry to hear this. All providers shown on Skyscanner are legitimate businesses; if you've booked with one of the providers we are showing and are having issues or you'd like to share feedback, please contact us using our form and we'll help. https://help.skyscanner.net/hc/en-gb/requests/new

scraped_reviews.content: I'm surprised of how worse the new updates get and keep going. Often the selected dates just change when I press search. Prices for destinations are nowhere near the first value. You select a destination, it tells you the price and then it doesn't find any flights. Or it says it doesn't find enough tickets: 1. Come on!? Skyscanner was so much better before the restyle üò£üòî
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for letting us know about this, Miguel. This doesn't sound right, so if you have time can you please send details here- https://help.skyscanner.net/hc/en-gb/requests/new. We'll then be able to have a look into the problems and get back to you. Thanks, Skyscanner Support

scraped_reviews.content: Out dated App. I used to use this as my go to flight search for booking overseas. I would promote it with my family and friends for years. Then this past year- year n half it's gone downhill. It claims I can get a flight for X amount when I click to book suddenly doubles or triples in price. Never did that before. I don't trust it anymore and honestly have just been using other mainstream apps since those work. Gave up after the mainstream ones gave better deals. Sorry Sky scanner.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thank you for your feedback - we‚Äôre sorry to hear you've had an issue with the prices. If you have the time, can you please provide further details here then one of our support team will get back to you: https://help.skyscanner.net/hc/en-gb/requests/new

scraped_reviews.content: Horrible, horrible app. App going down the drain since last few years. Can't even set "Departing From" other than your specific location? What happens if you're checking flights for your parents or someone's else by using a different city to depart from and not your current location? App becomes totally useless. Also, a me of the vendors listed in the the search results are bunch of scammer. Horrible, horrible app.

Really good app idea but everytime it shows me a low flight price in the explore section and then I click on it, the actual price is much more expensive which makes it pretty much useless... Also, it would be nice if I could select flexible dates. For example, I could select the start date and end date of my spring break and then have it show me all the cheapest flights within those dates whether it be a 3 day trip, 5 day trip, or a trip for the whole week.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there Janell, thanks for your feedback! We rely on people being honest with us so we appreciate you highlighting this. Also good idea about the inflexible start date - we‚Äôll get it over to our development team.

scraped_reviews.content: I've used this app twice now and got mixed results. The 1st time was excellent. Got a round trip ticket last year no problem. This year I've tried to book and both times I get an error message. I called the airline and was told on 2 different occasions that those flights are sold out and that's why after I submit my payment that it gets kicked out. Why wouldn't Skyscanner know that flights are unavailable and why wait until you've already submitted payment? Won't use this app again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thank you for your feedback - we‚Äôre sorry to hear this. If you have the time, can you please provide further details here then one of our support team will get back to you. https://help.skyscanner.net/hc/en-gb/requests/new  Skyscanner Support

scraped_reviews.content: I love Skyscanner! They make it easy to get on the app put in your destination and you can just click on the calender and see the prices for each day of the month. That way you can see the cheapest prices for wherever your wanting to go and grab your ticket right then and there. Plus some of the days on the calendar are unbelievably cheap and that is great!

Could be a good app but the prices on my saved trips doesn't update & hasn't since I created them. Everytime I open the app, it shows the same price from 30 days ago. I don't see any feature to refresh it other than clicking into the trip & hitting check prices. Even after doing so, the price on the trip page still reflects 30 days ago. I thought the app would automatically refresh the prices on the saved trip page without having to click into it. Uninstalled.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Meika. Feedback like this is what helps make our app better, so thank you for taking the time to let us know about this issue. We‚Äôll get it over to the right team ASAP.

scraped_reviews.content: I don't review often but I have to say after traveling to Greece, Georgia, Florida, and California using this app, I am one happy consumer. This may be the best app I've ever used for a few reasons. - Shows you a list of all flight combinations with specific parameters or within a time range. Filter is easy to use. - You can save a search and than save that specific trip. and it will actually notify you when the price changes. - Doesn't save your info to price gouge. 10/10 on the appüëç

The latest version as of 25DEC2020 is absolute garbage. Can't search a range of dates, can't find an option to search anything other than one way, and can no longer even get a price on the month view, just a series of colored dots with no explanation of what they represent. This is a classic case of trying to fix what isn't broken. This is a garbage update that I am proud to say will drive me to uninstalling unless it's reverted and never looking back. I've used this app since 2012/13, no more.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback - we're listening! We are aware of recent negative reviews since the last update, and we're looking into this on our end. Good news - the monthly price overview is coming back! Here‚Äôs a sneak peek of we‚Äôre working on: https://bit.ly/3laM6sz Also, you can choose one way/return flights in the date selector. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Skyscanner used to be the only place I'd even look for flights (after lot sof experience of it being the best every time I compared results) but the redesign they did, I guess in the last year is awful. All the good filtering options are gone. It's slow and confusing,l. I literally can't even figure out what currency it's showing me prices for. It's completely awful now and I don't know how this got approved to be done.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback Eric, which I have shared with the team. Please tap on Explore (bottom left), then Flights (top left), enter airports/dates and click search (green button), you will then be able to see the filters on the top (Best/Fastest/ etc). To see or change the currency please tap on Profile (bottom right), then on 'settings'.

scraped_reviews.content: Advertised rate $154 but when you select and go to next screen the rate changes to $231. Websites like Orbitz do this too. I want a no nonsense buying experience. I don't go to the store, pick up a sandwich marked $5 and pay $7 for it. +2 stars for smooth user interface, -3 for bandwagon pricing. Edit 2021: 7 years later still advertising lower prices than the ones offered in search results. This company is breaking the law but this is America where anything goes as long as you're making a buck
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thank you for your feedback and can we say that we're very sorry that you're having these problems with the results . It would be very useful if you could provide some further information here so that we can investigate further (screenshots if possible would be great) : https://help.skyscanner.net/hc/en-gb/requests/new Skyscanner Support

scraped_reviews.content: Generally love the app hence 4 stars. But there's nothing more infuriating when trying to login than an app that times out or resets while you're getting the verification code from your email. Recently switched phones and got myself stuck in an infinite verification loop. Each time I left the app to open my email and get the code, on returning to the app it had reverted back to the start and I needed a new verification code. Also, no easy way to provide feedback in the app. Grrr.

I really used to like Skyscanner, it was so helpful. now seems that it's only usable on computer, because the app only shows ONE flight (out of what it says are 28 that fit my criteria and there is NO option that let's me see the rest of the list. If I "sort" it only shows one flight. If I click any of the "show all" links, it only brings up hotels or car rental options!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, and thanks for your review. We're sorry to hear about this issue and we're very keen to investigate this further for you. If you have the time, can you please provide further details on this link -  https://help.skyscanner.net/hc/en-gb/requests/new . I will then make sure that one of our support team members gets back to you.

scraped_reviews.content: Skycanner used to be great, used it for years. But the last few months whenever I check, I'm quoted a price that doesn't exist. It's always at least ¬£10 more than quoted per person. I don't understand why the prices are never real anymore. It's frustrating and not helpful. I don't really use your website or app anymore due to it. Such a shame. I also really dislike the new layout, it's awful. They fixed what wasn't broken and now broke it entirely.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. We're sorry you've had this issue with prices. As a travel search engine, Skyscanner doesn't set prices, so we can't guarantee them; however, we'd like to look into this further. Please get in touch with our support team using this link, and we'll respond to you shortly. https://help.skyscanner.net/hc/en-gb/requests/new

scraped_reviews.content: I enjoyed simplicity of Skyscanner app and was using it exclusively till recent refurbishment of the app, which gives to me superfluous options digging through wasting my time cause of various offers coming first, not letting me just use it as search engine but seeing through what it does see as potentially good (offering other dates,destinations etc). After decade+ using Skyscanner I feel like leaving to say good buy as it became user unfriendly, complex more than ever asked for,not needed

scraped_reviews.content: Forcing for Hotel and car booking when my goal is to book flight ticket. I could not find way to go back to flight searching result page. I can't take more pain to make yours app perfect when others available.

scraped_reviews.content: I have installed this Apps but it's very irritating ,come often in the middle, very hard to remove and do my ongoing work. I am thinking about uninstalling the apps for these disturbing acts.

scraped_reviews.content: Security Concerns: I used Skyscanner to search for flights and was immediately contacted by a scammer who had access to my search details. They impersonated a legitimate travel agent, used branded emails, and took payment without delivering tickets. The fact that this happened right after using Skyscanner raises serious concerns about data security and third-party access. My family‚Äôs travel plans were ruined, and I‚Äôm now chasing refunds through my credit card provider.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. We're sorry to hear this and hope your card provider can assist. All providers we show are legitimate. scraped_reviews.content: when customers use your platform for booking, you should also need to keep track of booking details under my Trip section. Your platform only shows other travel agent details. People trust you. Hence, use your app, so if anyway your agent is not legimate or creates any issue with booking, you should be accountable.You can't say, check with the agent what happened. Even Amazon also sells things with the help of diff seller's but Amazon agreed with its accountability if any seller product issue
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Feedback like this is what helps make our app better, so thank you for taking the time to let us know about this issue. We‚Äôll get it over to the right team ASAP.

scraped_reviews.content: Hit the pay button for Jetzy for $96 then received messages, flight delayed 10 mins. Okay continue. Next message they want a $40 surcharge. Your customers are savvyer than you imagine. If it becomes useless, I will leave!

update to 2 stars from one as quick reply. === changed needlessly the most important item in the app. Need to see a month view of all days and times. been removed and can no longer view a month view with each day and prices ? scraped_reviews.content: the website Is good but the app is terrible. I like to scan the whole month and the app doesn't allow it. it's the only good thing about sky scanners compared to the competitors. let me know when you will introduce this feature in the app too
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We‚Äôre constantly evolving our app and it‚Äôs thanks to feedback like this that makes it possible. We‚Äôll pass it on to the app development team!

I generally use Skyscanner,,whereas now I have downloaded the app., but it doesn't seems helpful as it doesn't show my trips,,.that I have booked. and no information.

scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thank you for your feedback - we‚Äôre sorry to hear you've had this issue with the filters. If you have the time, can you please provide further details here then one of our support team will get back to you: https://help.skyscanner.net/hc/en-gb/requests/new

scraped_reviews.content: easy to fetch everything in small time but prices related to direct airlines are little more which is fine because this is an third party app. So, very good.

title: LEZHIN DE
description:
The best app for webtoons ‚Äì Welcome to Lezhin!
Immerse yourself in a world full of captivating stories, charismatic characters, and gripping emotions. Lezhin brings you the best webtoons from Korea, Japan, China, and more ‚Äì directly to your smartphone. Translated into German and in a convenient scrolling format.

Why Lezhin?
Exclusive series: Read webtoons like  or  only with us. You won't find our content in German anywhere else!

Daily updates: New episodes every day. Whether romance, BL, or fantasy ‚Äì you'll never get bored here.

Scroll through emotions: No need to scroll ‚Äì with the vertical scrolling format, you can read comfortably and intuitively, wherever you are.

Genres you love ‚Äì and more
Romance ‚Äì from sweet to dramatic, including forbidden love
BL (Boys' Love) ‚Äì celebrated by readers around the world
Fantasy ‚Äì with strong heroines, political intrigue, and magical worlds

Made for on the go
Whether in bed, on the bus, or on the train ‚Äì with Lezhin, you always have your favorite stories with you. Our app is optimized for comfortable scrolling and works smoothly even on the go.

Legal & fair
We support authors and translators fairly. Every purchase helps make new stories possible.

What you can expect
Free episodes to get you started
Discounts, Coin Events & Bonus Points
Intuitive library with bookmarks & history

Download now and immerse yourself in the world of Lezhin!
Become part of our community and discover stories that will make your heart beat faster. Whether you're new to webtoons or already a fan ‚Äì you'll find your next favorite work on Lezhin.

title: Trip.com: Book Flights, Hotels
description:
Welcome to your new all-in-one travel app! Trip.com makes planning your next holiday simple - not only do we have thousands of flight routes and hotels, but we also offer car hire, tour tickets, and other travel must-haves. Need an e-sim or travel insurance? We've got you covered.  

But there are multiple other reasons to use our app: 

#You Can Trust Us 
We've been rated as 'Excellent' on Trustpilot. Download now and browse with confidence - thousands of Trip.com users have had a positive experience with us!  

#Deals and Rewards 
Book with our app, earn Trip Coins travel credit, and save money on future trips. Keep booking to increase your membership tier and get exclusive benefits like free airport lounge access.  

#Free 24/7 Customer Support 
English-speaking agents are on-hand to answer your query within 30 seconds - and you can call us through the app for free. 

#Your Favorite Travel Brands 
Book your flights with British Airways, Virgin Atlantic or EasyJet, and your stay in Hilton, Marriott, or Premier Inn hotels. You can also book trains across the country with Network Rail - in fact, all major companies are available on Trip.com. 

#Multiple Payment Options 
Credit card (incl. Amex), debit card, PayPal, Google Pay, Apple Pay - we're confident you can use your preferred payment method with us. 

What Makes Trip.com Special? 

#Flights
Plans changed? Enjoy our flexible flight cancellation options. We also offer exclusive app-only discounts, live status updates, and price alerts notifying you when flights are at their cheapest. 

#Trains
We sell train tickets in the UK, Europe, and across the globe! Our split ticketing feature makes rail travel even cheaper, and we don't charge any additional payment fees.  

#Hotels
If you find a hotel cheaper elsewhere, we'll match the price. If there's an issue where you can't check in, we'll find you a new hotel. And if you book a flight with us, your hotel can cost up to 25% less!  

#And Other Travel Essentials
Book your guided tour, visit a famous (or less famous) attraction, rent a car, buy your e-sim or travel insurance, and more! 

Download the all-in-one travel app and book your next adventure!

summary: Get exclusive travel deals and enjoy the award-winning customer service!

scraped_reviews.content: Booked a 3 night room with free change before the deadline, then I wanted to shorten it to 2 nights. Followed the option on the app and got an ok message and to wait for their reply. Later they sent a message saying not ok. But it passed the deadline already so I was not allowed to change free anymore. Complaints logged but no one was able to solve, so I had to bear for the cost. I'm not happy with the hotel though it's not their fault. 1 star for that option button.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear Huy Pham, thanks for your feedback. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and understand the seriousness of the issue. Kindly provide us with your detailed concern, passenger/guest name, reserved email, and booking number, if any, at en_hotel_escalation@trip.com so that we can look into it further. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Purchasing ticket, I chose an option to upgrade my ticket to make it refundable. When I actually wanted to change or refund, I had to wait for a chat conversation for 30 minutes. Later, he said the refund was not available, and the voucher, which will take 15 days to receive. To change flight was impossible as there were no flights. I really felt scammed and unpleasant with this sort of communication in this age... I have never had these issues with other companies. Very dissapointing.

scraped_reviews.content: Have used the app for years of travel, and have recently had a few issues with it. The most jarring being arriving at the train station and seeing the train had been canceled. Trip didn't notify me of this, and didn't refund their booking fee, as, "the tickets had been issued successfully." It's ridiculous to pay a fee for a service that wasn't fruitful. Had to change to a flight, and pay two taxi fees. Needless to say I booked the alternative flight via a different app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Plummy. Thank you so much for bringing this to our attention. We apologize if you were not informed ahead of time that your train trip had been canceled. We can check if we missed this part. Please send us a detailed note at https://www.trip.com/help, and our support team we'll assist you accordingly. Your cooperation is appreciated.

scraped_reviews.content: I gave it one star because that's the only way I could write a comment. soo I went to another state and for some reason I had to stay longer, so I booked to stay only for one night at a hotel. In less than 10 min I realized I was very far from it, so I got in contact with a agent of this app to cancel, they told me they were going to get in contact with the hotel to cancel everything which they never did. people from this company are very unprofessional, their customer is horrible!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for raising this concern, and I am sorry for any inconvenience you have encountered on your reservation. To assist you better, please send us detailed information about your concern and your booking details to hotelbookingescalations@trip.com. Your understanding is highly appreciated.

scraped_reviews.content: BAIT AND SWITCH Disappointed. App shows a tremendous deal on an upcoming flight that I want to book. Via the airline's website, the cost is about $900. Trip's cost was closer to $500. Same flights/same days. Great deal, right!? As I'm trying to book it, a pop-up message appears "Sorry. This flight just sold out." Attempted to book another flight to a different location... EXACTLY the same pop-up. Bait and switch. Sketchy. Do not recommend!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear Brad, thank you for notifying us about this. We're sorry to hear about what you encountered. The ticket availability fluctuates from time to time as other users might look for the same option. You may refer to the available ticket in our APP & website. Again, we apologize for this and hope you find the deal that matches your travel needs.

scraped_reviews.content: TERRIBLE AND EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED! They'd let you buy their "cancellation guarantee" service when you pay for the flight, which allegedly will refund you 100% when you cancel. But don't be too simple! My flight ticket was $1000 and that service cost $200. When you cancel, they only return your $1000 ticket money but not all the fare!! And when you request refund they will inform you you might receive VOUCHERS rather than real money, and you still have to accept it! What a platform that CHEATS.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Nightingale. We are very sorry that you were not satisfied with our service. If you could send us your detailed concern and booking info to en_servicemanager@trip.com, then we'll have this checked.

scraped_reviews.content: Kind of misleading. Started with a web search showing a room available, but needed an account to access the deal. I downloaded the app, only to find the room was "sold out". I doubt it was ever available in the first place. Also the app spams me with notifications. Even worse, there's a 7 day waiting period to delete my account (linked to Google).

Google knew and it was on multiple train websites.

scraped_reviews.content: I paid the extra for cancellation refund protection however when I did refund I got charged half of my fare again as a refund fee and the little that I did get back was in the form of an airline voucher which was not recognised by the airline, so lots of false promises on trip.coms behalf so why did I bother paying extra for a false service.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear Tim Mackie, thanks for your feedback. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and understand the seriousness of the issue. scraped_reviews.content: Do not make flight or hotel bookings here, buy directly from airline website, their prices and deals will always be better than here. I just feel safer booking & paying with this Google company, compared to some other sites...

scraped_reviews.content: why you show 1 day cost as bold big font and total cost as tiny? really??? we as a customer pay total cost and not 1 day cost. stop tricking customers. installed app and uninstalled in few minutes because of this trick. I'm sure there would be many other flaws or hidden charges

scraped_reviews.content: the most horrible experience, I am dealing with currently, as they dont solve any issues ,the most downgraded app won't recommend to purchase any flight tickets, as they just ask extra money even if they are at the responsible side to change any time or date for the flights...worst service never ever booking for them again.

title: AccuWeather: Weather Radar
description: Download AccuWeather¬Æ, The Most Trusted Weather App. Get real-time weather alerts and hyperlocal weather updates with proven Superior Accuracy‚Ñ¢ , helping you make the best decisions and be more in the know. When it matters most. Whether it is hurricanes, tornadoes, snow or ice, flooding rains, mudslides, high winds, extreme heat or cold, polluted air, or any other major weather event, AccuWeather is the best. AccuWeather‚Äôs Hurricane Tracker, live radar, and storm warnings, are almost always significantly more accurate, provide greater advance notice, and communicate clearly with more detail and value than all other sources. The award-winning AccuWeather app can be downloaded for free from the Google Play Store and provides proven Superior Accuracy‚Ñ¢, severe weather alerts, notifications, and daily forecasts with hourly and Minute-by-Minute¬Æ weather updates tailored for any location. AccuWeather‚Äôs accurate forecasts and alerts will better protect your family and keep them safer. The app delivers more reliable and more accurate weather forecasts from wind speed to temperature and tracks severe weather with animated radar. Track AccuWeather exclusives including MinuteCast¬Æ, AccuWeather RealFeel¬Æ Temperature, AccuWeather Snow Probability Index‚Ñ¢ and more in your area. Forecasts can be localized to your exact street address. AccuWeather App Features: ‚Ä¢ AccuWeather‚Äôs exclusive MinuteCast¬Æ provides a hyperlocal forecast of precipitation type and intensity, as well as start and end times for rain/snow for the next four hours, pinpointed to a person's exact street address or GPS location in 210 countries and territories. ‚Ä¢ The AccuWeather RealFeel¬Æ Temperature is the most accurate description of what the temperature actually feels like. The RealFeel¬Æ is based on more than ten factors, including the impact of sunshine intensity, wind, humidity, and air density. ‚Ä¢ AccuWeather‚Äôs RealFeel Shade‚Ñ¢ exclusively lets customers know the difference between what it feels like in the sun and the shade. There is nothing else like this. ‚Ä¢ AccuWeather has been independently verified as the most accurate source for hurricane forecasts and warnings ‚Äî outperforming the National Hurricane Center and all other known sources. ‚Ä¢ AccuWeather‚Äôs live radar and exclusive AccuWeather Lightning Network‚Ñ¢ help users closely track storms in real time, monitor lightning proximity, and be best informed. ‚Ä¢ The AccuLumen Brightness Index‚Ñ¢ is the best characterization of the brightness of the day, provides users with better planning for outdoor activities, enhanced protection from excessive UV exposure, and contributes to a more informed and healthier, more comfortable lifestyle. Nothing like this exists elsewhere. ‚Ä¢ WinterCast¬Æ is the best and most detailed description of upcoming snow and ice events that exists. AccuWeather‚Äôs prediction of the minimum and maximum amounts of snow expected in inches for a given location and for a particular storm helps users understand the potential impact. Upgrade to Premium Plus to access more detailed extended forecasts, often more advanced alerts, and an ad-free experience to stay better informed and better prepared. ‚Ä¢ AccuWeather Alerts‚Ñ¢: Severe weather alerts from expert AccuWeather meteorologists often with the most advance notice ‚Ä¢ 10-Day Hourly Forecast Graphics: See detailed HourCast‚Ñ¢ displays 10-days in advance ‚Ä¢ Longer Range Forecasts: 90-day daily forecast 10-day HourCast‚Ñ¢ ‚Ä¢ Premium Widgets: Access additional forecast details at a glance ‚Ä¢ Customize the health and activity views that matter most to you. descriptionHTML:
Download AccuWeather¬Æ, The Most Trusted Weather App. Get real-time weather alerts and hyperlocal weather updates with proven Superior Accuracy‚Ñ¢ , helping you make the best decisions and be more in the know.

When it matters most. Whether it is hurricanes, tornadoes, snow or ice, flooding rains, mudslides, high winds, extreme heat or cold, polluted air, or any other major weather event, AccuWeather is the best.

AccuWeather‚Äôs Hurricane Tracker, live radar, and storm warnings, are almost always significantly more accurate, provide greater advance notice, and communicate clearly with more detail and value than all other sources.

The award-winning AccuWeather app can be downloaded for free from the Google Play Store and provides proven Superior Accuracy‚Ñ¢, severe weather alerts, notifications, and daily forecasts with hourly and Minute-by-Minute¬Æ weather updates tailored for any location. AccuWeather‚Äôs accurate forecasts and alerts will better protect your family and keep them safer.

The app delivers more reliable and more accurate weather forecasts from wind speed to temperature and tracks severe weather with animated radar. Track AccuWeather exclusives including MinuteCast¬Æ, AccuWeather RealFeel¬Æ Temperature, AccuWeather Snow Probability Index‚Ñ¢ and more in your area. Forecasts can be localized to your exact street address.

AccuWeather App Features:
‚Ä¢ AccuWeather‚Äôs exclusive MinuteCast¬Æ provides a hyperlocal forecast of precipitation type and intensity, as well as start and end times for rain/snow for the next four hours, pinpointed to a person's exact street address or GPS location in 210 countries and territories.
‚Ä¢ The AccuWeather RealFeel¬Æ Temperature is the most accurate description of what the temperature actually feels like. The RealFeel¬Æ is based on more than ten factors, including the impact of sunshine intensity, wind, humidity, and air density.
‚Ä¢ AccuWeather‚Äôs RealFeel Shade‚Ñ¢ exclusively lets customers know the difference between what it feels like in the sun and the shade. There is nothing else like this.
‚Ä¢ AccuWeather has been independently verified as the most accurate source for hurricane forecasts and warnings ‚Äî outperforming the National Hurricane Center and all other known sources.
‚Ä¢ AccuWeather‚Äôs live radar and exclusive AccuWeather Lightning Network‚Ñ¢ help users closely track storms in real time, monitor lightning proximity, and be best informed.
‚Ä¢ The AccuLumen Brightness Index‚Ñ¢ is the best characterization of the brightness of the day, provides users with better planning for outdoor activities, enhanced protection from excessive UV exposure, and contributes to a more informed and healthier, more comfortable lifestyle. Nothing like this exists elsewhere.
‚Ä¢ WinterCast¬Æ is the best and most detailed description of upcoming snow and ice events that exists. AccuWeather‚Äôs prediction of the minimum and maximum amounts of snow expected in inches for a given location and for a particular storm helps users understand the potential impact.

Upgrade to Premium Plus to access more detailed extended forecasts, often more advanced alerts, and an ad-free experience to stay better informed and better prepared.
