summary: Your local weather forecast, storm tracker, radar maps & live weather news

scraped_reviews.content: I got some update recently, and ever since, it freezes immediately on opening. (Galaxy S23) So, it's unusable a lot of the time, even after several hard closes and phone restarts. Also, there is an ad that covers the bottom inch of the screen that never goes away and has no option to close. The new format is awful, especially the favorite cities... and why do we only get four favorites now?? Please do what Cracker Barrel did and just go back to what works and people like!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that you had a bad experience with our app. If you would like to provide more details and help us improve, please email our support team at support@accuweather.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I've survived more than 40 years, professionally, in aviation by calling things as I see them. In that specialty, I take the choice of weather apps very seriously. The old format met my requirements easily. The new format is much less intuitive to navigate. It's nice to have a choice of the light or dark format but neither is easy to read because the font is so small. They took away some of my favorite locations. In their effort to present more information conveniently they created a mess.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Your suggestions are extremely valuable to us and we will share your suggestion with our team. These insights give us an idea of the features you love and where we can improve.

scraped_reviews.content: I like some aspects of the app but a few other things take away from the app and it's going I. the wrong direction. For one I prefer 24 hour time format but they totally removed that from their app, only 12 hour format is available no matter what your phone is set to. Also, the minute forecast used to show conditions, now only rain or not. Another step backwards. Widgets also take too much space than needed, more compact options would be great.

AccuWeather app gets worse over time. New update is awful. The look is cheap like some other apps and the new color scheme is too much. Not sure what prompted this change but I think I may just have to stick with the stock weather and clock on my phone. Years ago, I paid to update to the ad free premium and that doesn't get you anything anymore except just ad free. All the best options are subscription now.

This app doesn't stay active in the background and keep my location updated anymore. It used to. I'm a commercial truck driver and rely on that feature to keep me updated on local weather conditions. I have the data unrestricted, as well as the battery optimization setting. It is unrestricted as well. So therefore I don't understand why it doesn't stay updated. The location will be stuck on a previous location and I have to force it to manually update.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Please check your app settings to ensure location services are enabled. If the problem persists, try reinstalling the app. For further assistance, contact us at support@accuweather.com. We look forward to assisting you!

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this weather app, but ever since it was reorganized and updated, it is super buggy. I cannot add or delete locations. I travel often and like to have a couple other locations in addition to my default, current location, but this app makes it impossible to add them and view the weather ahead of my travels. I was finally able to add a location after opening and closing the app one day, only to go in the next day and find it had disappeared. It will not add again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Amie! Please try uninstalling and reinstalling the app to ensure you have the most current version. If the issue persists, contact support@accuweather.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Overall the app is very useful, all weather info I could ask for is there. But I have to complain (like many others) about the ads. I am not a 'paying' customer so I understand the necessity of ads, but it's the PLACEMENT of these ads I take issue with. I open the app and there is a huge Walmart ad covering the weather information I need. And sometimes the ad locks the screen and I cannot scroll or refresh the screen. I remember when the ads were just a bar at the bottom of the screen. Do that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please let us know what you did not like about our app at support@accuweather.com, so we could improve it based on your feedback. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Was #1 in my opinion... Since update, widgets are cheap, inaccurate, and unpredictable. Constantly loses location and puts me in places that I am not. Update: Fixed location somewhat but still not anywhere near as good as it was. Update: Since newest updates the widgets are even less useful. No refresh button??? The temp in the notification bar never matches the widget. Come on, it was PERFECT a few years ago but I guess that was the end of it. Steady decline since. Update: Now BROKE ALL WIDGETS
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that you had a bad experience with our app. If you would like to provide more details and help us improve, please email our support team at support@accuweather.com. Carl, we appreciate your detailed feedback about the widgets and location issues.

scraped_reviews.content: I've preferred accuweather for years. I like the interfacing, the accuracy, the widgets, and the amount of information I can get regarding the weather anywhere! I just deleted this app, though, because the ads are out for control. I don't want to watch an ad for a stupid game I will NEVER download every time I check the forecast. I can use a search engine just as quickly and I'm not seeing and hearing and waiting on an ad for royal match or something like that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that :( Please let us know what you did not like about our app at support@accuweather.com, so we could improve it based on your feedback. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: After exclusively using AccuWeather for years, and being a premium member, I downloaded another weather app just to get something as simple as sunrise and sunset times on the extended forecast. Why that was taken away is bewildering. It's an essential thing to planning your day, especially if you are traveling far from home.

I've used this for many years. This used to be my favorite weather app. I love the AQI, that's important to me. The reason for 1 star is mainly because the free version constantly sends me notications that it can't find my location, despite set to allow all the time with precise location. Also, the temp icon will not stay in the status bar across the top of my phone anymore. This app has become completely useless. I am not sure what update specifically ruined the app, but please fix it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nancy! Please try uninstalling and reinstalling the app to ensure you have the most current version. If the issue persists, contact support@accuweather.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I've had this app for years, and it's been a great app until the last couple of years. 75% if the time the weather forecast isn't (dare I say) accurate. It'll say mostly cloudy when it's clear, and vice-versa. Since the last UI change/update, the drop down menu widget never works. It just shows dashes for the weather. They want us to sign up for a monthly payment program, but it's hard to convince myself to give money to something that doesn't function properly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for reaching out and letting us know about your experiences with the weather forecasts. If you would kindly fill out this form ( https://bit.ly/3q2vDiu ) or connect with us by emailing  support@accuweather.com ; we'd love to get the details so we can investigate these issues further.

scraped_reviews.content: I purchased this app many years ago, before they started the monthly and yearly plans. The software itself is great. I still have the ad free version, but in Mid September 2025, and new version update was download to my phone. with that, they took away features I had, and in order to get them back, I have to join a plan. Gone are days of owning the software with free updates. If you originally paid one price to own the app, access to features should not be taken away. very disappointed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Lauren! Please let us know what you did not like about our app at support@accuweather.com, so we could improve it based on your feedback. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Used to rate 5 stars, but dropping to 2 after the last update. I have been attempting to remove a location I'm no longer following but I keep getting unwanted notifications for. I have edited my locations, removed it, and selected done multiple times. I keeps coming back. I have gone into notifications, turned off notifications for this location, saved, and then removed the location. Nope. No matter what I do, I cannot permanently remove this location and notifications for it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Please try uninstall and reinstalling the application, if the issues persist contact us at support@accuweather.com with more details.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been a paying subscriber for two years, but my recent experience with the app and the lack of response from customer support have led me to unsubscibe. The app and widgets worked perfectly until a month ago. I customer customer support through the app, but they never responded. Now. neither the app not the widgets function at all. I'm done paying for this. They may provide the most accurate weather data, but their product is now broken and useless.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear about the issues with the app and lack of support. We are sorry to hear that there were features that were not working for you. Would you kindly share the exact issues you are having with support@accuweather.com and we will do our best to rectify as quickly as possible. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: after the last update back in August, my widget keeps losing connection or something. it goes black and can not load info. When the phone is locked, it keeps losing connection. I have a Galaxy S24. The forecast is always correct, so that's good. What more do you need to fix this? I'll change my rating after the fix.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi TJ! Please try uninstalling and reinstalling the app to ensure you have the most current version. If the issue persists, contact support@accuweather.com.

scraped_reviews.content: This used to be a great app. There used to be a one time payment for premium to get rid of ads, which I purchased. Nowadays, they want a monthly subscription to hide ads. Otherwise, you are constantly bombarded with them. And the minute cast feature, which was the main reason I started using AccuWeather, is now a small window with a large ad below it. It saddens me, but I will have to find a different weather app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for reaching out! We'd love to help you restore your paid upgrade within the new application and assist you with the MinuteCast options. Also, AccuWeather app is not affiliated with the Netflix. Please email support@accuweather.com for assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: Ads are becoming very sneaky, hiding the close button. I had a full screen ad the other day and I let it play out as usual. But I waited and waited, and thought... is it done? Then I realized in the top-right there was the tiniest icon [|‚Ä∫], a pause/play button, and even that launched some confirmation dialog. Poor choice of icon, poor choice of button size, poor ad experience. If there were an ad on a normal web-platform I'd be reporting as abuse.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Please let us know what you did not like about our app at support@accuweather.com, so we could improve it based on your feedback. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: The app is very accurate. But. on the negative side: I have Accuweather+, subscriptions should never have in app adds. I also had to turn the notifications off. Most of the notifications were not worth while. I get a ton of coastal flooding alerts when I don't live near the coast and my location does not flood. When I restart my phone, the app defaults to New York City, which is not my location. I have to open the app to correct location and app size. The display is cut off otherwise.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It sounds like you may need to uninstall and reinstall the app. Also, ensure that your VPN is not causing the issue. For further help, please reach out to us at support@accuweather.com. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Ad-ridden and worse than ever before. My last 1-star review almost 2 years ago was about WinterCast not working. I still have not seen evidence that this is fixed. Now the ads are so intrusive that this has become an ad app with some weather information on the side. Whenever you click hourly or radar, full-screen unskippable ad, and if the ad doesn't load properly the entire app locks up. I hate the term "literally unusable", but this app is rapidly approaching that description.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Rob, we are sorry for this, but to continue work on this free app, we use revenue from Ads. If you don't want to see the Ads, we offer an option to purchase the Premium version, which contains no ads. Thanks for your understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: New version requires two separate subscriptions and fees. 1) Google Play store charges to get version to remove the Ads. 2) Accuweather now charges another subscription to get a few more features that really didn't seem worth it. The App dies not do or provide what the description says. The previous version is much more useful, more understanding and more practical. This version actually took away features and caused me to pay two different fees for less and doesn't work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Bill! Please email support@accuweather for directions to restore your Premium App.

scraped_reviews.content: Temperatures are almost always correct but the winter weather advisories every time I might possibly get just a little bit of snow in my area is kind of annoying when snow is a regular occurrence where I live. I don't need a warning every time it mite dusts a little snow. And now with the commercials and premium blocker! If anybody else was this inaccurate with their job they would get fired!2025 and still terribly inaccurate!!! if I could give this app a zero star I would.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. We'll pass it along to our development team and see if there is any way we can improve it.

scraped_reviews.content: Very tired of clickbait "news" articles coming up as notifications, especially when they all seem to involve people getting killed. I want actual weather news, like storm fronts moving into my area, and at least give me the option to keep that and kick the clickbait! If they didn't have some of the most usable radar maps I know, I'd never look at this again.

It used to be a great app until they decided to make their ads the popup kind. Now I gotta deal with them showing up full screen and being unskippable. On top of that the temp doesn't show up on my notif bar anymore, instead, it's just a sun, no number. Finally, the app shows an error 8 out of 10 apps. I'm uninstalling and going with a different one. Sad because it used to be a great weather app til they got greedy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Nayda! We're sorry to hear that :( Please let us know what you did not like about our app at support@accuweather.com, so we could improve it based on your feedback. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: I have been using this app for years, and until now would have given it a good review. However, today, when I clicked the daily weather button, it displayed a full-screen ad, which could not be closed. I had to shut down my phone to make it go away. I understand and accept ads in a free app, but not ones that behave that way - that is unacceptable.

Why the complete overhaul that reduces usability??! it's so much harder to navigate now with so many extra "features" that just muddy the interface. I particularly do not like that I can ot click on the minutecast circle to get to the full breakdown. Much more annoying to have to click the little button. The scroll on the minute cast is equally annoying, I don't need literally a minute by minute bar--it's really excessive. Ads are way too excessive now too.

AccuWeather keeps losing my location, even though my location permission is set to 'all the time". This happens multiple times a day. After opening the app when tapping on the icon at the top of the screen, the icon still shows the AccuWeather icon and not the current temperature. I removed and reinstalled the app many times with no success of the issue being resolved. This seems to have started after the last update, August 2025?, so when/if it gets fixed, I hope I can update my review.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We're sorry to hear that you had a bad experience with our app. If you would like to provide more details and help us improve, please email our support team at support@accuweather.com.

scraped_reviews.content: super slow compared to just opening web especially when in low cell coverage area. ads that you don't have to deal with on web. just use the web and don't waste your time on the app. Response: I have cleared the cache and tried, and uninstalled restarted phone and reinstalled and it's the same. I've given the info needed to test and verify yourself. I'm not taking the conversation elsewhere.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We understand your frustration with speed and ads, especially in low coverage. If you change your mind, please email support@accuweather.com with more details.

scraped_reviews.content: Features won't recognize location on widget or notifications frequently (nearly daily) even though full permissions are allowed and no settings have been changed. I have to click and open up the app and notifications each day to "wake it up" to fix it. which negates the whole reason for the widget or notification. UPDATE 10/1/25- Problem not fixed and is only worse. the notification has to be forced to find location multiple/day. It has full permissions and still does it. reducing star to 1.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your detailed feedback about the location recognition problems with the widget and notifications. Please fill out this feedback form (https://bit.ly/3q2vDiu) or email support@accuweather.com with more info. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Always liked this app until I had to reinstall it after my phone had to have a factory reset. Now, the app freezes and won't work at all. I'll need to go to learn about and use another app. How unfortunate. üòï Update: I have made sure that I fully uninstaller the app and then reinstalled it again. NO change, still frozen and will not allow access to other pages.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for sharing your experience about the freezing issue after reinstalling. Please contact us at support@accuweather.com so we can look into this for you. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Alright weather app if a bit ad heavy. I can't turn off the lightning near me notifaction though. I turn it off. I make sure it's turned off. I triple check it even. Close the app, open it up, and there it is with the setting back on by itself. Cool feature when I was using it for a job that involved closing down everything if loghtning was near. Wish I could turn I off without muzzling the entire app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We‚Äôd like to know more details on this issue you mentioned. Please send the details or screenshot to support@accuweather.com. We'll pass it along to our development team and see if there is any way we can improve it.

scraped_reviews.content: UPDATE: Something is wrong with this app. it no longer runs properly. takes too long to load, my widget goes blank. becoming unreliable üò© PAST REVIEW: Your app is running smoothly again. Thank you for the quick response ü§ó Previously: I still give it 5 stars because for some years now, it's worked, no issues. Today, it crashes whenever I look up hourly or daily forecast. Please help with updating a fix for this as of 3/11/23.

9/25/25- Thanks for your automated response. Had you read my message you would have seen that I already uninstalled and reinstalled the app. Again, I don't know what changed but this app no longer knows my location. 9/23/25 - Something changed. The app no longer knows my location automatically despite permission being allowed all the time. I uninstalled and reinstalled and the app still won't find my location. I have to open the app to get updated temperature.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kelly! To help our team pinpoint the issue, please fill out this feedback form (https://bit.ly/3q2vDiu) or email support@accuweather.com. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Accurate and useful, but the ads are getting out of hand and have me considering other options. Popups that I can't close or back out of, more ad space than information, ads that appear while reading and force me to scroll to find information again. I understand it's free with ads, but it doesn't have to be annoying to use.

Latest update made your app unusable. It doesn't open to weather info any longer. I had to figure out what to click on to see the weather. The other night, I tried using the app for the first time since updating, during a bad rain storm, and the app needed to be set up again... absolutely ridiculous. Not even for free. There are much better weather apps out there. Uninstalled. ps- not a good time to be causing people more aggravation.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: You can now select the screen you want to see first when you first open the app. You can choose to see the Today or Home screen. In Settings, select Default Home under the header General. Select Today to land on the Today screen, or Locations to land on the Home screen

scraped_reviews.content: In addition to ads embedded throughout the app, recently more ads are displaying over the bottom third of the screen that cannot be closed, reducing the visibility to 2/3 screen. Ads are ok, but this is ridiculous. I was told I could buy the paid version, but the paid version doesn't show in Google play and I see no way to upgrade. Dropping to 2 stars. UPDATE Well it appears that the lower third ad has been removed. Kudos to whoever took the comment seriously. Updating to 4 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, David Meissner. We're always looking to improve and really appreciate the update about the lower third ad being removed. If you have any other concerns or questions, please email support@accuweather.com. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: I have used the accuweather app for years, and now, since the new major update, it doesn't want to refresh the weather or temperature. Especially on my notification bar. Before the update, everything refreshed just fine. But now? It stays frozen until you click it. If you guys wanted to update your app, it should've been gradual, not one major change. That would've been the smart thing to do. I will be switching until further notice.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that there were features that were not working for you. Would you kindly share the exact issues you are having with support@accuweather.com and we will do our best to rectify as quickly as possible. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: This used to be fantastically accurate. With the latest update, I can't pinpoint location anymore, the widget is impossible to see (the bottom is cut off on every one of them so you don't even get whole temp, just the top half of the numbers). To put it bluntly, it sucks now. It would be nice to have given the option for to keep some of the previous features...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: This was an excellent app before the "upgrade". Everything always worked and there was never any problem. Since the upgrade, the app freezes when started. Sometimes the app has to be closed and reopened several times. I can't save changes to notifications for some of the other locations. I turn them off and I still receive the unwanted notifications. In the settings, they are enabled again. It goes on, but it's really a poor app now. Support wasn't any help either.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Scott! Please try uninstalling and reinstalling the app to ensure you have the most current version. If the issue persists, contact support@accuweather.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I do not like the latest big update, at all. The layout is chaotic and confusing, especially when switching to saved locations. I can only save 9 cities, and I'm pretty sure I used to save 10. The app is buggy as hell. Locations that have been deleted keep reappearing. I keep getting notifications for locations that I no longer save, and after removing notifications for locations. I would rather have saved locations in a list rather than the big blocks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: HI Scott! Please try uninstalling and reinstalling the app to ensure you have the most current version. If the issue persists, contact support@accuweather.com.

scraped_reviews.content: AccuWeather used to be my favorite every day weather consultant. I used the sunset/sunrise statistics daily and loved being able to see what they would be like as far out as 45 days. But not in this latest version. The only sunset/sunrise times I can find are only for the current day. This feature had me the most disappointed of all the unsatisfactory changes with this new update. I want the last version back, and not be forced to upgrade if I don't want to.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We greatly appreciate your feedback and will forward these details to the appropriate team. They will review it promptly.

scraped_reviews.content: Was my 2nd choice behind Weather Bug Elite but has gotten weaker over time. Just tried to use it and 1/3 of the screen was covered by a pop-up ad that never went away. Using the 2/3 I scrolled and got more ads. It just wasn't usable. I checked on getting the paid version and they only have a forever subscription for around $5/mo. Too much and I'm not going to do subscriptions. I'm uninstalling and looking for others.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for providing your feedback, James!

scraped_reviews.content: I've been a customer for years. I started back when this app was on play pass, and I've watched the app slowly fall apart. Now that the app has switched to an annual model from a lifetime model the ads have become really invasive. full screen ads for games I'll never play, and you're forced to watch the entire ad. This app is now unusable. Go somewhere else for your weather. this ain't it

New UI sucks. Removing another star for the scummy advertising in the paid for no ads premium version. I paid for no ads. You are puttings ads in the app. Greed. Only thing relatively accurate is the temperature as long as it is on the same day. Rain, snow, etc is almost 100% guaranteed to be wrong. App keeps turning off privacy settings. The quest for a weather app that doesn't suck continues.

Not a bad app sometimes, but it will often say "no rain for at least 30 mins, and it's thunderstorm and pouring rain outside. And I paid money for this app. not an isolated occurence. The radar is also buggy and disappears when trying to view it. Until they fix it, I would probably look elsewhere.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We would like to investigate more but would like to look into your exact location and the weather you experienced vs what we forecasted. Would you be able to fill out this form (https://bit.ly/3q2vDiu) or email support@accuweather.com with additional information.

scraped_reviews.content: It's bad enough that subscriptions were increased by over 50% awhile back but now with recent updates, widgets I've used for years are just simply gone. No longer an option. Their posts in other reviews say this is a bug and they're working on it, but it's been over a month. It takes a month to fix a widget that's missing?? Come on guys. This is basic QA release process with automated tests.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Marty! Thank you for your feedback, we will be happy to look into this.

scraped_reviews.content: i paid for the app ages ago. Then they sunset that version of the app for the ad driven version. Basically they stole my money since I have no additional features outside of the free version. I'm not paying for a subscription service. Especially when i bought the app fair and square back when that was a thing. Don't pay for their subscription! The app is good but the company is dishonest thieves.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We‚Äôre sorry to hear that :( Please let us know what you did not like about our app at support@accuweather.com, so we could improve it based on your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: Before the recent, major change I would've given this 4 stars. Now I am set up to cancel my subscription and find another. The app is unusable as it is now. Hard to read and use. The HOME screen, if your muscle memory gets you on it, won't let you leave. The look of pages for Today, Daily and Hourly are just much harder to use and read. Definitely not worth paying for anymore as it is.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that :( Please let us know what you did not like about our app at support@accuweather.com, so we could improve it based on your feedback. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Hate the new UI. Made it harder to find the same things we've been using for ages. They broke the widgets too. Because "current location" for me is 5 miles away, I used to set it to my actual address which gives me accurate weather and timings on rain. Now when I do that, it lets me select the town, but then changes it on me to another town when the widget shows. Stupid.

the old app was perfectly easy & simple to access and read, with very few ads. This new version has complicated the simple. Instead of navigating to the icons at the bottom like you used to, now everything is in a scroll intermixed with 3 x the ads as before. Now with the all the ads they have added, they want you to purchase an ad free version. why don't you leave well enough alone. You have turned a good app into a third party sales app, good luck with that.

title: Udemy Business
description:
Udemy Business features 17,000+ top-rated and most relevant courses for you to learn new skills anytime, anywhere. From software development, IT, design, leadership to communication skills, the Udemy Business mobile app puts the freshest, most in-demand content in your hands. Upskill your talents and learn from highly respected real-world practitioners, thought leaders, and experts from around the world. 
*A Udemy Business license is required to access this app.  

Features:
Stream course videos, listen to audio lectures and view course materials 
View your Learning Paths on the go
Discover and search for relevant content 
View archived or favorite courses with just a few taps 
Optimal learning with the ability to take quizzes or practice exams on your phone 
Download and watch lessons offline 
Set your own pace and choose different speed options 
Interact with instructors through our Q&A feature

About Udemy Business:
Udemy Business helps companies stay competitive in today‚Äôs rapidly changing workplace by offering fresh, on-demand learning content through a powerful content marketplace. Our mission is to help employees do whatever comes next- whether that‚Äôs the next project to tackle, skill to learn or role to master. Leading organizations including SurveyMonkey, PayPal, Lyft, Booking.com, Adidas and HSBC choose Udemy Business to upskill their workforce and drive learning forward.

summary: Learn at Work with the Udemy Business App

scraped_reviews.content: Edit: I was having issues with the app not loading. I cleared the app cache and data and now it's working like a charm. The app worked great for the first two days. Now I can't get it to load any of my courses. It's really unfortunate because the app makes learning so convenient, bit I've just been staring at a loading screen all day. I hope they can get this worked out.

I think this is a great app.. when it works. I have access through an organization and for the life of me I cannot get my credentials to say logged in longer than a few hours at most. It's hit or miss and mostly a miss. Most of the time, the app takes me to the website where I log in and access the lessons through there. Sometimes it will load the lessons in the app but if I pause, I get logged out. Not sure if this is an organization problem or an application problem. Would still recommend!

This app is terrible. Videos will stop loading in the middle of a course and will just get the spinning circle icon. When I close the app completely and try to load the app from scratch, the app itself won't even load (spinning circle that never goes away). I get the same thing when trying wifi and mobile data. What's the point of making a mobile app if it doesn't even work? You'll be better off just taking the courses on a laptop if you're on the go.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we truly apologize for the inconvenience. Please contact us at business-support@udemy.com so we can help you resolve any issue you are encountering. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: It works, sometimes. It's a bit slow and needs to be force quit a lot due to getting stuck loading. The more frustrating thing is that it uses a very nonstandard video player that does not hide the play controls automatically when tapped and does not automatically go into picture in picture mode. Why reinvent the wheel? The developers should have just used standard video players and behaviors.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we understand your frustration and we‚Äôre here to help. Please contact us at business-support@udemy.com so we can help you resolve any issue you are encountering. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: The site is experiencing some difficulties. Please check again in a few minutes. (this message happens far too often - even when the network status is green) Single sign on with Microsoft frequently ends up in an infinite loop if you are logging back in (your session has expired). You have to uninstall and reinstall in order to get back into the application.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Christopher. We are sorry to hear that the app doesn't work for you. We would love to hear more about your issue and have it resolved so you can have the best experience with the Udemy Business app. Please reach out to us at business-support.udemy.com so that we can assist you further. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Hard to watch the videos and skip around. Update: Seems to be fixed. I was using a phone that hadn't been officially released yet once it was released the problem was fixed. Idk if that was just coincidence or what. Only thing I would like to see is when I'm holding my phone (with the fold) upright the videos choices are on the bottom when I turn it sideways where I can fold it and watch it the courses are on the side not the bottom.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there! We understand your frustration and we‚Äôre here to help. Please create a ticket on business-support.udemy.com so we can help you resolve the issue you are encountering. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: App is garbage, I've downloaded an entire lesson from the app for watching when I am underground traveling on a tram. Yet, the program just wastes my time by keep loading and loading like it is searching for signal. When It works for the same scenario, I put it into full screen. The video would play with a circle in the middle that resembles the loading. So, as I am studying and watching the video, the circling circle just keeps running in the middle.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we understand your frustration and we‚Äôre here to help. Please contact us at business-support@udemy.com so we can help you resolve the issue you are encountering. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Casting to Chromecast doesn't work. It just says "waiting for course" forever. I stopped the cast and it started playing on the phone but had no way to control it. I had to force close the app to make it stop. The app is still terrible. It will only play the first chapter over and over. I guess that is a small improvement over never playing anything
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Benjamin,

Thank you for sharing this feedback with us regarding the casting feature. We will make sure to share it with our Product team. Please contact us at business-support@udemy.com if you have any other issues with the app.

scraped_reviews.content: Edit: I submitted a ticket and it's resolved. It keeps skipping videos while casting to TV. Tried taking a React course. Of course I want to watch this on my 85" TV. The first video loaded correctly, but then it skipped to the 6th course. If I stopped casting and continued on my phone screen, it would work. There's no way I'm watching a 20 hour course on my tiny screen. Also when a video does play on my TV, the title bar is always visible and thus blocks 1/3 of the screen. Please fix asap.

Application seems to have an issue when you go from Wi-Fi to mobile when you're streaming the audio it gets bugged and you can't get the audio to play while you're on mobile. I'm going to try to download the entire courses prior to going on the road to see if this fixes the issue. Will send and update when available.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Peter, we appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention. So we can investigate this further, it would be helpful to have a little bit more information. Can you send any screen recordings related to the issue along with your device details at business-support.udemy.com? Thank you for your cooperation!

scraped_reviews.content: Good content, terrible download speeds. I can usually find a decent entry level course for whatever I am looking for. Advanced content taught effectively is not always as easy to find. The ability to download a course is great but the terrible speed it downloads (even over really fast broadband) is prohibitive to being able to easily plan content for travel legs of a trip etc because it takes days or longer to download. Please get a better CDN.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hey Alex,

Good news! With the newest version of this app, we not only made significant stability improvements but also polished the course taking experience to make learning on your mobile seamless. After you update the app to the newest version, we hope you can update your review to reflect the improvements we've made. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Wierd App: It doesn't consider the chapters watched from the downloads, you need to go through them again online to get the certificate. Also, it is impossible to get back to online app if you have watched anything from downloads for an hour or so, you need to clear the downloaded content to make app work again. And, it tries to look for network even if the downloaded content is available, hence you are forced to turn off network if you have a poor connection and want to watch from downloads.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we understand your frustration and we‚Äôre here to help. Please contact us at business-support@udemy.com so we can help you resolve any issue you are encountering. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Udemy itself is great but this app buffers so much it makes it difficult. I can't use it away from home at all because without my wifi it only plays a few seconds at a time. It's crashed a few times and randomly skips forward a lesson so I can't listen while doing something else. It also provided no help or process other than a download notification when I tried to listen offline, so I wasn't able to figure it out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hey Steve,

We understand your frustration and we‚Äôre here to help. Please contact us at ufbsupport@udemy.com so we can help you resolve the issue you are encountering. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: App works well. Lots of interesting content. With the versatility to provide documentation resources as well as quizzes. The only frustrating thing I've run into is that you can cast videos to the tv but the progress of having watched isn't associated with your course progress when you do that. Hopefully they can fix that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Charles, thanks for your feedback, and we're sorry to hear that the progress sync not working properly. We understand your frustration on this and we're here to help. Please connect with us directly at business-support.udemy.com so that we can investigate further and resolve this issue. Thank you for your cooperation.

scraped_reviews.content: A nightmare to use. Freezes and lectures never load. Progress is not getting reflected. Customer support says that they are aware of the bugs and trying to resolve them. I am reaching out to the procurement team of my organisation to make sure the contract doesn't get renewed. There are several other platforms that are more reliable and useful.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We understand how important a smooth learning experience is. Our team is actively working on improvements, and we truly appreciate your patience as we work through these commitments. If you have any further questions or concerns, please let us know!

scraped_reviews.content: I can't take notes whilst watching a video. The video stops. What is up with that?? And the behaviour around listening to lectures without video is wacky as well. For most of the lectures, the video doesn't matter AT ALL. But usually if I change app (E.g. to Evernote) the playback will stop. HOWEVER if I switch it out another way, like opening the camera app with hard keys, I can then play the audio without video until the cows come home. I do not feel seen :D
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Henry! Thanks for sharing this detailed feedback. We know how important it is to take notes or listen in the background while learning. Please contact us at business-support.udemy.com with more details so we can look into this further. We appreciate you taking the time to help us improve!

scraped_reviews.content: it does not give basic streaming player features to skip 10 sec when right or left arrow is pressed in web browser. In mobile app version there is no zoom in feature available for which we can't see the details required in course tutorial.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nikhilesh, thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. Since we track every request to help improve Udemy Business, please feel free to submit yours at business-support.udemy.com so our team can review it for future updates. We appreciate your cooperation!

scraped_reviews.content: from the last couple of days , Udemy business app has not been working, it has not started the videos. I can see on the status page , it is showing maintenance from the last 48 hours. The team should address this concern.

This is great app with many courses, but it lacks zoom in/out option which is very much needed because when instructor shows some code, we can hardly see it, if that improvement can be done soon, it will be really helpful. Thanks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Pravin, we're grateful you took the time to send us your feedback! Since we log and track every request to enhance our platform, please feel free to submit your feature request here: business-support.udemy.com. Your contribution is important to us!

scraped_reviews.content: one of the worst performing apps i have used. constantly hangs when i rotate the screen or press back from the video screen. i have to restart my phone because the entire phone becomes unresponsive. pathetic.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sushobh, I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing issues connecting to your account. This can be frustrating. To resolve the problem, please contact us at business-support@udemy.com, so we can assist you further. Your feedback is important, and we'll work to improve your experience. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

scraped_reviews.content: doesn't download or play lectures fast enough on mobile network. as a result can't listen to the lectures continuously for more than 2mins when I put the mobile in my pocket. I have 150mbps download speed tested data connection.
Great so far. Able to easily listen to course lectures whilst doing other things like driving, dishes etc. Quizzes and assignments help reinforce the learning. Enjoying it a lot!
Continuous education at our fingertips, no excuses. Perfectly working app with a ton of learning options from liberal arts and foreign languages to preparations for professional certified programmes.

edit: the cast feature to another device is clunky. sometimes it works and sometimes it's stuck in loading, I ended up connecting my laptop to an HDMI instead fluid, better than the website for mobile! love how easy it is, how it remembers your login, and how it automatically slows you to the next video/lesson

the app content in itself is Good. downloaded videos fail to play most of the time. even though it was downloaded a day before it says it's been 30 days and need to redownload. this is a problem even on the main app. you should not roll out a feature if it doesn't work 90% of the time. please fix it
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We are really sorry for the trouble and we appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention. We will look into this further!
Feel free share your contact details with us on https://business-support.udemy.com so that we can get in touch with you and resolve the issue.

scraped_reviews.content: I put to download the course for my trip without internet in the morning. at 7pm I connect happy to learn and nothing was downloaded. Apparently the app has trouble downloading stuff if you close the app. Before someone saying is obvious, YouTube or WhatsApp do not have this problem. I did enabled the non-wifi option so it was not that. Also, when out of internet, it gets blocked and you cannot put pause.
The streaming is a bit slow, though the WiFi speed is good, rest is perfect.

It's a great application. it used to run smoothly but from the past few days, don't know what happened, the app is not opening and crashing constantly when trying to open it even if I have proper internet connectivity. Team, please address this issue
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please clear the data and cache for your app by going to your phone settings. This should resolve your issue. In case you are still facing the problem, please contact us at https://business-support.udemy.com with your contact details and relevant screenshots.

scraped_reviews.content: I bought like 30+ courses on Udemy, and like the app and the offered content in general. However, they do not hold their "30-day money back guarantee" promise. First, they make it very hard to submit a refund ticket if the refund is rejected with the automated system. And second, they have a number of hidden conditions that they can base the refusal on even after the request comes to their attention. Very disappointed.

Great platform, very poor and unreliable app, constantly getting this error: unable to play video, try to access lecture from your computer. I think developers need to understand that the app is utterly useless if it can't stream content.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Senna, we apologize for the trouble with video playback. We‚Äôd like to look into this further for you. Please contact us at business-support.udemy.com with details about your device and the course title so we can help resolve the issue. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: It's high time you implement a dark mode for desktop. My eyes are suffering because of such white light in background.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, Thank you for sharing this feedback with us. We will make sure to share it with our Product team. Please contact us at business-support@udemy.com if you have any other issues with the app.

scraped_reviews.content: I have access through my local library. Amazing benefit that many don't know about!

Frankly speaking I'm bit disappointed in the app. It does not load content very frequently. In last two months I have regularly facing issue. So had to write this review. I'm not sure if it's issue with app or the server on which the videos are hosted. When ever you are not able to load the video please show some error message. Currently it just keep loading. Every time I have to go to online website and load videos from there. I feel funny there we get an advertising saying download the app
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hey Amritha,

We understand your frustration and we‚Äôre here to help. Please contact us at business-support@udemy.com so we can help you resolve the issue you are encountering. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: It's very slow. Even with downloaded content. Just opening the course schedule sometimes takes half a minute. What's also sad is that there haven't been any improvements to this app in years. Moreover, many courses nowadays are just used by their creators to sell you other contents. Watching those is a waste of time, considering I'm watching paid content here. I'm actually looking forward to my subscription running out in a few days. Goodbye Udemy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hey there,

I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with our Udemy Business Android app. Please try uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If the issue persists, please contact us at business-support@udemy.com.

scraped_reviews.content: App does everything you expect and it does it well but there are some deficiencies here and there that you can find annoying. If you download a video for offline use in certain (usually lower) quality and then you happen to watch the video with working wifi connection, you're not able to watch it in other quality than the one you downloaded, you have to remove the download to be able to choose the quality which is super annoying. Another thing is that you cannot skip the 5sec pause after a vid

Could be much better. When there is no internet it fails to often or doesn't work at all. Downloading videos is kind of useless. Even if you downloaded videos, if you have internet there are times when it will still stream them, and if internet goes away, the video will stop. The video player is also not the best, sometimes it refuses to go fullscreen and leave the android top bar being displayed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Gustavo,

We understand your frustration and we‚Äôre here to help. Please contact us at business-support@udemy.com so we can help you resolve the issue you are encountering. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Keeps logging out every few minutes for the last month or so. I used to be able to use the app efficiently before but recently something has gone wrong. I cleared cache, reinstalled the app and everything else but no success. I even tried logging in on a different device and on my computer and noticed that no matter what I do the sessions are timing out too quickly. This wasn't like this until recently.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Blake, sorry for the unpleasant experience you had with our app. Please write to us at https://business-support.udemy.com if you are still facing issues with the app so we can further assist you. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: So so slow. It won't load videos, regardless of how good the internet connection is (other streaming apps will work perfectly with the same internet connection). Even downloaded videos won't load and if the internet is off (or the app thinks it's off) it won't play downloaded content, but gives a message that no internet connection is available. The point of downloading is to watch with no Internet.. I have tried reinstalling the app and restarting the phone, but the issues are the same.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Vanessa, I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with our Udemy Business Android app. Please try uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If the issue persists, please contact us at business-support@udemy.com.

scraped_reviews.content: The app works seamlessly and make the learning happen everywhere anytime.
session keeps expires too frequently and it requires internet to watch downloaded videos üòÖ
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please clear the data and cache for your app by going to your phone settings. This should resolve your issue. In case you are still facing the problem, please contact us at https://business-support.udemy.com with your contact details and relevant screenshots.

scraped_reviews.content: not able to cast on tv, what a wa#te app , please improve ir fix this bug
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. We're sorry to hear you're unable to cast the course videos on TV. Please be sure the mobile device you're using to cast is on the same Wi-Fi network as your Chromecast device, or a Smart-TV with Chromecast, so that the casting icon appears. If you need further assistance, please contact us at business-support.udemy.com. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: When I play the video on my phone is showing black screen and loading only.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Amit, I'm sorry to hear you're having issues playing videos on our app. Please try switching to a different internet connection or reinstalling the app. Please be aware that uninstalling the app will delete the downloaded content you have. If the issue persists, please write to us at business-support.udemy.com so we can take a look. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: It is the only application that has made me lose my mind, I have reinstalled it like 5 times and it always only works for one day and then it starts to have issues, it is useless to download the videos since when you are offline it is impossible to play them, also that lasts an eternity dropping despite having an excellent network connection.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Edgar, We understand your frustration and we‚Äôre here to help. Please contact us at business-support@udemy.com so we can help you resolve the issue you are encountering. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I can watch my sessions literally anywhere. No matter when I get the motivation to learn, the lessons are right there in my pocket. The only thing I find silly, which in no way lessens the apps usability, is the certificate you get when you have watched every video in a course unless, for some reason, you want to prove you completed the course, but you could just leave the course running for a few days and get the cert. But that's just me, great app either way.
Sometimes content simply won't load, no errors or anything. other than that it is an amazing app with accessible prices.

Literally the best app you will never found for learning but what happen to the app? since i updated it it keeps crushing and i tried to uninstall it maybe so i can install it again but it won't allow me to. it even say it does not recorgnise me
The a I quiz helper personality is not accessible via the mobile app. you can click the button to tell it to explain more about the answer but you can't see the response from prompt.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. We‚Äôd be happy to investigate the issue further to identify the cause. Please reach out to us at business-support.udemy.com so we can assist you. Thank you again for your understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: Udemy app is very nice for on-the-go learning using mobile devices. Only issue I found is it does not support zoom in feature or full screen view of the contents being watched. These features would have been very nice particularly when the content is being watched from smaller screens like mobile devices. YouTube or OTT apps all have these features. It would be very nice if these can be implemented in the app.

Though I haven't tried the other udemy app for cast abilities. But I have tried this one, casting is not good. Sometimes during cast it jumps lectures or will be in hung state citing 'waiting for lecture'. Or it may be the app can't cast beyond a particular duration. I believe the cast feature is one of the most important feature which allows you to cast lecture to smart tv during hands-on activities in laptop. I hope the team would look into this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hey Abhimanyu,

We understand your frustration and we‚Äôre here to help. Please contact us at ufbsupport@udemy.com so we can help you resolve the issue you are encountering. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Unfortunately, the app is getting unusable lately with the videos pausing repeatedly while my phone is locked inside my bag. I like to listen to courses when I'm out on long walks. The app was great and easy to use but now it' more than annoying, it makes it impossible to continue using this way. Additionally, this would be a great problem to try solving with costumer support, sadly, as it's becoming usual, Udemy "costumer support" links dead end in a FAQ section.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I'm sorry for the inconvenience. Please contact us at business-support@udemy.com with your feedback. We'll address the issue and work towards improving your experience. Your input is highly appreciated. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

title: Scotiabank Mobile Banking
description:
Complete your everyday transactions with more ease, accessibility, and security ‚Äî for banking that‚Äôs as flexible as it is fast.   
 
Key features include: 
  
Budgeting, insights, and advice 
Create a budget and reach your financial goals faster with personalized insights and advice from Scotia Smart Money by Advice+.  
 
Rewards your way
View your Scene+ points balance and redeem your rewards right in the app. 
     
Mobile cheque deposit 
Take a photo of a cheque and deposit money quickly and easily into your account. 
 
TransUnion credit score and report 
Check your credit score with TransUnion as often as you want, at no additional cost and zero impact to your score. 
 
Barrier-free banking 
With features such as dynamic font sizing and TalkBack compatibility, the app was designed with accessibility top of mind. 
 
Advisor access  
Book an appointment to meet with a Scotiabank advisor on the phone or in-person. 

Next-level security  
Data encryption keeps financial information safer, 2-step verification confirms your identity, and notifications help you stay on top of what‚Äôs happening in your accounts.   
 
Switch between Scotiabank apps 
Sign in once and navigate easily between the Scotia mobile banking app and the Scotia iTRADE app. 

Personalized support 
Find quick answers with the Scotiabank chatbot, and connect with a live chat advisor.

 
Important disclosures

By pressing the button above or by downloading the mobile app published by Scotiabank, you consent to the installation of this app and to future updates and upgrades. You can withdraw your consent at any time by deleting this app, or get instructions on how to remove or disable the Scotiabank mobile app by contacting us at the address below.


The Scotiabank mobile app lets you manage, move, and monitor your money using your mobile phone.


When you use Scotiabank‚Äôs mobile deposit feature, we will access your device camera to take a picture of your cheque; record the cheque number, account number, institution transit number, and amount; record your device model, as well as its iOS version and manufacturer.


When you download or update this app, or when you apply for, enrol in, or use a service through mobile banking, we may collect information about your computer or device, operating system, internet connection or telephone account, settings, IP address and device locational data, and transaction data, as well as personal information.


We may collect, use, disclose, and retain this information as set out in the Scotiabank Privacy Agreement (scotiabank.com/ca/en/about/contact-us/privacy/privacy-agreement.html) and to determine which settings are appropriate for your computer system, to provide or enhance digital functionality and banking options, and for security purposes, internal analysis, and reporting.


Please note that this app gives you access to Scotiabank accounts held in Canada. For information about our services in other countries, visit scotiabank.com.


Have questions about the app?

Visit scotiabank.com/app or give us a call at 1-877-277-9303 (Canada/USA) so we can help.


The Bank of Nova Scotia

44 King St. West

Toronto, ON M5H 1H1
