summary: Designed for real life

scraped_reviews.content: Horrid app to go along with a horrid bank. It seems like they go out of their way to make things difficult. I can buy a house over the internet but I can't get a new card. When I cancelled my checking acct it locked me out of the app so now I can't see how much my Amex cc is and have to blindly pay it off hoping I don't pay to much or to little. Frustrating. Lots of better banks out there that'll actually try to help you

The cheque deposit feature is broken. What used to be incredibly convenient is now a nuisance. I can no longer deposit cheques via the app, I have to physically visit a bank or ATM. It refuses to read cheques properly, giving me a message that the cheque in the photo is either unreadable or doesn't match the entered amount. It isn't just the app. Even when depositing at an ATM, the machine fails to read the cheque. It used to work, but since 2025, this feature has been broken.

CONSTANT ISSUES WITH THIS APP Having technical issues is completely normal but too be unable to access any of you account for over A WEEK is a JOKE for a bank. I can't make bill payments, transfers, see my expenses NOTHING other than my balance. I checked reviews and others said the same. As soon as you press the account the screen remains black. I've patiently waited, now I honestly think I will be going to a more reputable bank that's app isn't constantly down and unavailable. FIX THE PROBLEM

This app is unstable‚Äîit frequently crashes, my account info fails to load, and my CC details sometimes disappear. The cash back feature is useless: it only shows a whole lump sum. I need a detailed breakdown by merchants just like the TD app provides. Furthermore, I can't use external checking accounts for automatic payments on credit card, which is a major inconvenience. ‚ÄãNegative 5-Star experience. FIX the app!

Since the last update, I'm having the same issues as a lot of others here - blank screen when trying to go into any account detail page. Someone else posted a fix to turn on gesture hints, I tried but didn't work, for me I had to turn off gestures and change my phone to use the on screen navigation bar (ie task/home/back icons) instead of using gestures.

Getting black screen after tapping onto my accounts or any other option. Tried everything including restarting, deleting cache. I can't even contact them because if I tap "chat" I also get a black screen. Can't log in in a PC because the 2v verification is sent to my app, and it also gets a black screen. Please fix this I need to do some money movements ASAP.

The customer experience is terrible. Your banking experience is as painful as it can be. They will introduce an issue for your account, and then they will force you to go to a branch 5 times in order to fix it. There is no clear way on how the problem can be resolved. They don't know what they are doing. Instead of just fixing the issue they introduced, you have to stay on the line for hours to figure out that they want to force you to go to a branch. Just terrible...

Update October 02 - No resolution even after 2 months. This is insane!!!! Update September 10 - The issue has not been fixed yet. Like other user comments, I have been facing this issue for over a month now!! August 13, since the last few weeks, I have not been able to log in. Every time I tried logging in, it said there was some error. Please uninstall the app and reinstall it again. I uninstalled / reinstalled several times, but it was the same error message again.

update: app is just a block of red since system update and I can't access anything. It was a good app, I had no problems making payments, transfers etc, as well as access to info & everything I needed. Now I can't even use it and I've tried uninstalling etc.

In the past 2 weeks, the detail of my accounts always appear to be blank. Nothing is displayed. The app is unusable on my android phone despite having to reinstall the app, or reset the whole phone. It's working fine on my backup ios device

Black screen in app - delete Goodlock! After many hours of troubleshooting I noticed that Goodlock prevents me from being able to do e-mail money transfers, pay bills etc - when I try - the screen is just black or blank. After deleting Goodlock app, the problem disappeared! Strange how it doesn't interfere with any other banking apps, only with the Scotia banking app. ü§î Hope this helps others out! ‚úåÔ∏è

Tried to log in so many times the whole day. I even deleted the app and downloaded it again, and nothing worked. Just totally a red blank without anything. Need to pay the bills and transfer money tho. This app really sucks. Please fix it asap please!!!

Unable to open my account. I can oy open it after re installing the app. This new update doesn't works at all on S25 ultra. Unable to transfer money and its been a week. Tried opening from lapto but it asks 2factor authentication that goes to phone app and phone app shows me a blank white page.

I can't access any of my accounts or pay bills from the app. Just a blank black screen when I click anything on the home page. Another user suggested removing good lock app but that didn't help either. Pretty useless with this bug.

Scotiabank has been one of the worst banking experiences I‚Äôve had. There is no real protection against fraudulent or misleading apps on Google Play. I opened a dispute over 6 weeks ago, provided all evidence, and still received no update. Customer service is extremely slow, unhelpful, and lacks transparency. This bank does not protect its customers and does not treat disputes seriously. Very disappointing service

this is literally the worst app. so unreliable, never opens or certain items in the app aren't working when you need them. it's getting ridiculous. almost every single time I go to use the app, something is unavailable.

The add a note feature is broken. The notes appear and are readable for the same day, sometimes the next, but after a few days, like magic... they are gone. Disappointing... also Scotia, DuckDuckgo blocks HUNDREDS of tracking attempts from your app. but im sure its for "quality of service". no soup for you!

multiple updates over the years result in losing access to see credit card and line of credit balances. debt repayment is tricky when you can't see how much to pay. but accessing new products is an absolute cinch! I hate this app.

I try to sign in online using laptop and ask it for 2sv but my phone never received a notification then I use go through the troubleshooting process and it asked me to deactivated but it doesn't allow to use until I reactivate it. what is the point of reactivate if u guys never send app notification? why make it so hard to use? just send text verification for sign in like any other bank. I don't know why it is not a option and you guys deliberately make trouble to customer?

I had not been able to login since two months ago with my Samsung fold 3. Contacted support and they told me tech team will fix it in September release. When I followed up in September, they said there was no confirmed date for the fix. Very disappointed.

App wont open to log in screen. it keeps telling me that something went wrong and i have to uninstall and reinstall. which i have done several times to no avail. I have phoned and complained to customer service and they tell me there is nothing wrong with the app, yet it hasn't worked for me in months.

Update 6: I've switched banks and my RBC apps works great! it's Sept 2 now. (original message aug 10) it's been 3 weeks and I cannot access the app, it says to uninstall and reinstall every single time. I called in and they could not help either. phone is up to date, all permissions granted, and high end device. I also have the latest update.

it has a bad security flow. if you're abroad with no access to your phone service (sms & voice) and you want to transfer the 2sv to a different phone and disabled the 2sv, you're pretty much screwed. the app on both phones will prompt you for verification codes that are sent to the phone that's not accessible abroad and your account is stuck in an unsecured state without 2sv. Do you want to chat to get help? well you're SOL because you need to log in to chat with support, which you can't do

tells me to uninstall and download the app again from Google playstore. Did so but I still doesn't work. The only thing it did was obliterate my 2SV so that I can't even log in using my computer. I see the app was updated last week so perhaps this is a bug. Hopefully it gets fixed soon.

Get your app to work, consistently freezes doesn't allow you to access bank stub and E transfer services I've had to uninstall and install this app multiple times in the month of November 2025 just access certain banking features..

There is a new problem with my Honor Magic 8 Pro phone running Android 16. This problem did not exist before today. When I click any account, it displays a blank screen. Therefore, I have no way of doing anything with the APP anymore. I have to use the web version. However, I cannot make deposit with the web version. And that is one of the reasons I changed my bank from TD. üò≠üò≠

Ever since the latest update, my cars number is always being forgotten on the app, even when I have the "remember my card" option on. Also, for whatever reason I can seem to accept etransfers using chrome (this has been happening since before this latest update)

So stupid. The app insists on 2fa, but can't actually do it. When you want to access your investment account, it drops to a web app you have to sign in to, and that needs 2fa, but now the app is stuck acting as a browser so nothing works. Nobody bothered to test this on the most widely use operating system on the planet?

I can no longer open the app on my phone. As soon as I click log in, the app closes. I used to like this app when it worked, but not being able to access my banking functionalities has left me in a lurch when I am not at my computer.

Totally Useless. Main screen shows up but nothing but a black screen if I try to do anything else. Why am I paying a whopping $17 per month if you can't even offer a reliable app for me to do basic banking?? So infuriating.

the app has just stopped working and the contact support is clue less. case is also open with the bank and no updates yet. I cannot do anything with this app and no support from the bank at all. pathetic services.

This app worked fine. Scotia had some sort of disaster event in 2024. since then, there is no way of accurately knowing how much money you have in each account. paying credit cards has become a nightmare. I have double paid payments several times, then my money is locked in the wrong account. Considering it's 2025, this is inexcusable. this is the worst online banking system I have ever had the displeasure of using.

After I am logged in and I click on any of my accounts I just see a blank screen. similarly when trying to send etransfer I see blank screen. no functions of the app work. my phone is samsung s25 ultra.

I have used this app for years with no issues and suddenly this morning my phone is no longer compatible. This also means I can't log in via desktop because 2 factor authentification requires the app to function. What now??
It's been days now, and the app just does not work. You are able to log in to your account, but if you try to see any account details or transfer funds or pay bills you get a black screen
App just showing a blank screen, not able to do any transactions. Re installed the app, got it working for the day. the next day same issues again
Black/White Screen Workaround - If you have "Gesture Hints" disabled in phone settings, turn it back on. This will allow the app to work again.

i kept getting issues with my credit card account and I complained to them twice. now I'm not able to login into my own account through app or web. well-done Scotia. i made a mistake by opening an account with you. looks like you can't handle queries and criticism.

very limited capabilities . I can't do nearly as much as I can with my TD app. I can't cash out my GICs, I can't transfer funds from my investment accounts to my bank account. Scotiabank wants u to call them and wait on the line for 30 minutes so they can sell u other services. pathetic site and app.

can get on the app but can't use it on my tablet as the screen stays red covering everything. my banking info flashes on then is covered up. This doesn't happen on my phone. I have tried to reinstall the app but that doesn't help

They made a mistake with one of my accounts and I have talked to 6 different people who say they will fix it but it never gets fixed and then a customer service representative from another country calls and when I try to explain that the information he had is incorrect he hangs up on me. It states on my account the issues I have been having, but apparently, no one reads the remarks before calling.
Most recent update prevents me from being able to see any transaction details. Just ends up on a blank screen.
Most recent update broke the app. Now it just shows black screen when you click on any account to see details. Please fix the app ASAP.
every time I click my balance or anything on app it just becomes a blank screen. I've tried uninstalling, erasing data, restarting my phone. this is ridiculous

Fantastic Canadian Bank. They really pulled through for me when I needed help with my personal finances and business finances. Their new app redesign is very user friendly, and every single one of my experiences in one of their branches across multiple provinces has been fantastic. Thank You Scotiabank.

I do not appreciate being forced to use the app to be able to log into my account. There should be alternative ways without using the stupid app. I also hate needing to give the application on my phone all of the access that the app "requires". I do not like this at all.

My most recent phone was damaged and can't be fixed, so I had to use my previous phone Samsung S8. Because the phone is too old, I can't use this app anymore. And worse of all, the Scotiabank website won't let me sign in the whe website without installing this app, which my Samsung S8 phone can't install. Terrible to alienate customers for basic service because they have older phones
black screen and cannot view any details for some reason other than the main screen. I would like to pay my credit card thank you. No I do not have goodlock.
Like another reviewer, I'm getting a blank screen when I open the app. My bank says everything is fine with my accounts.

This app is complete garbage. I need to sign up all over again every single month. It's beyond frustrating. I end up having to call the bank each month and they have never once done anything to fix the issue. I bank with all major banks in Canada except one and none of those apps have the sign in issues this one does. Extremely annoying and a colossal waste of time. Bank somewhere else and save yourself the frustration.

title: Fifth Third: 53 Mobile Banking
description:
Securely access your accounts, deposit checks¬≤, view recent transactions, pay bills, transfer money¬π, and find ATMs and branches.

See over six months of account history and account details. Plus you can view total pending credit card transactions, and 24 months of statements. If you‚Äôre a first time user, just follow the link on the login page to get started.*


DEPOSIT CHECKS

Save a trip to the bank and deposit checks with your phone - as late as 8 PM ET to process your deposit the same business day.¬≤,¬≥ And Mobile Deposit with Immediate Funds can get you access to the full amount of your check right away.‚Å¥



TRANSFER MONEY & PAY BILLS

Get in. Get out. Transfer funds quickly. Add new payees and make payments right from the app.¬π


SEND MONEY with ZELLE¬Æ PERSON-TO-PERSON PAYMENTS

It‚Äôs Easy. It‚Äôs Fast. It‚Äôs Secure. Send money to virtually anyone with no added fees, all they need is a U.S. bank account. Money moves directly from account to account and is typically available within minutes.‚Åµ Use an email address or mobile phone number to send and receive payments, account information is not exposed to users.



FIFTH THIRD INSTANT ALERTS¬Æ

Track your debit, credit, and ATM transactions with a message directly to your phone or your email. Take quick action just by swiping or clicking on the mobile app alert when you receive it, and conveniently view and manage your alert preferences right within the app. New to alerts? Login and click on the Alerts menu under your profile and we‚Äôll recommend the right ones for you.


HELP YOURSELF

Update your account information and preferences. No need to call - activate cards, change card PINs, update your user ID, choose electronic statement delivery, and manage your alerts in the app.


LOCATIONS & HOURS

Stop in and see us. Find Branches & ATMs by mapping directly to one of our locations. Get the branch hours or call us with just one click.


SECURITY

We are committed to protecting the privacy of your financial information. When you use the Fifth Third Mobile Banking app, all of your information is encrypted to help prevent unauthorized access. See our Online Privacy Policy at 53.com/privacy-security for more information.




Disclosures


*Subject to Digital Services User Agreement. Mobile Internet data and text message charges may apply. Please contact your mobile service provider for details.



¬π Transfers from a credit card will be treated as a cash advance. Please review the terms and conditions of your credit card for additional details. Transfer limitations may apply refer to the Rules and Regulations.



¬≤ Access 360 and Basic Checking accounts are not eligible for mobile deposit. Fees may apply to mobile deposit with immediate funds, and the service is not available to business accounts.


¬≥ Checks are subject to an additional review by Fifth Third, and the availability of funds from your deposit may be delayed in some instances. You will be mailed notification if the availability of funds from your deposit is delayed.



‚Å¥ Subject to transaction fee based upon deposit amount. Terms and Conditions apply. Transactions subject to applicable cutoff times. Please see Digital Services User Agreement for details regarding cutoff times. All checks subject to approval by a third-party vendor.


‚Åµ Transactions between enrolled Zelle users typically occur in minutes. If your recipient is not yet enrolled with Zelle, it may take between 1 and 3 business days after they enroll. Availability may be limited based on your account type and the date of account opening. Zelle is a registered trademark of Early Warning Services, LLC.


Fifth Third Bank, National Association. Member FDIC.
descriptionHTML:
Securely access your accounts, deposit checks¬≤, view recent transactions, pay bills, transfer money¬π, and find ATMs and branches.

See over six months of account history and account details. Plus you can view total pending credit card transactions, and 24 months of statements. If you‚Äôre a first time user, just follow the link on the login page to get started.*


DEPOSIT CHECKS

Save a trip to the bank and deposit checks with your phone - as late as 8 PM ET to process your deposit the same business day.¬≤,¬≥ And Mobile Deposit with Immediate Funds can get you access to the full amount of your check right away.‚Å¥



TRANSFER MONEY & PAY BILLS

Get in. Get out. Transfer funds quickly. Add new payees and make payments right from the app.¬π


SEND MONEY with ZELLE¬Æ PERSON-TO-PERSON PAYMENTS

It‚Äôs Easy. It‚Äôs Fast. It‚Äôs Secure. Send money to virtually anyone with no added fees, all they need is a U.S. bank account. Money moves directly from account to account and is typically available within minutes.‚Åµ Use an email address or mobile phone number to send and receive payments, account information is not exposed to users.



FIFTH THIRD INSTANT ALERTS¬Æ

Track your debit, credit, and ATM transactions with a message directly to your phone or your email. Take quick action just by swiping or clicking on the mobile app alert when you receive it, and conveniently view and manage your alert preferences right within the app. New to alerts? Login and click on the Alerts menu under your profile and we‚Äôll recommend the right ones for you.


HELP YOURSELF

Update your account information and preferences. No need to call - activate cards, change card PINs, update your user ID, choose electronic statement delivery, and manage your alerts in the app.


LOCATIONS & HOURS

Stop in and see us. Find Branches & ATMs by mapping directly to one of our locations. Get the branch hours or call us with just one click.

summary: If your phone is on, your bank is open.

scraped_reviews.content: When I downloaded this app years ago, it was a great app. it had all the features I wanted. Since they new and improved, the app is frustrating to use. When you view all transactions, you search for what your looking for, and tap on it. when you go back, it makes you start at the top of the list again. you have to scroll through the whole list to search for the next transaction. Very frustrating if youre trying to see what's posted for the month or past months. Not glad to use it anymore.

I am so happy with my accounts. I've had it for 25 years, and I have never had a problem in which 5th 3rd couldn't or wouldn't help me out with. They have optional programs we use other than just checking and savings accounts. Early deposits (2 days) on our scheduled monthly SSA and annuities checks. Myadvance Program in which we can use if extra cash is needed in any particular month. and a lot more. Extraordinary banking experience.

By far the worst banking app I've ever encountered. I'm seriously taking my accounts to a different bank because of this. Doesn't matter which day or time of day, 99.9% of the time it takes 5-7 attempts to log in, with either the password or biometrics. It constantly says " uh oh l, that didn't go as planned". No VPNs, not on wifi, it's literally every time I use it. Fix it or I'm out.

this is the absolute worst bank ever. you cannot transfer money instantly and if you can jumping through hoops when I open the account I open it with a certified check from another bank. it took them 9 days to release it. I don't care if they bought Cmerica or whatever they did. Do !!!!! not bank with them. avoid at all costs. look up reviews it backs what I say

I'll give this 5-stars, but I advise everyone to NOT leave large funds in their account. The account that I had for 2 years was hacked and used to spend the full deposit I made just the day before. It was one of the worst inconveniences and put me in a horrible position since they can't credit any funds until 10 BUSINESS days; that's roughly three weeks without funds. Furthermore the investigation is still on-going and you may or may not owe the credit back. Aside from that, no problems at all

I'm not sure how a brand new account gets locked for invalid information, even if the person's Identity isn't from the state. I've provided well enough information to continue on legally and create an account but somehow 5 days after I open an account, here comes the invalid or error screen consistently. Not sure if this is a computing, Office, or programing issue. However the experience of setting up an account was lovely but actually having the account is not appeasing as it once was.

Occasionally works as intended. Most times, you can only look at one account and if you try to look at another account it just reloads the first one you looked at. Making payments can be very annoying as no accounts will show to make a payment from and you have to go back and forth in the menu until it decides to show your other accounts and allow a payment to be made. Also just an insanely greedy institution to bank with.

I've not experienced most, if any, of the issues stated in bad user ratings. The only issues I've had were due to me not adjusting the settings. I get deposit notifications as well as spending activity. As for pending transactions, they are deducted from the available balance. It's been a very usable app for me, and I'm not what you'd call tech savvy.

I like that it is free but you still can't turn off your debit card to keep it safe when you aren't using it because 5/3 doesn't have this feature on their app. I keep all my credit and debit cards with other banks turned off and only turn them on when I do a transaction. I have not had to deal with any fraud or card skimmers because this feature is so useful. All other banks have this feature now.

One of the buggiest, worst user experiences in a banking app I've ever had. AI assistant loops through the same answers, chat disconnects during the time it takes customer service to respond, "pending" and "scheduled" transactions/transfers do not appear until they are completed (which takes upwards of 3+ days), buttons and text appear partly or mostly offscreen, and every time you click on anything you are met with a 5+ second refresh spinner that hides all the info that was already loaded.

Since the last 2 updates, I have been having issues viewing different accounts. after selecting 1 account, then go back to check another. It automatically directs me back to the previous account. It's like it gets stuck in a loop... Also, it has a very long delay to transfer funds to another account. Wish you could roll back updates to previous versions. Especially if no one is going to resolve these bugs.

Since the latest update it is very glitchy. I used to think it was at least 4 star now I think it's less than one star. The 53rd advance pay feature also sucks now as you now have to use whole dollar amounts (this was never the case before) and also i get an error if i have a duplicate transfer (which was also never an issue before). They need to get their IT people to work on this and it's glitches. Biometrics is glitchy too Please put it back to how it was, or resembles what it was.

This "updated" app is AWFUL! I wish we had an option to use the old version. Half the time I can't log in, at all. When I can, it takes forever! Its hard to decipher what's what in your account. I've had more overdrafts in the last few months than I have my entire life because it is not accurate in transactions. I'm used to being able to rely on the app & this one is absolutely unreliable. Gotta go old school & keep track yourself. This isn't even worth the download.

I got my account set up, got logged into the app, and got an error message that my account info couldn't be found. I get kicked out of the app, and every time I try and log in with my login information it tells me username and password unknown. Eventually, My account is locked for too many bad attempts. I call back today. After calling back two separate times I get logged in only to find the same error message. Get kicked from the app again and my login credentials are no longer correct.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Mary, we are so sorry that you felt you had a one star experience! We would like to learn more about what happened. Would you mind giving us a call at 877-833-9973? Your business is important to us!

scraped_reviews.content: After months of failures, it finally lets me login consistently. That's the good news. But it still ignores the decimal point you enter and forces you to enter a value 100 times what you intend. Or maybe 10 times. Or maybe not. It varies. Want to make a payment of $57? You have to enter 5700 or you'll get $0.57. If you want $38.10, you can't enter 38.1, because you'll get $3.81. But if you mean $67.15, and enter 67.15, that will work correctly. No other app on the planet behaves like that.

"If your phone is on, your bank is open"? Not true. This app has become unusable and unreliable. Can't move money between accounts. Can't send money with Zelle. App closes constantly when trying to use it. This has gotten progressively worse and I was told it was a known issue when I called 3 weeks ago. Unacceptable for my banking institution to be unreliable.

Have trouble logging in, gives the something has gone wrong. I have to restart phone and then can log in. Also cache won't clear. Why? Old review: 5/3 app is great! I tried using my tablet for deposits and it could not take a picture. Downloaded app to my phone and it worked great! Just takes a few minutes to find your way around the app. and then good to go!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing this feedback. We always value input from customers like you to help us improve the experience on our mobile app.

scraped_reviews.content: Tried to use Zelle from my Android 5 times. Screen freezes up at" Stay safe from common scams". I checkmark box at bottom and it freezes up at that point. There is no" continue" button or anything. Far as I can go. I've deleted and re-installed app twice. Doesnt help. Freezes same point. I can send from Zelle on desktop. I have no other issues with app.

I really do not like the new update for this app!! You have to click too many times just to do anything anymore. You also no longer have a quick look to your account balances. Trying to get biometric login has become a nuisance, as it tends to pop up the keyboard instead of the fingerprint option. So very disappointed and extremely frustrated!

Ever since the prior update, which I wish I hadn't done now, it's been terrible. One day the biometrics works and then stops, you can't search any amounts or check #s, when a check does clear you can't see details, etc, etc. I could go on and on! When you call customer service about issues they act like I am dumb and they make all kinds of excuses! DO BETTER!! it's so bad that I am thinking of switching banks!! Just did the lastest update too and the biometrics still isn't fixed!!

App used to be great. For some reason they removed a lot of features. You can't check your accounts balances without logging in now. Account activity isn't nearly as detailed. Like if I transfer money between accounts it will only tell me the money has been added/subtracted but not from where. Also the new white on white background has to be the worst possible look, with no option to change it.

The previous version of the app was great. For the current version of the app they took every single thing that was great about the previous version and figured out how to make it as bad as possible. The font is way too large, every icon next to every transaction is the same and makes no sense for that transaction type. Every transaction is the same color. And if you have multiple accounts it won't even show you an overall total. Perfect example of how not to build a banking app.

This app is terrible. Never gives current information. Is always a day or two behind real account balances and doesn't even show alot of pending items. Can take over a week for things to process and checks are extremely slow. Can not pay bills through the system, they send a check from your account but it can take nearly a month. Always need to pay 6 weeks ahead for it to be received on time. Balance not in real time, you have to just use a ledger and do your accounting the old-fashioned way.

Loved it before, but updated & now it's absolutely horrible! Cannot use fingerprint login 90% time now, everytime I get a "technical error" when I try to login by typing my password as well.... only work around I've found is completely unistalling the app/reinstalling. VERY irritating. Don't even try to use this app until they get all the bugs fixed, not worth the frustration!

This is a prime example of at least what gamers see as a rushed release of a platform. I get that when a brand new system releases there will always be new bug found and fixed. That is the life of the internet. Update ¬≤/16/23. I can now log in. But after it loads I get an error message saying something went wrong please contact ### if problem persists. Keeping my 1 star review while I keep using the mobile web version. 53 does not have a working app still. Keep to the online until they fix.

I cannot sign into the app (not surprised as the website can't be logged into 95% of the time), and it tells me I need an upgraded version that doesn't exist... This bank has been the absolute worst I have had for my mortgage, and I've had several over the last year... Never can log it, payments are made but all of sudden not made then they fine me for late fees... Do NOT use if you have the choice and if they buy your mortgage from another company, I wish you luck...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please update to version 4.0 of the app - that should resolve the issues. We apologize for the inconvenience.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm soooo frustrated with the lack of consistency at the ATM and the app. I drive to the ATM and realize I forgot my card...that was no big deal right??? WRONG!! There is a feature that use to be present for cardless entry. The ATM provides the code but the app does not give you the option...I mean wth is going on it's not matching up.. I use to use it all the time and it was flawless...please do better with this app 5/3 üòî

Like everyone else, I'm not loving the newest update. I gave it some time, but the old style was just hands down WAY better. It was easier to navigate, easier to see my balances and spenditures, and wasn't so darn bright! Please add a dark mode at least! Everything is too "bubbly," like, it's trying to appeal to children rather than adults. I've lived a few states away from the nearest branch for several years, yet still kept 53 as my bank because their online banking was easy. Please go back!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Andrew - You asked, we delivered! Dark Mode is now available on the 5/3 app. Please watch for more updates to come. Any other recommendations, please share. We‚Äôre here to make banking a Fifth Third better!

scraped_reviews.content: Don't make us tap the thumbprint to allow us to login via biometrics, just display it automatically when opening the app...like it did before. The font size is huge! I don't want my financial information that easily viewable to people around me. Please add in an option to adjust font size, or at the very least, make the account balance font size smaller.

This new version of the app is terrible! I'm having so many issues just logging in that I have to close out of the app and r eopen it to get it to work. Not to mention, the accounts are no longer up to date with how much money I actually have, which makes it extremely hard to make purchases. More than once now, the balance reflected was incorrect and I've been charged an overdraft fee, even though at the time I spent the money, the app reflected more than enough to cover the purchase. Ridiculous

Editing rating a month later. Since they updated to this new version, it's been absolute trash. The biometric sign in almost never works. When you do manage to get into your account, the way things load is inconsistent. I created a 5/3 account for ease of access to my funds (as I have a secondary bank that doesn't have physical branches to go into). The issues with the 5/3 app are enough to make me consider choosing another for my primary if they continue to persist.

When it works, I love it. But now, anytime I try to log in, it says "Oops! That didn't work" And gives me a phone number to call. Now it's a useless app that just takes up data on my phone. Now, I have to use the website - but only when they don't have maintenance happening... which is literally every day... heavily considering switching banks, because I live overseas and the inaccessibility to my accounts is extremely inconvenient and at times dangerous for me.

This app used to be great.. USED to be. -Most of the time, it arbitrarily denies me access to my account, even moreso using biometrics. -When you can get in, the interface has been dumbed down to large fonts, conveluded menus and nearly non-existent user settings. -The bank widget, which allowed fast viewing of account balances at a glance without having to log in so often, is gone. -The account balances/pending charges take far longer to update, resulting in frequent misinformed spending.

New APP SUCKS. HATE IT!!! YOU NEED TO PUT IT BACK! The fact that you took away the top bar that had balance amount, pending amount, available amount, it the stupidest thing you could have done. I can't tell what's going on with my account anymore on this app. This app is horrible! Everything is just more complicated with this app. I can't tell if the pending items are part of my available balance or have been taken out of that count. One time it was another it wasn't.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Beverly- Your satisfaction is important to us. We‚Äôre sharing all comments directly with the app team.

scraped_reviews.content: Pre "new app" things were great, post "new app" I find myself going to the ATM or waking up an hour early to go to the bank. Biometrics don't work anymore; won't log in with password just "something went wrong"; when I do get in transactions are a mess what's in what out? You're guess is as good as mine when before it was at a glance. Guess I'll be using the browser one for the foreseeable future.

My next payment for my credit cards all say the same number, down to the penny. I use my cards differently so obviously the exact same bill wouldn't match up that precisely. It's a bug in the system however it hasn't been fixed in a month or two. In order to find what my next CC bill is going to be I have to call my bank. It's annoying. Over all this was a great app until this happened. I'll change my review when the app is fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Elliott - Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We'd like the opportunity to make this right. Would you mind giving us a call at 877-833-9973? Or, log in to 53.com/login (or the app) and go to the chat icon, then enter "SOCIAL MEDIA" for assistance. Your business is important to us!

scraped_reviews.content: Updated app is not good. Looking at your account ledger, items are no longer color coded to know if they are a deposit or withdraw. Also can no longer see a check scan copy, just that it was written off your account. Bill pay is now buried in a sub menu and hard to find. Needs lots of work, why launch something that is so poorly laid out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jared- Thanks for sharing. We're always looking to improve our customer experience and will share your feedback with the right team.

scraped_reviews.content: I can't for the life of me get a single account alert to show. I've set them up on the app, checked the app's notification settings, and then waited for anything to show. I'd really like to know when my card is being used to make purchases. I used to be able to see my daily balance as a notification without opening the app but now I get nothing. It doesn't help that the widget has been broken too. I'm considering switching banks because it's getting too difficult to keep track of my money.

I would give zero. The fifty third bank was charging me fees without notification. Not only I did not receive notification from app. They failed to send me a email and they send in paper mail which I never received. Additionally, I did not receive promotion because they were taking money from my account for fee. So my balance got lower than promotioned for. So I lost 25 dollars total joining this bank. I would recommend you try some other bank than this because it has lots of issues. Thank you!

Convenient as it is to access my bank account on my phone, more often than not, it takes 2 or more tries before it'll let me in, if it decides to let me in at all. The app's been weird all since the fancy cosmetic update they did a few months ago. Moving money and doing bank stuff is usually fine, but that's only if I can get into the app. Which 90% of the time I cannot. It's always some 'network error' despite being on 4 bars of wifi and a good data signal.

Been a customer for a long time, have used the App in the past, constantly have issues with logging in. App doesn't load properly; etc. Now it says an update is available, but I can't get it to to work either! 9/30 still can't access my account with the App. Constantly have to uninstall/reinstall the app now, just to use it. The developers/53rd refuse to actually fix it! Not happy at all with this piece of krap! I'm taking my money elsewhere. Now May of 2023 still have to uninstall and reinstall

What is going on with Fifth Third lately? Who's decision was it to take a near perfect app and destroy it? Can barely use it. Rarely ever let's me sign in so I have to log in thru my mobile web browser. In the rare chance I can use the app, it frequently wants me to re-enable biometrics. Balances don't immediately update like they used to. I LOVED their 360 prepaid card. Now you can't view transactions on it via the app and come to find out they are discontinuing the 360. Ready to switch banks!

Once I'm in it is ok at best. I've had lots of trouble getting to my checking accounts. It's like I am not allowed to log in more than once per day or for other silly over cautious reason the programmers have thought up!! Aug 5, 2023 Still have great trouble getting into the app. Can the 5th3rd app handle more than 1 person at a time? I have dozens of apps on my phone. This app is the only one I consistently cannot open up or enter!!

Awful after this update. So many downsides. Removed the now balance, it's hard to see what your transactions are. The slogan if your phone is on your bank is open is false. You can no longer make payments/transfers same day, if it's the weekend you have to wait until Monday. It never was like that before. One thing I would like to see, which I thought use to be a thing on the app is to be able to nickname your accounts.

This app is complete garbage now. I don't get why they had to "update" it when it worked fine, all for a new UI. Now whenever I go to sign it, it's literally a coin toss if I'll be logged in successfully or if I'll get an error message preventing me from getting in. I feel like I can only check my account two or three times a day compared to the way it used to be, which was WHENEVER I WANTED. Typical 5/3, though. I'm considering switching to a different bank that has a working app.

Update on the 15th tripled the font size, you can now only see like 6 transactions at a time now. The only color scheme for the new app is bright white. However the worst part for me is the app will not let me make payments on my Credit Card because of pending dollar amounts. It says I need to make a payment between $.01 through -$51.08 (my current balance ignoring all pending transactions) If my "credit limit">"my available credit" I should always be allowed to make payments for that CC.

I had given the original app 5 stars, but the new mobile version makes more work for the user and doesn't provide as much info - specifically check numbers for items that have cleared. I contacted Customer Service, but the very helpful rep couldn't explain the problem or offer any solution. She looked up a few check numbers for me, but if I have to do that to assist with reconciling my account, no point in having an app. Oddly, if I sign into the online version, I can get the check number.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the review, we're glad you're pleased with our app!

scraped_reviews.content: Supper annoying! It constantly keeps me from logging in with errors like "you're not connected to the internet", but I am! Data, WiFi - no difference... Sometimes it let me in, sometimes I have to try dozen of times. The app also clears my one-touch login access... I thought MB's app was bad, but this is ridiculous! It's not just the app -even the local ATM freezes and gets stuck, I had to wait weeks to get my money back. You just keep pushing my limits! I should take my business elsewhere...

The app is literally unusable. I installed it, logged on for the first time, and was asked to verify my device. No problem, except I got a dialog saying "Well, that didn't go as expected. Try again. If it fails a second time, call 1-800...". I was able to ignore the Verify Device step for a couple days and use the app. Now I can't ignore it, and my pc login doesn't work, either. An hour on the phone with tech support was no help.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Rick- We'd like to look into this matter for you, but we need some more information. Please call our social team at 877-833-9973 so we can assist.

scraped_reviews.content: Intuitive mostly, easy to navigate for a mobile banking app, however, the timeline of your spending should be accompanied with the total of your account at the given time the transaction took place. And maintenance times not allowing me to sign in for 6+ hours is insane! Not being able to check my finances for almost a quarter of a day at times when there are no other options for checking, (like calling) is crazy for how often it seems to happen. Not thrilled.

title: Halifax Mobile Banking
description: Extra easy, quick and secure See what your money‚Äôs doing, anytime, anywhere. Discover why millions of current account customers choose our app. Our app is there for you, whether you‚Äôre on the move, at work or just relaxing at home. Tap, log in and check your balance, make payments or plan for your next big dream. Being there for you, it‚Äôs a people thing. FEEL AT HOME ‚Ä¢ Use your face or fingerprint to log in faster and more securely. ‚Ä¢ Just open the app and explore your spaces to get quick access to everything you need, from statements to investments. NO CARD? NO WORRIES ‚Ä¢ Whether your card is lost, stolen or simply misplaced, relax knowing you can freeze it, order a new one, or look up your card details. BE IN THE KNOW ‚Ä¢ Stay ahead of your bills - your upcoming payments summary lets you know what‚Äôs being paid and when. ‚Ä¢ Spending insights helps you understand where your money goes every month. ‚Ä¢ Check your credit score and get personalised hints and tips to help you stay in control of your money and move closer to your big dreams, like getting a new home. ‚Ä¢ Never miss important updates again: personalise your notifications to stay on top of everything. IN FOR A PENNY ‚Ä¢ Make every penny count with Save the Change. It rounds up what you spend on your debit card to the nearest pound and moves the change into a savings account. ‚Ä¢ Get cashback from your favourite retailers with Everyday Offers. CONTACTING YOU We won't contact you any more than normal if you use the app. But please stay alert to email, text messages or phone calls that appear to be from us. Criminals may try to trick you into giving them sensitive personal or account information. We'll never contact you to ask for these details. Any emails from us will always greet you personally using your title and surname and either the last 4 digits of your account number or the last part of your postcode '*** 1AB'. Any text messages we send you will come from Halifax . IMPORTANT INFORMATION Mobile Banking is available to our Online Banking customers with a UK personal account. Services may be affected by phone signal and functionality. Terms and conditions apply. You must not download, install, use or distribute our Mobile Banking apps in the following countries: North Korea; Syria; Sudan; Iran; Cuba and any other country subject to UK, US or EU technology export prohibitions. Please note that features that require the use of your device‚Äôs phone capability, such as Call us, won‚Äôt work on tablets. When you use this app we collect anonymous location data to help combat fraud, fix bugs and improve future services. Cashback Extras is available to Halifax bank account customers (excluding Basic Account holders) aged 18+ with a debit/credit card who bank online. Terms and conditions apply. Fingerprint Sign-in requires a compatible mobile running Android 7.0 or higher and may not currently work on some tablets. Save the Change¬Æ is a registered trademark of Lloyds Bank plc and is used under licence by Bank of Scotland plc. Halifax is a division of Bank of Scotland plc. This app and Mobile Banking are operated by Bank of Scotland plc (registered in Scotland (No. SC327000) Registered office: The Mound, Edinburgh, EH1 1YZ). Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority.
