Extra easy, quick and secure

See what your money‚Äôs doing, anytime, anywhere.

Discover why millions of current account customers choose our app.

Our app is there for you, whether you‚Äôre on the move, at work or just relaxing at home. Tap, log in and check your balance, make payments or plan for your next big dream. Being there for you, it‚Äôs a people thing.

FEEL AT HOME
‚Ä¢ Use your face or fingerprint to log in faster and more securely.
‚Ä¢ Just open the app and explore your spaces to get quick access to everything you need, from statements to investments.

NO CARD? NO WORRIES
‚Ä¢ Whether your card is lost, stolen or simply misplaced, relax knowing you can freeze it, order a new one, or look up your card details.

BE IN THE KNOW
‚Ä¢ Stay ahead of your bills - your upcoming payments summary lets you know what‚Äôs being paid and when.
‚Ä¢ Spending insights helps you understand where your money goes every month.
‚Ä¢ Check your credit score and get personalised hints and tips to help you stay in control of your money and move closer to your big dreams, like getting a new home.
‚Ä¢ Never miss important updates again: personalise your notifications to stay on top of everything.

IN FOR A PENNY
‚Ä¢ Make every penny count with Save the Change. It rounds up what you spend on your debit card to the nearest pound and moves the change into a savings account.
‚Ä¢ Get cashback from your favourite retailers with Everyday Offers.

CONTACTING YOU
We won't contact you any more than normal if you use the app. But please stay alert to email, text messages or phone calls that appear to be from us. Criminals may try to trick you into giving them sensitive personal or account information. We'll never contact you to ask for these details. Any emails from us will always greet you personally using your title and surname and either the last 4 digits of your account number or the last part of your postcode '*** 1AB'. Any text messages we send you will come from Halifax .

IMPORTANT INFORMATION
Mobile Banking is available to our Online Banking customers with a UK personal account. Services may be affected by phone signal and functionality. Terms and conditions apply.

You must not download, install, use or distribute our Mobile Banking apps in the following countries: North Korea; Syria; Sudan; Iran; Cuba and any other country subject to UK, US or EU technology export prohibitions.
Please note that features that require the use of your device‚Äôs phone capability, such as Call us, won‚Äôt work on tablets.

When you use this app we collect anonymous location data to help combat fraud, fix bugs and improve future services.

Cashback Extras is available to Halifax bank account customers (excluding Basic Account holders) aged 18+ with a debit/credit card who bank online. Terms and conditions apply.

Fingerprint Sign-in requires a compatible mobile running Android 7.0 or higher and may not currently work on some tablets.

Save the Change¬Æ is a registered trademark of Lloyds Bank plc and is used under licence by Bank of Scotland plc.

Halifax is a division of Bank of Scotland plc. This app and Mobile Banking are operated by Bank of Scotland plc (registered in Scotland (No. SC327000) Registered office: The Mound, Edinburgh, EH1 1YZ). Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority.
summary: Our app makes your everyday banking extra simple, quick & secure

scraped_reviews.content: please fix it so that when I've read notice like statements in the app, it doesn't still show unread notifications unless I log out or force close. Doesn't matter how many times I open them, leave the page, go to next message. Still shows the envelope icon. Silly basic things like this, no matter how many updates you make stop me rating this higher

cluttered mess of an app, clicked notification popup to approve a payment, it opened the app but didn't take me to the approve screen! So where is it if looking manually? must be tucked away somewhere behind multiple menus?? need a clear way to view things awaiting approval! this ain't good enough! a notification bell at the top seems like an idea too! anyway, I had to force close the app and open it again for the approval to appear . but by that time my payment had expired... dreadful!

When searching current account transactions android phone, you are limited to searching one month at a time, requiring me to repeatedly press "Go Further Back" to include earlier transactions. Ie, searching back for four years, would require clicking the button 48 times!!. This process is inefficient and frustrating. My other banking app allows me to specify a date range, such as one year, a custom range, or even "All History" Ie I can instantly search my entire history back more than 15 years!

At last! No more faffing about. As simple to use on a tablet as to use on my desktop, without the boot-up wait! Simple, clear instructions or easy access to customer service, I'm pleased to say, and I would give 9ut of 10, there is always room to improve! since I wrote this, I have had more to do, and I find the extra services extremely useful and easy to use. I would recommend Halifax to anyone looking to open a new or first banking account!

Don't get clear warning or comms about fees or charges etc beforehand. Giving me no opportunity to rectify. Can't find transactions or balance going back beyond 12 months to verify the charges. Contacted via the app chat, it failed every time i tried to log back in, causing the customer service rep to time out and close my chat. Turned out there was no fee. so the app initially gave me the wrong information. Not to mention all the latency and log in fails even though I used biometrics.

Very good so far. It can be a pain at times when inputting information, say for a bank transfer, and you have to switch between apps to get the info and Halifax logs you out for doing so.. I mean it's great for security but also slightly inconvenient. It would be good if it gave you a time limit rather than automatically log you out every time you leave the app.

At a glance, it's very easy to differentiate between the money that's come into and goes out of your account, because it is highlighted in bold when it comes in. Looking at individual months is easy, as you can swipe sideways on the top tabs, instead of constantly scrolling down your statement to the month you want. I would say it's an easy app to navigate.

Easy to use. There was a fault on registering. I asked for my mobile to be called , I was given a four number code to enter. No call was made to the mobile but the screen said I had incorrectly entered the code. Had to wait for a posted OTP . Secure but slow. TSB app has this type of glitchiness too . I would reduce to three stars because DOB needed many many taps to enter using the calendar that was set up for babies and toddlers .

Functional but poor accessibility. They have done a weak job with the layout of text on the screen and use fixed row heights which don't change according to the actual height of the characters. This means if you have set your font size to anything other than "tiny" then the text is cut off halfway along the line and isn't readable. Halifax are simply not interested in addressing bugs when they are reported.

Still, great, easy to follow and simple to use which is particularly good for an OAP and when you are in a rush. Eveything is just a click away, it does everything I want it to with no problems. I particularly like the edit date feature, where you can choose the date for upcoming payments! Perhaps it would be nice if you √ßould set the date once chosen, for that month. Everything just gets easier, no matter what you want to to do, you can do it quickly. Gets better and batter.

A good app, but there's a current bug on android when using the 'next' button on the numeric keyboard - it logs you out. Very frustrating when making multiple payments. You have to remember to use the 'continue' button instead. This needs fixing.

Trying to register but one error message says "sorry we are having technical difficulties, please try later. Next doesn't recognise postcode. Then it says I can't have access because if the type if account I've got??????...whatever that means. Then after resetting password it doesn't recognise the password I've just reset !!!!!!!! Awful experience

Update 10 Nov 25. The alerts for payments stopped fraud on our accts. Having pending payments from several diff hardware stores around the USA (we are in NE England, UK, it was around 2200hrs local). If you don't use a banking app with alerts please think about using, even got my mam to use age of 78. Easy to use, makes managing accounts very easy.

Many of my purchases are in Euros and sometimes in US Dollars. There is no indication in the Halifax app regarding the original amount charged in the currency in which it was bought. Together with the fact that the companies themselves deliberately, I think, present the bills under a different name as well, this all makes it extremely difficult to follow a particular transaction. More information, ie, the original charge and the original vendor name should be in the entry for that charge.

after a new update, the app seems to have put in their own keyboard! the new keyboard doesn't have symbols or lowercase letters, my password has both of these and I cannot enter the password I set up the account with, i won't be able to access my account without resetting it to just letters and numbers making it less secure! this is the most counter intuitive update ever! please fix this and let it use my phone's keyboard as I cannot access my app!

I should not have to go through several pages of Halifax service adverts to get to my account page. There should be an option to view or not view these! The home page is now ridiculously busy, there's so much extra tripe squeezed in that I start having to look for my actual account. Every single time I log in there's something else that pops up to click on before even having access to my account, much like going into the bank...No I do not want to be accosted at the entry!

Very easy to use. Straightforward to open savings accounts with good explanations on which may be best for you. I have been using the Halifax Mobile Banking App for some years and there are options for many services. I have been unfortunate in being scammed and defrauded. The Fraud team were amazing at putting these issues right. They were professional, non-judgmental and supportive throughout.

has silly restrictions on password contents and doesn't properly report that (if I include some characters the app says it is currently offline) and uses cumbersome memorable word as part of authentication. Also, trying to report this in the app using the "Provide app feedback" link ironically leads to a "Sorry, something unexpected happened" error.

Please can you make it so the app doesn't sign you out when you switch to another app, if someone sends you their bank details on a message you can't pay them, because as soon as you fill in one part, like the sort code and then you go back to the message to get the account number the Halifax app signs you out ü§¨

This current App has a convoluted route to Halifax bank contact details, omitting telephone numbers. Not all queries can be settled online. A quick phone call would suffice. Another fail is Cashback Extras. Now using company and brand large photos. Sorting category tabs have been removed resulting in one, long, scrolling list. Annoying at best, bad customer service at worst.

I needed to pay my credit card so jumped straight into the banking app, put in my memorable info and selected my credit card. I decided to pay this month from my savings account as I might need a little extra in my current account. I chose the pay or transfer option and off I went, only a couple more steps and it was done. Even received a notification saying it has gone through ok.

Handy app for checking accounts after certain transactions, but it does not work reliably with poor internet speed. Never had issues in UK but this app did not launch for me from Indonesia via wifi hotspot of my partners phone data sim (App Launch failed error code 7). Using the Halifax website directly works fine on same connection, making this app a bit pointless. It would be good if Halifax credit card sent emails when card is used (as Wise does), then checking the app would be unnecessary.

Buggy and repeatedly fails to open. This happened once in Central London and I thought it was because so many others were trying to use the network around me. Then it happened at home, where I have very strong Internet, again and again and when other banking apps worked just fine.

Does what it says on the tin I just wish they wouldn't keep,changing the layout. You open it up one day and a link you have got used to using has suddenly moved somewhere else. Paying a credit card is one example. It seems change for change sake sometimes.

Have used this for a good while now and find it very user friendly. The improvement whereby you can now review your correspondence without having to download each document and be signed out of the app is great and has taken my rating up to 5 stars. I will continue to monitor.

Has stopped consistent income notifications but persists with sending notifications about cashback extras with no way to turn them off, and cashback menu has become cumbersome and time consuming to use. Also could not get on even to check my account number while on mobile data.

Complete PITA when trying to download statements/letters. Previously they just downloaded straight to my phone. Now I have to select an app to handle the download. This results in me being logged out of the Halifax app meaning I have to log back in for each download. Otherwise an excellent app, it makes it really easy to manage my accounts, transfer money etc

After years, the notifications still don't work, and the notification feedback to let them know still gives a error. Not good for a bank to use such a bad software development team but that's Halifax unfortunately. With the amount of reoccurring bugs that keep needing to be fixed after updates shows there is inadequate testing also, if any. Advice: Remove all the features that don't work until you have at least a sub-standard development team who can handle them and implement a testing process.

An absolute rubbish app! I'm logged in! Why in the name of everything Holly do I have to put my password in to set up a standing order? And why, when I have regular payments that have been going out for YEARS does this rubbish app tell me that it can't show up in my upcoming payments because it doesn't show as a pattern?

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE give us control over taking the photo when depositing a cheque. It's REALLY annoying to have the app try to take it automatically because it ALWAYS gets it wrong and I end up having to try 7 or 8 times!. Just let me line everything up first and then let me press a button to capture.
Very quick and efficient. After dealing with other banks online Halifax stands out for easiness and speed. Type in three numbers, that's it! You're in. No trouble at all. Excellent!

Easy to use, perfect for everyday banking and keeping track of spending. It enables opening of savings accounts without having to apply in branch. It's slao useful for keeping a track of a mortgage. Bank transfers are easy and have a proviso to check if the details are correct before transferring funds. Insurance, loans and car finance can all be arranged via the app.

Great app when it works but frequently I get issues with the app actually loading up. Whether it's maintenance or something else I don't know but it's rather annoying especially when you've got money to send and take care of your finances.

I was worried about using banking. i can now check how my account works and be able to transfer money from one account to another. I just need to be more confident in searching for how to change or put stop and account. otherwise, I'm getting used to phone banking. Still missing not coming into the to see the Staff. Very helpful and patient. Thank you

The Halifax app is smooth, reliable, and packed with features that make everyday banking a breeze. I love how easy it is to check balances, manage payments, and even freeze my card if needed. The fingerprint login is a great touch for both speed and security. One small issue I‚Äôve noticed: when the app is closed but still running in the background, the preview screen can show sensitive info like my account number and balance. It would be great if this could be hidden for privacy.

The app is extremely simple to use but also gives additional security for card payments from your account. I take it for granted now, but on reflection, I realise banking would be more complicated without the app.

I tried to leave feedback about notifications in the app. I got to 37% then received an error message. please fix this. I want notifications about card payments but not direct debits. Please add this as an option. Thank you.

Im having trouble with the app, it's really slow to open (even though it's updated and using the latest version) it sometimes just didn't open, or will see it's loading for minutes on end. I also am having problems with the approve in app for payments. I don't know where to find this in the app as it doesn't seem to pop up conveniently like it does with other banks. it's very glitchy and not the best

Easy to access and use. You can view all your accounts in one place as well. You can also set up new accounts but some accounts aren't available online. It's a lot easier than going into a branch and having to make an appointment to set up a new account anyway!

I can't login without a letter. The call option resets the app creating a login loop. The Id option says 5 minutes and doesn't complete, and the use other device just sends it to my current device. The text message option that's on the website isn't available.

This app is good but frustratingly asks for two sign-ins (biometric). I check my @FastBudget app to see make to Halifax from ‚Ç¨uros and added the ¬£terling the conversion. the apps need another login! Could you give a list of from 1 minutes to 5 minutes as an option please?

Ridiculous, kept telling me I was inputting my information wrong so I used a stylus to make sure I wasn't making any mistakes now I'm locked out of my account and have to wait 7 days for a code to arrive in the post. What a joke.

I have been locked out since they brought out the new app months ago, It's been a total nightmare. I tried logging in this morning I couldn't believe that it finally worked. Tried this afternoon its locked me out again. I've had enough, I'm finished with halifax. Zero stars ‚≠ê

Last time I reviewed this app I gave it 3 stars but now I have upgraded it to 5 stars because the features I complained about have been revised by the developers. I find the app easy to use and it is usually operational even though I am using it internationally from different countries

Infuriating. When attempting to register on android it asked me for memorable information but the next button was greyed out. It was only after giving up and using an iPad there was info saying I needed to add a number into this field. So I put the iPad away and tried again adding a number, and it worked, but to add insult, it said it would send a code to my parent or guardian. I haven't needed one of them for decades.
Abysmal app. Twenty times, I've tried to log in today. Twenty times, it won't work. Close branches and force us on to online banking with substandard apps. Abysmal, that's all it can be described as.

This app used to be very quick and responsive until the update that caused the boot screen to display other banks which have been merged with, is anyone really interested in this as I can see this has slowed down the boot time for me which is annoying when I'm on a busy schedule and quickly want to see my balance.

Every time I open the app it's trying to sell me products. Try do it every 4th or 5th logon possibly but every time, REALLY. Interest rates are rubbish and only semi decent one has no withdrawals. I have Cancer and don't know if I'll be here next year. Surely there must be an exception in these cases.

The app works fine, but please stop the stupid messages every time I open it! I don't care what you want to tell me, I don't want to tap through 3 pages of useless junk, I just want to see my bank balance.

Not a good experience with customer service. Couldn't direct transfer someone today, so rang up customer service as I've had issues with my card before. First call got 5 mins in and they seemed to hang up on me halfway through helping. Second call got 20 minutes in, I was put on hold saying they'd be back but didn't come back after 10 minutes of waiting but there was an annoying beep every few seconds. Neither one called me back. Well annoying.

title: Messenger Kids ‚Äì The Messaging
description:
Made for Kids. Controlled by Parents.
 
Parent Dashboard:
Parents can manage their kids' contact list, and monitor messages on the Messenger Kids app. When kids block contacts, parents are notified.

Fun Filters:
Kid-friendly filters, reactions, and sound effects make video chats with friends and family even better. 

Worry Free:
Parents can set usage limits when it‚Äôs bedtime, and there are no in app-purchases or ads.

Creative Convos:
Stickers, GIFs, emojis, and drawing tools give kids more ways to express themselves.

Easy Start:
No phone number required.

We‚Äôre always working to improve Messenger Kids. If you‚Äôd like to share any feedback with us or for more information, visit messengerkids.com.
descriptionHTML:
Made for Kids. Controlled by Parents.

Parent Dashboard:
Parents can manage their kids' contact list, and monitor messages on the Messenger Kids app. When kids block contacts, parents are notified.

Fun Filters:
Kid-friendly filters, reactions, and sound effects make video chats with friends and family even better.

Worry Free:
Parents can set usage limits when it‚Äôs bedtime, and there are no in app-purchases or ads.

Creative Convos:
Stickers, GIFs, emojis, and drawing tools give kids more ways to express themselves.

Easy Start:
No phone number required.

We‚Äôre always working to improve Messenger Kids. If you‚Äôd like to share any feedback with us or for more information, visit messengerkids.com.
summary: Fun, free app that lets kids video call and message family and close friends.

scraped_reviews.content: Went through the process of setting the account and adding people, but the home screen is blank. The people added, though we cant see them, can message my kid, but my kid can't send messages out without using the notification of receiving a message that only drops down for a couple seconds before it's gone. It like this across three different devices. In the parent portal, I can see who has messaged my kid, but not what. Even the "Help Center" comes up blank.

Great in theory, but I have 2 kids, and I can't toggle between the two profiles. They both worked great for 1 day and since I cannot get in to view my daughters profile, it keeps kicking me out with an Error reading "Session Expired" and prompts me to log in again, if I select OK, it keeps repeating the same crash.... I'm very disappointed I can not access both of my kids' profiles.

Great! I like it, but I just can't get notifications for messages. I recently messed with my settings and finally got my phone to ring for calls when it's off. I can get notifications for pictures, but I can't get notifications for just messages. I only have one friend and not knowing and not responding to messages has made our friendship drift apart. this has been a HUGE problem for me for over 4 months and I can't fix it through any of my settings.

this app it an amazing app that allows you to message/call friends and personally i find it very helpful but one thing that I don't have is the ability to save videos. idk if this is just for me or anyone else but it would be way more helpful if I could save a video like how I save pictures, and another thing is for my pfp, like I can't turn the picture so most of the time I pick one and it will just turn. Can you please update it plsü•≤üòÅ other than those, It is very great üëç. kind regards.

It's so great, although it has its glitches. One big issue is that sometimes if I haven't talked to someone in a while their profile disappears and after a while it comes back which is odd. Love all the filters, you can change the color of your text, there's no limit to how much you can change your profile picture, which is nice because I use Messenger daily. Btw I got an idea--what if you could change the background for the text chats? That'd be amazing! Thx for making this for us kids‚ù£‚ù§

The app is overall great, sure ot can be a bit glitchy here and there, but the bugs are rarely even big. The only thing that's really annoying, is that on some devices you can have a full theme, on others you can decorate it a little bit, and on aome (like mine) you're stuck with a dark blue, amd cannot change it. I've tried many different ways, but it just doesn't work. It's not that much of a big deal, but it's just a really annoying bug :/

I love messenger kids, but lately it's been really really glitchy. Can someone please work on fixing the bugs? Specifically, when somebody sends me a bunch of photos at once, no matter which one I click on, it only shows me the first photo they sent. It makes it really hard to see photos. Also something that's really bothering me is that certain people's profile pictures go blank, and won't show up, which is confusing, because everybody looks the same. Thanks for whoever is reading this

I am a child using this app, and I think it is good for younger kids. It's not really ideal for older children, (teens, adults) but it's really good for parents concerned about what their child is texting. Parents can change settings, like making the child unable to see links (to maybe innopropriate sites) and they can also decline random people from being able to text their child. Personally, I switched over to texting normally just for privacy reasons. Very good app!

Nice app. I do wish there were more options in the drawing thing. Stuff like an entire color palette to choose from instead of limited colors. A paint bucket tool, and a way to zoom in and out on your drawing. Also with profile pictures you gotta take a picture right then and there, you cant pick one from your gallery. Other than that I recommend this. Gave a good day

I LOVEE this app! I use it daily! It helps me communicate with my friends over summer break, when they move, heck even when it's just a random day when we want to hangout but can't go visit eachother! Some things I would like to see in the future tho, like screensharing! Or maybe we could choose our own ringtone on it? These are just some ideas, I will update in the future, love the game tho! 100% recommend, also a lot of my texts takes a long time to send even when I have 4 bars, pls fix that.

The app is great! Its very, very rarely laggy, and messages travel fast. But I would like to suggest some features, 1 when you type an emoji like this :) it comes out like this üôÇ, so it would be nice if there was a setting in your profile where you could turn it off. And 2, it would be nice you you could share your screen in a video call, for example if you wanted to show someone something funny or cool that happend in a game you could call them and show them without having to screen record.

I think this app is awesome and it helped me connect and reunite with a friend I haven't seen in a while but the only issue(s) I have are that it takes so long to just connect to a call let alone only then starting to actually call the person after like 2 minutes of waiting. I am also experiencing issues as to why we cant type too long of texts. I think users should be able to write long paragraphs instead of having to do separate texts if one is too long. The last issue I'm having is with the voice messages, you see, the person that I am communicating with could have the absolute best wifi in the world and I could too but the voice chats are extremely glitchy, laggy, choppy, and sometimes freeze. But overall this a mediocre app. My parents also like the fact that they can track my activity! Maybe if you just try to make the network a little more stable and fix some bugs and issues it'll be five stars in no time but for now that's all I have to say. (But still an amazing app)

It's actually quite nice!! There's cool filters, it seems safe, I just like not having to use a number for texting and calling But, there's some bugs and stuff. Also, I was unhappy when I found out there are only certain things that my friend can do on IOS. Like, voice filters. I tried alot of times to do it, but wouldn't happen. Could you please make it even, if you can?

I love this app. It is such a safe way to communicate with others. You can call, facetime, text, send voice clips all in one app. Only thing is how you cant pick a photo from your gallery for your profile picture. However, this app is safe, and does a very nice job helping kids start conversations and keeping it up to date! You can have multiple acounts for your kids and easily switvh beteween them. And, best of all, your kid can't do anything bad because you see everything they write and do!

Such a great app. I call my friends all the time because of quarantine. The only problem I have is that there's only face time. I want to just call my friends. Other than that great app! Keep up the incredible work! Edit: So I also have another problem. So when I want to change my profile pic, I can only take a photo and can't got one from my gallery. Please fix this issue but so far INCREDIBLE JOB!!!!! You guys need to make a Facebook kids app! Hope you have an amazing day! üòäüòÅüòä

When I go to verify the account every time I get the same error, "Login Error. We were unable to log in your child. Try again?" I have been trying to get my son on for 2 days now, and it has been the most frustrating thing ever!!!! I have tried unistalling, reinstalling, clearing cache, changing permissions and settings etc. on both my phone and his tablet, but absolutely nothing works. Complete waste of time! This app is a joke!

This app is amazing! I can get in contact with my friends and family efficiently. This is really fun with all of the little stickers, camera add-ons and small minigames you can play with your friend(s). There is only 1 problem I have came across of, and that is when I want to change my profile picture. There is the option of taking a picture, but I was trying to get a photo from my gallery for my profile picture but it doesn't work on the phone I currently have (that's android) iPhones work only.

So I don't have a phone, so this is the only way to communicate because other friends have it. And whenever I call one of my friends, the audio will go in and out so I can't hear half of the sentence. Another problem is that there is no warning button when you click sign out. So I got logged out for accidentally tapping that button. Ad I you don't know your parents Facebook, it will take a while to get logged in. Please fix this problem, because then I could give a 4 or five star rating.

I love using this app to be able to talk to my friends. Especially since COVID because we havent been able to see eachother as much. One problem that only happens to me mostly is that my app doesnt get the updates as quick. It will normally get it around 2 days after or one day. Also I would like to be able to choose a profile picture from my gallery. I also dont always get notifications when somebody calls or messages me. If you could fix this that would be great!

Does allow me to add friends or family, gives an error. Keeps logging out and giving errors when trying to log in Request one-time password. It either doesn't work or doesn't get sent There is 0 help or customer service. You can go on the help link, but it's like typing into the abyss, no email verification it was sent, received, no follow up,nothing, you just are left hoping someone read it and you keep trying, hoping it works next time For a kids' app,it's very frustrating, to say the least.

I think the concept of this app is great. My oldest (8) has already unsuccessfully tried to create her own Facebook page as she sees "everyone is using it" and naturally wants to be a part of it. This allows her to feel like she is a part of it but I have peace of mind it's essentially safe. I would like to see some more features within the app. Right now as her parent I can approve who she can and can't talk to as well as log in to check up if I feel necessary. I think having some type of screen time control, maybe even tips or a tutorial on messaging etiquette for the kids, and more marketing so their friends are more likely to have an account!

Great app! I love texting and calling my friends over quarantine and all the cool filters. Although I have a few suggestions. For one, I like to video chat my friends, but sometimes I wish I could just call with out video. Also, maybe have polls about whether a filter can leave or stay, or about choosing which one should be a new one. Other than that, I don't really have any complaints. I suggest it to some friends of mine, and a few actually joined because of me! Great work!!

This app is amazing and it's fun! Easy for kids to communicate with friends and family. The reason with the 4 stars is sleep mode, when I'm in a video call with my friends it auto hangs up which is annoying. And when messenger re-enables in the morning at 8:00 am it won't let me send messages because of the sleep mode, and so I have to wait until 9:00 am for it to calibrate properly. Get rid of the sleep mode plz! Could've given it 5 stars if it didn't have a sleep mode.

I am a kid who is using this app, and it's really good! Here are some suggestions!: 1. Please add screen sharing. It would be a lot easier to show what you are talking about in a game or in general! 2. Make it so the call doesn't disconnect when I enter a game. It only happens with my cousin so it might be her McDonald's wifi, if its not then it's her tablet because it doesn't disconnect with anyone else. 3. Make it so you can save videos. That's all have a lovely day/night!!üòò

I really like this app so far. It's easy for my 3 year old to use and easy so far for me to monitor every conversation. The app is completely free and my kid is able to talk to only her friend and family. I definitely have and would recommend this app to anyone. Best part is there's no ads, I get to see all of my kid's conversations, and every picture received, sent, or deleted.

My family has been using this app for some years and it was working pretty good up until Sept '24. Now, I can't login on certain devices. I keep getting stuck in a loop. I've restarted the app, device, uninstall, and reinstalled the app. Nothing works. There isn't anyway to contact their support team either. I'm only giving it 1 star in hopes of this helping this particular bug get resolved.

Pretty good app overall, but I have an issue that's REALLY been bugging me. The video playback. It's not bad for videos that had been sent recently, but I tried to play videos that had been sent a few months back and they wouldn't play. They just had the little loading symbol. I waited for TEN MINUTES and it didn't load, and I tried many times. Very frustrating, please fix this. üôÅ

This app is great but sometimes when I FaceTime my friends it freezes. Besides that it's a great way to communicate with your friends and visit. I go on Messenger kids like 3 times a day cause it's so much fun! There is so many different effects you can use to have fun and take funny photos and send to your friends. Also if you go to the top of your screen and go to play a drawing game there are 3 options that you can choose from to draw and you send what you draw so your friends can guess.

This is a really good app. It's fun and I like the fact that you can send pictures, videos, and gifs. The filters are cool, and wish you could like favorite them so you could always have certain filters even when it went away. But it kinda sucks that you would have to block someone if you want them to stop messaging. There should be a setting where there's a limit of the amount of text send at one period. And it does require wifi. That sucks because you couldn't text at certain places well g'bye

I can't login due to the login loop other users have described. I enter login info, it sends me the authentication code, I enter the code, and then it asks me to log in again. I've used the app successfully before on this very device. But after logging out & trying to log back in, it doesn't work anymore. Uninstalling & reinstalling didn't fix the problem, nor did clearing data. I'll update this rating to five stars when I can actually log in again.

I love this app! You can chat with friends or family, call, play games, and take funny photos! But you may be wondering why I gave this four stars. Well first of all when it shows the three dots when someone is texting well they are not really texting sometimes. Also same with when they are "online" when they could be out of the app. Second of all when you are on a call..once I was on a call with my friend and when they hung up it still showed I was still on the call. I hope this was helpful.

Its a fun way to conect, but it gets glitchy, and the game frustrates me because it's really slow. Filters and extra little games are really fun, there's just not a lot of them. Edit: they added way more games to play, and I spend a lot of time on this. It's really fun, and there is new filters ver often. It's a great fun way to connect, this should get 5 stars

This is a great resource. However, it disconnects and glitches all the time. Here are some ways I've found to fix the issue of texts not sending or calls not connecting: 1: Try turning off wifi and closing down the app, then turn wifi back on and open the app. 2: Try calling the person your texts are not sending to or your calls are not connecting to. Stop the call almost right after you start it. If you still can't connect, it may be the other person's connection.

It was working at first, now it's sending me through a neverending cycle of logging me out and logging back in. I have 2 child profiles and when I want to switch profiles to another child, I receive an error message that something went wrong and to ask a grown-up for help. Then I have to through the whole password process AGAIN!! I can't get back in! It's the most frustratjng experience ever because it's an unending loop and I don't know how to break it. Seriously FB?! What is this???

junk app as of late. Can't even authorize or log in anymore. Just says there's an error. have tried clearing cache and deleting data. when it did work, it still didn't work. the page was blank and no new updates were showing. it would show a quick notification and then it's gone. not sure why this is so buggy.

Lovely app, very nice customization, fun games. But it has been acting up lately. I cannot view my photos I sent or recently took and have to close the whole app. I also have trouble making group chats because it says that my friends do not have eachother's number, even though they clearly do.

This app has stuff that are not fair And it works better on phone then tablet as far as I know. But I'm hoping that some stuff could be fixed. Also the call keeps ending when I join a game with my friend, And it's so annoying because we ALWAYS have to call each other back. So please fix that to.

suddenly stopped working. was using it then all of a sudden it needed me to relogin and now is telling me when I go to login on the tablets that I'm not allowed to log into that app. wth. I'm the only parent that set their accounts up 4 years ago..and suddenly it won't let me log them in anywhere.

I would recommend this app for your child because it is truly amazing and has very expressive and unique features! I have a child that I currently have using this app and they say they use it every day to call friends and play games. I love how my child can't just randomly add people and they must have permission for me in order to add friends. I also love how I can see all of their conversations and their friends list and what they do. I overall think it is a lovely and unique app.

doesn't work in redmi note 10 5g. it always crash when in video call. app will forcibly close after answering a video call. i always send the report to meta.. but till now we have the same issue. all necessary permission are allowed, we also try to install and uninstall but no luck. same issue occured. but in other phone it works perfectly fine. also if not video call, only regular no speaker button.

I love this app so much but it keeps glitching and it's not as fun as before. Everytime I'm on another app or just on messenger kids while on a call and I touch a specific part of a screen, the screen turns black, it also happens to my friends :(. I also feel like there should just be a calling option and not just video calls cause sometimes I can't just video call. anyways, I'm done now! please fix the bugs!

the concept for this is great! which is why it got 2 stars instead of 1. since I downloaded it, my own Facebook now doesn't load properly. I've tried everything I can think of - clearing cached info, rebooting the phone, rebooting the apps, etc. My phone is brand new, lots of storage and memory available. Even so, it's lagging like a 1999 Dell now, lol. Every so often Facebook works fine again, but the moment I click any notifications related to the Messenger Kids app, the whole thing crashes

This app is a very good app for kids or even pre teens like me to talk with family and friends. There's a bunch of games to play and you can take pictures too. But there is some glitchs... like when I am on face time sometimes my screen goes black. Also I can't see some of my friends profile pictures sometimes. And sometimes my texts just don't go though even if we both have internet. I bet it's just some glitches but pls fix it, ty. I would recommend this app. Ty byeeee

half of the time we use it and send a message, it says "unable to be sent". this happens on my phone off wifi and her tablet on wifi. clearing the app cache and storage, uninstalling and reinstalling never works. then all of a sudden it'll start working again. this happens every month at least and I can't find a fix for this anywhere... disappointing.

Perfect for kids! It's fun to use, has a lot of abilities,and has fun colors! My only problem is that when I'm video calling it won't have the option to turn my screen on( I can't make it so that other people can see my face, like on the second picture of the description.)its vary annoying. Please help me fix itüôèüèΩ!edit: I cant do sound effects with my voice message and it's very annoying. I am thinking of uninstalling for other reasons to. I am going down to 4 stars from 5.

I really like this app sometimes there could be some bad connection and I did have to start all over but it was a great way to call and text your friends there are many options you can choose for this app from calling to text messaging and even sending little photos or videos I love to draw little pictures and send them to my friends for fun

It won't let me send any pictures.I've tright and it won't let me so i Have tried to show my friend something And it didn't let me send a picture. Whenever I tapped on it to send it It just wouldn't send it. It also has this glitch that it says. My friends are active when they're not. But even though it does that I still like it if it weren't for the glitches and the picture problem Then I would rate it five star Because it's really fun. And if you don't know how to spell there's something setup

I love this app because I can message my friends without a phone number however the reason I'm giving it a 4 is because I can't send videos from my device anymore. When I try to send it just says (Unable to send!) in yellow and I think it's a bug in the the app. I wish Messenger kids would fix this and the fact that I used to be able to send video's is really annoying. But if you want a app where you can text your friends without a phone number this is for you!

Cool concept, but the problem is there are too many bugs. i downloaded it for my son, and every time I add a contact, I have to uninstall the app and reinstall it just for him to be able to see the new contact. then when he tries to do video calls, half of the video calls do not properly connect that they can see a video of him or hear him.

This is the best app ever! There are games, preset questions for each day, fun emojis, and preset responses when you can't pick up or write a message. However, it is quite glitchy with messaging and calling. Sometimes, when you leave the app, your friend can't hear you. Messages sometimes never go through. Messager kids is such a cool app regardless of the glitches!

title: iFIT for Equipment
description:
iFIT is your all-in-one fitness app, bringing world-class workouts and expert trainers to your mobile device. Whether you‚Äôre at home, at the gym, or on the move, iFIT helps you build strength, improve endurance, boost flexibility, and stay motivated on your fitness journey.

Access over 10,000 on-demand workouts across cardio, strength training, HIIT, yoga, meditation, walking, running, and more. Train indoors or outdoors, no equipment required for many workouts. With iFIT AI Coach, your fitness plan adapts to you, delivering personalized daily recommendations based on your progress, preferences, and goals.

KEY FEATURES

- Global Workouts: Work out with expert iFIT Trainers in stunning locations around the world, from the beaches of Hawaii to the peaks of the Swiss Alps.
- 10,000 workouts (and counting!): Tap into the world‚Äôs largest outdoor workout library, with progressive series led by expert trainers who guide you to results.
- Train anywhere: Access workouts on or off your equipment. Wherever you are, you‚Äôll alway have the full iFIT experience along with bodyweight, yoga, meditation, and cross-training.
- iFIT AI Coach*: Let your fitness journey unfold with workout recommendations tailored to your fitness goals and schedule, along with accountability and motivation.
- Up to 5 users with iFIT Pro: Share your plan with your family, each with their own personalized experience and workout tracking.
- Progressive, trainer-led programs: Take the guesswork out of your goals with multi-week programs that move you toward your fitness dreams, from running a 5K, trying a full marathon, or just improving overall strength. 
- Real-time progress tracking: Get insights into your personal workout stats and metrics in the app or on your iFIT-enabled machine.
- Wear OS Support: Track your heart rate through your workouts with the new Wear OS app.
Multi-modality options: Whether you use a treadmill, bike, elliptical, rower, or no equipment at all, iFIT has workouts for every type of training.‚Ä®‚Ä®‚Ä®

Subscription Options

Choose the iFIT plan that fits your fitness needs:

iFIT Train: $14.99/month or $143.99/year with access for 1 user
iFIT Pro: $39.99/month or $394.99/year with access for up to 5 users

Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the billing period. Manage your subscription in your account settings.

Paid iFIT Pro membership required with equipment purchase and to access content and features.  Membership auto-renews unless cancelled in advance.  Free iFIT account, agreement to terms, and wi-fi required to operate equipment.

*AI Coach provided via in-app messaging (see here for regional availability). Existing users who enrolled prior to September 2025 and users who opt-in after that date may continue using AI Coach via a text-based service (US only); msg & data rates may apply.
