summary: Immersive workouts for treadmills, bikes, ellipticals, rowers, strength training

scraped_reviews.content: The app is ok. But when I needed to report a problem none of the drop down menus worked. Thn I went to feed back and same problem there. I also submitted an issue through email and they did respond initially but I've updated the issue and no response. Edit. So they emailed me a couple days after this post and asked if I could send some pictures, I had told them they were attached to another ticket. No response for a couple more days, the mschi did it again so I took a picture. Still no response
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Kevin Mercille, We appreciate your feedback regarding the issues with the drop-down menus and the lack of response after your initial contact. Please give our team a call at 1-833-680-IFIT (4348) and we would be happy to assist you. Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: Been using the app for a while now, the workouts and trainers are great, especially love that it connects to my treadmill so I don't need to manually change the speed and incline. However, it sometimes is a little glitchy to start the videos. Today, I woke up at 5am to do a workout and it wouldn't load. Confirmed my Internet was good, reinstalled the app, restarted my phone, tried installing the app on a different device, nothing worked. I could have slept another hour
scraped_reviews.replyContent: amanda meininger We are glad that you are enjoying our workouts and trainers! But we are sorry to hear that your workout wouldn‚Äôt load this morning. We understand how frustrating this is when you are ready to work out. Please reach out to us at my.iFIT.com with more information so we can take a closer look at this. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: I can't login anymore! It is so annoying! I enter my password, prove I am a human... i get the "that's correct" and "success" notes, then "oops, something went wrong". Tried to reset my password and it says "can't fetch the email" or something to that effect. I have checked my login and password; I am using the correct ones. yet I can't login, can't reset my password.... ugh! Happy to revise review once the bug is fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Marie-Gabrielle Conser Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We understand how this is frustrating, especially when you can‚Äôt get to your workouts. Please reach out to us at my.iFIT.com so we can address this and get you back into the app. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: Update 2025: can't even open strength workouts now. tried clearing cache etc. Epic fail. I thought it couldn't get worse, but it did. I'd contact support if this wasn't such a regular thing. What a waste. Almost looking forward to the machine breaking so I have a reason to get out of this terrible app ecosystem. Will miss the trainers.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: AI ITrac Thank you for your update. We appreciate your feedback regarding the software issues. We‚Äôre glad to hear you‚Äôre enjoying the virtual trainers and machines. Your concerns are valuable, and we‚Äôll share them with our team for improvement. If you need assistance, please reach out to our support team at my.iFIT.com. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: HOW can you lock connected apps behind the paywall!! Absolute scum behavior. I can't even do a manual workout and export it because of this BS. Edit: Despite that, there is still hope. I don't want to mention the name of the app since iFit is reading, but it allows for connecting to equipment through an alternative method. Doesn't make this app any less annoying for people who want the bare minimum-workout stats and exporting them. Quite literally useless without a subscription.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Joel Pimenta Thank you for your feedback regarding our available membership options. We appreciate this input and have passed your review on to our management teams. We care about your satisfaction and love to hear our users feedback. You‚Äôre welcome to contact us at my.iFIT.com if you have other input. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: I think iFit is purely in maintenance mode now. No new features. Connected apps are completely gone. No workout summary. No series completion summary. No app notifications when milestones are met. No badges when challenges are completed. I honestly think they are working with a skeleton crew and not innovating/updating any longer. Perhaps they are just looking for a buyout. I am really upset I bought a three year plan. I can foresee barebones features in the next year or so.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Tim Kosma, We appreciate your feedback regarding the Google Fit connection and the challenges with password management. Our team is currently working through the Google certification process now! It‚Äôs concerning to hear about your experience with support, and we value your insights. Please feel free to reach out at my.iFIT.com. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: Not impressed with the app usability. BODi (Beach Body on Demand) app is way more usable. iFIT app makes it difficult to sort through and find a program. When you join it, it sometimes won't show up in the "for you" category, so you end up having to find it again. When I want to pause the workout, it doesn't allow me to resume it for later (anything longer than 10 minutes, it will have to start over). You can't fast forward if you had to restart from the beginning. Save rate is terrible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Camille Bowers, We appreciate your feedback about the usability challenges you're facing with the app. It's important for us to hear how the sorting and pausing features are impacting your experience. Your insights are valuable, and we encourage you to share more details at my.iFIT.com to help us understand better. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: The update went from poor to terrible. The trainers and workouts are outstanding, but the technology is what earns the poor review. The data you can see from your workouts is limited to total calories burned...that's it! At least before the update you could see average/maximum heart rate. I called customer service and they told me to reinstall the app, which didn't solve the problem. I will keep subscribing because John Peel is amazing but he's the main reason I stay.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Brian Cohen We are glad that you find our trainers and workouts to be outstanding, although we are very sorry that you are unable to see your workout data after our recent update. Our developers are working hard to address this to get things working properly. You can find us at my.iFIT.com if you have other input for us. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: I really like this iFit app and iFit products in general. I primarily use it with equipment that cannot be paired (an old rowing machine) but I have had opportunities to use an iFit elliptical machine and that is even better. but even without pairing, the app works great at leading me through my routine. I also like the stretching, strength, yoga, and meditation workouts. my only complaint is that often, after the cool down of my workout, the progress fails to save and I get errors.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: This definitely sounds like a frustrating issue and we appreciate you taking the time to alert us James. We want to make this situation right for you as soon as possible so please contact us at (833) 680-4348 or Support@iFIT.com. A customer service agent will be able to assist you with a fix.

scraped_reviews.content: Buggy terrible app. Workouts frequently don't get saved. I've been using it 4 days a week for 3 months and it says i only have 13 workouts, a pathetic save success rate. Will often crash in the middle of a workout. It's not uncommon for the app to lock up at launch and just show a black screen. It's unfortunate that it's the only app that works with my treadmill.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Brian B The experience you shared doesn‚Äôt meet our service standards. We would like to look into this and get things working as they are designed to. Please contact us at my.iFIT.com so we can learn more about your experience and help you. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: The trainers and workouts are excellent. The app needs work. It's challenging to sort through what is presented on start up and find the workouts I've "joined." Also, why can't I stream to my laptop or TV? Why is it confined to a phone (completely inadquate IMO for following a workout) or tablet? Tablet support is better than phone and fine for machine workouts, but want to use the non-equipment workouts on laptop with big monitor or stream to a smart TV.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Cynthia Hooper, We're glad to hear you love the trainers and workouts! Your feedback on app navigation and streaming is appreciated, and we‚Äôre dedicated to improving your experience, especially for larger screens. For more assistance, please reach out at my.iFIT.com. Thank you! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: Could be better. The app itself and the content are pretty decent. However if you have a routine you want to repeat and use over again the favorites feature is weak. If you're trying to use it on a TV or through a Roku it literally takes minutes for the favorite screen to load even if you only have a couple of saved routines. It's like they stuck the feature in there but don't really care how well it works.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Don Skaff, Thank you for your feedback about the favorites feature and loading times on Roku. It's wonderful to know you find the app and content decent! Your insights are truly valuable, and we‚Äôre committed to enhancing your experience. For further assistance, feel free to reach out at my.iFIT.com. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: For whatever reason I cannot connect my NordicTrack Rower to my Android phone via Bluetooth. I reset my phone, turned off/ on Bluetooth connection, uninstalled the ifit app, logged out of the app, and unplugged my equipment from the wall. I have tried everything. I reached out to customer service via chat and I was told nothing useful, so I think I will save my money and figure something else out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Shanna, We appreciate your effort in addressing the Bluetooth connection issue with your NordicTrack Rower. Our developers are aware of this problem and are working to address this as soon as possible. For more help, please contact us at my.iFIT.com. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: The iFit platform has always been hard to navigate, and it seems to get worse. I have to search for the series that I am currently working through. I may be working on 1 to 3 series at a time, but they all should be readily available and easy to find. Plus, you got rid of the Johnny Gale exercises. I loved his exercises and positive attitude. If it was not for the fact that you have elliptical equipment, I would be on a different platform. I like the workouts when I can find them.

The most recent update has made this almost unusable. The app successfully connects to and stays in sync with my treadmill roughly 50% of the time these days. And when it does connect it's a complete gamble on whether or not the heart rate monitor will be able to connect and enable me to use the smart adjust feature based on heart rate. Additionally, the chart visual that used to show the target heart rate no longer shows the target heart rate. In fact the chart is so small it is useless anyway.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sean We are sorry to hear that you have experienced connectivity problems between our app, your treadmill, and your heart rate monitor. We would like to look into this for you and get things working as they are designed to. Please contact us at my.iFIT.com so we can speak with you. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: I like that it keeps track of things. However, you must purchase training which really should be for free. After some time, you might get one or two free trainers, but that is it. Also, the app jumps off Bluetooth, and I have to start the app all over again. I lost time in training once or twice because of that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: DANCING IN THE BASEMENT We are glad that you like how our app keeps track of things for you. We appreciate your feedback regarding the free training available and the Bluetooth problems you have experienced. Your review has been passed on to our developers. If you would like to provide more information, contact us at my.iFIT.com. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: The trainers are great & come from varied backgrounds. I love getting to "travel the world" during my workouts and learn the history behind these locations & also life stories/journeys on the trainers. I do not like that I can no longer link my treadmill to the app. As much money as we spend on these machines we should be able to sync up for the duration of our ownership of said machines. Most people don't have thousands of expendable dollars to buy new machines every few years.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: R P, We appreciate your feedback on the trainers and the immersive workouts. It's wonderful to hear you enjoy the experience. We recognize your concerns about treadmill syncing and your desire for continued compatibility. Your thoughts are important to us, and we‚Äôre here to help!

scraped_reviews.content: The workouts are fine but what I really dislike are listed feature that aren't true. The website has links on how to setup Google Fit as a connected app but it's no offered in the application when you try. There is also links on how to setup a Google TV app but that seems to be false as well since there is no option to download the application on a Google TV. It feel like false advertisement.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Jerry Plotkin Thank you for your feedback. We are glad you enjoy our workouts, but we are sorry you feel the listed features are misleading. Unfortunately, Google Fit is no longer supported. We look forward to connecting to Health Connect in the future. Let us know if you have other concerns, you can contact us at my.iFIT.com. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: The updated app has issues. The overall timer doesn't sync with the elliptical, throughout the workout it jumps about 2 seconds ahead. At 30 mins it removes the top bar that shows the overall progress, when I tap the screen it says resume and when I hit resume it starts to lower the incline and resistance as if I'm starting over. It does the same if I start my workout before starting the app, unlike the old app. This feels like a downgrade if you've used the old app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: J Our developers are working quickly to address the problem of the timer not matching the workout time. We appreciate your input regarding this. We would like to learn more about the top bar being removed at 30 minutes. Please contact us at my.iFIT.com so we can speak with you and get things working properly. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: I like my pro-form machine but the app is very glitchy and fails to record about every 4th workout. If any other app was compatible with the machine I would delete this one in a second. also as far as I can tell its not possible to put your current weight into calorie calculations without the glitchy app running. it's really too bad because the machine itself is great.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: ‚Äã‚ÄãNaomi Rivera We are glad that your machine is great, although we are sorry that you have experienced glitches in our app and that it isn‚Äôt recording all of your workouts. This doesn‚Äôt meet our quality standards, please reach out to us at my.iFIT.com so we can learn more and get things working as they should. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: Since the update on July 7, the app has been absolutely terrible - it takes several attempts to connect the app to my machine, workouts stop part way and can't be restarted, and progress is not being recorded so workouts with 20+ minutes duration are just gone. As a long-term user, I am incredibly unhappy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Jacqui Thank you for being a long-term member of our iFIT family! We sincerely apologize that things are no longer working as they used to after our update. We can assure you that our developers have seen your review and are working to address this as soon as possible. If you require additional assistance, please visit my.iFIT.com. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: Best workout app that syncs to machines!! This app takes the guesswork out of a workout. Easy to install and sync seamlessly to each machine. Workouts flow with trainers speed and inclne without touching the controls. built-in AI feature adjusts the workouts based on personal fitness. Best app I've ever used at 50+ years young. And I love the trainers! i get to travel the wothe amount of fitness education along with geography, history, local. culture and so much more is unparalleled.

I have used the app working out on the same path for the last 2 years w/o issues. but since latest update i have problems every time. first 3 weeks constantly got a no internet message. while that has not shown up in the last week, app constantly goes into "buffering" and stops. I even reduced the video quality to lowest setting and get the same results.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: bob michaels, Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We appreciate your loyalty over the past two years. The issues you‚Äôre facing with buffering and connectivity are important, and we‚Äôre actively working on them. Your feedback is invaluable in helping us improve. You can always find us at my.iFIT.com Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: Frustration review. I used this app a few years back when I worked at a place that had the Freemotion equipment. Loved it. 5 stars when I am able to use it. Since then, membership options have changed and I signed up with the basic Training level. I discover it does not allow you to sign in on the equipment at this level. Alright...let me upgrade. Unable to. If I don't create a whole new account, I have to wait out the 30 day billing cycle. This is extremely frustrating.

I wish the app on the television was a better experience. it is difficult to navigate and find workouts. I really enjoy the app on my phone and the compatibility to my treadmill. This is really good all around. I do wish some of the workouts were harder. I do the advanced runs, and rarely do they go under a 9 minute mile on the program itself.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Morgan We are glad to hear that you enjoy our app on your phone, although we are sorry that you find the TV app difficult to navigate. We‚Äôll let our content team know that you would appreciate harder workouts. Thanks for being part of our iFIT family! If you ever have questions, please feel free to reach out to us at my.iFIT.com. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: Terrible experience. Tried to cancel a membership and there is not any customer service. Called their number during weekend hours since they no longer support email for customer service. No one answered during their supposed weekend support hours. Further, called during the week and still waiting to talk with someone after waiting on the phone for 30 minutes and it will likely be much longer. Basically, no customer service. Only use if you do not plan on canceling in the future.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Justin Ryan Carver We sincerely apologize that you haven‚Äôt received the assistance needed to cancel your membership. We appreciate this feedback and will pass your review on to our Member Care teams for further improvements. Please contact us again at my.iFIT.com or message us on social media so we can assist you. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: The exercises are great. However even though I am given an option to sync my data with Google Fit, it doesn't actually work. Google blocks the iFit app due to security concerns. Research indicates that is because Google doesn't trust the app and the end user can't do anything about - it has to be fixed by the iFit vendor. I have the latest version available for my Android phone.

Recorded workouts are generally good. Majority of the trainers of charismatic and motivating. Production quality is top notch. The app has some issues though. At least for me, the app will disconnect from the machine, the internet, or will just randomly crash during the middle of the workout. When this happens you have to restart the workout video and there is no option to fast-forward so you are forced to sit through the video again or to end your workout early.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Mollie We are glad that you enjoy our workouts and trainers, but we are sorry that you have experienced disconnects from your machine and internet connection. Our developers have seen your review and will be working to fix this as soon as possible. You are welcome to contact us at (833) 680-4348 if you need further assistance. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: 1. If a workout gets interrupted you have to start all over, no way to fast forward or resume. 2. Cannot easily see my challenges in the app or treadmill. I want the challenges I join to be first thing I see. 3. Cannot easily view the whole series in a challenge. It took almost 15 mins to figure out what the next workout is supposed to be. Positives: Great trainers with uplifting messages. I like the new AI coach adjustments. It is taking some getting used to but so far is going well.

I love ifit and the trainers. However. This week the app has been super glitchy and it crashed 15 minutes into a 30 minute workout that is part of a series. There is no way for me to fast forward and im on a schedule today. So repeating the beginning is not an option. Its very frustrating that you cannot skip ahead to the portion of the workout that you need. I understand they prevent that so you get the full experience, but then dont have a faulty app that requires it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Rachel, We appreciate your love for the trainers and your dedication to your workouts! It‚Äôs disappointing to hear about the app glitches during your workout. Please reach out to our team at my.iFIT.com and we would be happy to help you. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: I love the instructors and workouts; however, recently I have had issues with the App loading and locking up mid workout or at the end, and I either have to force stop or reinstall the app to get it working. Nothing on my end has changed; so, I'm not sure what the issue is. It's frustrating to say the least, especially since I originally gave the app 5 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Kirk Bruno Thanks for the input. We're sorry to hear about these app issues, and hope you take it to our support team at my.iFIT.com, they can help find a solution. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: Cool when it works, which is rare. It doesn't count all your miles, so don't use it to keep track. It also randomly kicks you out of your account and asks you to sign in again during a run. And the phone app and machines do not communicate well. Also, the trainer suggests workouts that are no longer in the library. It's a subpar app, which is sad. They sell it based off the promise of what it could be, but it feels like using a beta version of an app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Ileana Rose, We appreciate your detailed feedback about the app's performance issues, including the tracking and sign-in problems. Please reach out to us at my.iFIT.com and we would be happy to help you. Your insights are important to us, and we‚Äôre committed to improving. Thanks - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: App crashes frequently and most likely than not it will not open on the first try. Very difficult to search for activities with poor and complicated mixed results. Some recent updates now tie the app to the equipment. So if you are trying to do a workout, you need to have your phone with you. This is an annoyance since iFit nor Norditrack own the equipment. Lack of compatibility with standard Bluetooth devices. Definitely not the app and equipment combination I would choose.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Guillermo Bournigal, We appreciate your detailed feedback about the app crashing and the challenges with searching for activities. Please reach out to our team at my.iFIT.com so we can assist you. Your insights on equipment compatibility are important to us, and we value your perspective. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: I used to have more music selections, it was already limited to what they had for radio selections thru Spotify. At least (even though I could never select my own favorite music) I at least had a lot of options for genres, now I only see two options and both were putting me to sleep. I would love to give a higher rating for being able to play my own Spotify music selections.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Kelly Holderfield, We appreciate your feedback and are sorry to hear about your experience. Our developers are working to address this issue as soon as possible! Please share more details by contacting us at my.ifit.com so we can help our team work towards improvement. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: Good trainers, poor app. Makes me log in every time. When using a VPN, it will refuse to let me login in despite the right credentials. If I login without vpn but switch it on after, nothing in the app loads. "Up next for you" shows programs I did a year ago, so I need to go through 6 different menus - which often don't load - to get back to the next workout in the series I've been doing for weeks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Matt Alonso, We appreciate your feedback about the login issues and the challenges with the app's loading and workout recommendations. You will want to use iFIT without a VPN for the proper connections needed. For more information about this please reach out to our team at my.iFIT.com. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: The app is glitchy. Crashes peroidically mid workout and needs to restart from the beginning. At least 50% of the time the elevation chart doesn't load or is wrong. Sometimes the speed chart doesn't load either. I feel like the search filters don't work properly, and the price keep going up. I'm paying about 35% more than I paid 2 yr ago.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Joe Z We are sorry that our app isn‚Äôt meeting your full expectations. We appreciate hearing from our users so we can make the necessary improvements. Your review will be passed on to the appropriate teams. We‚Äôll be happy to look into the experience you are having, you can call us at (833) 680-4348 or by email Support@iFIT.com. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: God this app is horrendous. The content is great. But the "error occurred try again" screen is what I get constantly. Gotten to the point where I just write down the name of a workout I want to do because trying to save it anywhere is guaranteed to just give me an error, and then I'll never find it again. The least user friendly/operable app iv ever used that costs money. Edit later: this app has become basically unusable for me. Very glad Im still in the free trial because it crashes my phone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Jesek West Rogers We want to apologize for the experience you have had with our app. We would like to look into the errors you are receiving and work to improve your experience. Please contact us at (833) 680-4348 or visit us online at my.iFIT.com so we can get this taken care of for you. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: The app works well but only with a subscription. I couldn't log my manual workout without it. A couple times I lost service when attempting to save my my manual workout. There was no try again and I couldn't enter it in manually. It was lost which makes it difficult to track progress. Having the option to filter and find workouts by distance, pace, and location would be nice. Otherwise the workouts are great, and the app work well.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback. We will be passing along your comments, as experiences like yours are invaluable in helping us make improvements to the iFIT app. If you have any additional concerns, please reach out to our Customer Support Team directly at (866) 608-1798 or Support@iFIT.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Please add a way to fast forward a video. It will freeze and crash at times - I can deal with that. However, it will do this sometimes 3/4 of the way through a video, and I have to restart it to wait 20+ mins until my stopping point. This has happened a few times, and for a paid subscription, I just can't give more than 3 stars until then. I would have switched apps had it not been connected to our treadmill.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Alyssa Laws Thank you for taking the time to let us know your thoughts regarding our app. We appreciate your feedback regarding fast forwarding in workouts as well as the crashes you have experienced. We understand how crashes can be frustrating. Please call us at (833) 680-4348 so we can address this. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: I had this included with my treadmill purchase. I was not able to utilize this with the treadmill but tried it out via my phone a few times. I ran through the free trial and a few months before trying to get it canceled. This is where my frustration with iFIT lies. I canceled through the we append was billed again. I contacted them via phone and it was just over hour and 30 minute call to cancel with customer service directly. You can also forget about any refund, regardless of the situation.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre so disappointed to hear about this issue and that our team wasn‚Äôt able to assist to the extent you needed. We encourage you to reach out to us again at (833) 680-4348 or Support@iFIT.com so that we can make your situation right.

scraped_reviews.content: Why are you unable to move forward or backward in a workout when using the mobile app? I understand the "leaderboard" aspect when on a machine, but why not enable this feature for mobile use? It would be very useful to be able to go back for an exercise or even fast forward when you don't need the "how to" instruction or need to get through a workout quickly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback. We will be passing along your comments, as experiences like yours are invaluable in helping us make improvements to the iFIT app. If you have any additional concerns, please reach out to our Customer Support Team directly at (833) 680-4348 or Support@iFIT.com.

scraped_reviews.content: It claims the programs will automatically change the resistance on my bike. It does, however the app only goes up to 4 and my bike goes to 16, and I spend most of my time in 9-16. Also, I tried to cancel auto renew only, but instead it cancelled my entire membership. So I can't continue to evaluate the app. But the one work out I did do was pretty cool and had an Olympian telling me what to do so that was rad. I just had to adjust my resistance manually.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback. Hearing about experiences like yours is invaluable in helping us make improvements to the iFIT app. If you have any additional comments or questions, please do not hesitate to reach out to our Customer Support Team directly at (866) 608-1798 or Support@iFIT.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I had to downgrade from a 3 to a 2 star. I feel as though the app is getting better with performance, but it's sooo delicate. I had an alarm go off, lost a workout. Today my wife plugged in my phone charger and the app just shut off, I was able to get it back up and while my bike saved my time, the workout video was 10-15 minutes back from where I was. There are so many small changes that could be made to help this app, like allowing me to scroll the video or making the app more resilient.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: david Kingsley Thanks for your feedback! We understand your frustration with the app‚Äôs performance and the issues you‚Äôve encountered. Your experience is important to us. If you continue to have trouble, please reach out to our support team for further assistance at my.iFIT.com. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: I have issue with the app and the implementation of the UI on the treadmill. I want to be able to easily find workouts that I have done before and have made as favorites but there is no favorites icon anywhere that I can find. In addition the calendar only goes back a couple of weeks. I don't want to constantly try new workouts (I don't have the time to look at them all to see if they are within my capabilities--to avoid injury). Constant logout are also a problem for me on the device.

Suddenly, the app crashes at the end of every workout, and sometimes just at random when I'm browsing. Same issue on both my phone and my iPad. What's the point of using this if I can't complete or log my workouts??? I've been close to being done with iFit, and if this isn't fixed soon, it will be the final straw.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Lauren Reno Thank you for your patience. We apologize for the crashes you're experiencing. We understand how disruptive this is to your workouts. Please reach out to our support team at my.iFIT.com for assistance, as they can help troubleshoot the issue. Your feedback is valuable, and we‚Äôre committed to resolving this for you. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: Awful predatory schemes for an app that barely works. No inter-app connectivity unless you pay. No planned workouts unless you pay. No preprogrammed workouts that you make at all (standard bike courses like hills, mountains, sprints). Cost is astronomical compared to what you're actually getting for the product. Save yourself some money and time by going with a different product.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Alex Palos Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your concerns about the app's functionality and pricing model. Your input is valuable, and we‚Äôll share it with our team. If you need assistance, please reach out to our support team at my.iFIT.com. Thanks! - iFIT

scraped_reviews.content: Needed the app in order to activate equipment. Then I had to subscribe to a pay service. It was a very confusing subscription process. Then my subscription was not accessible when I tried to log in. I later learned I could bypass everything just by holding down the ifit sync button on the bike for 30 seconds. The app and subscription are now worthless. This seems like a scam just to activate an exercise bike.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre so sorry to hear about your negative experience. If we can provide additional support, please contact us at (866) 608-1798 or Support@iFIT.com. Otherwise, please know that we‚Äôve documented your feedback, and we will be routing it to the appropriate team in an effort to make improvements.

scraped_reviews.content: My gym has iFIT bikes, and I was so excited to use them when I first looked at the app and created my account. Now I'm really disappointed and will probably cancel because it's awful to navigate. I've even tried "favoriting" the workout series I want to complete, but I can't find where my favorites are anywhere. Every article I find references a "My List" that's supposed to be on the screen, but it's not there.

The workouts are not terrible, most are pretty entertaining except a few boring ones, but this is the least user-friendly workout app I have ever used. I have been using it for like 3 months now and I cannot navigate it still. It doesn't keep track of where you left off unless you schedule it on your calendar, and I just can't figure out how to find workouts I am looking for. I don't usually.post reviews, but I felt I should warm people that this one is not easy to use!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback. We will be passing along your comments, as experiences like yours are invaluable in helping us make improvements to the iFIT app. If you have any additional concerns, please reach out to our Customer Support Team directly at (833) 680-4348 or Support@iFIT.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Virtually impossible to search for a particular workout. Stretching! So fundamental to any workout routine, they have got to have at least one workout to develop good stretching habits. If it's in there, it can't be found. As with many other workouts, you have to just get lucky to find what you want. Search capabilities virtually nonexistent.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre so sorry to hear about your negative experience. If we can provide additional support, please contact us at (866) 608-1798 or Support@iFIT.com. Otherwise, please know that we‚Äôve documented your feedback, and we will be routing it to the appropriate team in an effort to make improvements.

title: Subway Surfers
description:
DASH as fast as you can! 
DODGE the oncoming trains! 

Help Jake, Tricky & Fresh escape from the grumpy Guard and his dog. 

‚òÖ Grind trains with your cool crew! 
‚òÖ Colorful and vivid HD graphics! 
‚òÖ Hoverboard Surfing! 
‚òÖ Paint powered jetpack! 
‚òÖ Lightning fast swipe acrobatics! 
‚òÖ Challenge and help your friends! 

Join the most daring chase! 

A Universal App with HD optimized graphics.

Originally co-developed by SYBO and Kiloo.

summary: Help Jake, Tricky & Fresh escape from the grumpy Inspector and his dog!

scraped_reviews.content: Re downloaded this game for the first time in like 10 years. Great to see all the elements still operate just the same, it hasn't been over complicated, and it's still just as fun! But I am a little bummed (tho not surprised) that all my previous data is gone. which is a bummer, cuz I'd had nearly everything unlocked that was available at the time.

W Game, I'm genuinely so unemployed for this. However, the only annoying part is if you accidentally click/trigger an ad, it sends you the playstore and ruins your run. This is super frustrating when you're 3.6m into an event run, and then it's all ruined. Maybe a way to save a run during ads would be helpful. Maybe just save runs in general because most people play as leisure.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback! It‚Äôs tough when ads disrupt your run like that. Please contact our support team at reviews@sybogames.com with more details, so we can better understand your experience and work to resolve it. Your input truly helps us!

scraped_reviews.content: The game itself is addictive, fun, & super easy to get into. Maybe a little repetitive, tho. It can take a while to get all the characters, boards, & achievements, but it's worth the time investment. Some of them are paywalled, which can be annoying. The gameplay is fast-paced & addictive. My only complaint is the number of cheaters that pollute this game. Also, Sybo are very slow to fix game issues, which hinders progression. Aside from that, I'd 100% recommend. Great time waster for sure
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Xavrist! Thanks for your detailed feedback! It‚Äôs awesome to hear you love the game's addictive nature and fast-paced gameplay. We hear your concerns about game balance and cheaters, and we‚Äôre on it! For any specific issues, feel free to reach out to our support team at reviews@sybogames.com. Your input is invaluable!

scraped_reviews.content: Actually, found this game on Google play and i like it so much and the rewards do not have a limit. Even though power-ups genuinely mean a lot. I'm having fun with this game and i beat NPCs and players locally. Consequently, If i lose in the game there are ads that will appear in runs and rewards need ads to receive. And next, i also want a frame limiter of 30 fps to 120 fps and a graphics settings on the game that you can adjust. Well it does not crash or drop fps if i am playing it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey USERgame! It's awesome to hear you're loving the game and the endless rewards! Your enjoyment of local competition and smooth gameplay is exactly what we strive for. If you have any feedback or suggestions, feel free to reach out to us at reviews@sybogames.com. Thanks for sharing!

scraped_reviews.content: I feel like its the perfect offline game for car rides. Its not the type of game a play at home if thats what your looking for. The game is great, just I feel like the home screen is so confusing because of the amount of buttons. like, i feel there should be a bundles section in the store instead of on the home screen. I also feel like im struggling to keep up with the constant rotating of events too. Over all, great game. definitly would recommend as a good offline game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your kind words! We're glad to hear the game makes your car rides more enjoyable. We appreciate your feedback on the home screen layout and event rotation. If you have more details to share, please reach out to our support team through the in-game Help section (Settings ‚Üí Support). Happy gaming!

scraped_reviews.content: Ads now cause the game to crash. I've been playing this game for years and always enjoy it. Suddenly there are ads, some Lego car racing that takes over the game, makes it impossible to quit the ad and continue. In the middle of a run you get this ad and have to close the game to continue. All these Lego ads have issues. There is another if you accidentally click on it trying to close the X, it'll take you immediately to a website and then the game crashes. All run progress is lost. Sucks now!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Ro Remz! Thanks for sharing your experience with the ads. It‚Äôs tough to hear they‚Äôre causing crashes and disrupting your gameplay. We really appreciate your long-time support! If you could share more details, please reach out to our support team at reviews@sybogames.com. Your feedback means a lot to us!

scraped_reviews.content: A classic chasing game where you can choose from many different subway runners in a 3 lane subway track. There is a new season with new opportunities of collaborations and new skins to play with every month, and there are events to keep you busy, and leaderboards! It's also possible to play without WiFi! You can still enjoy playing it, just without the online leaderboards, and ads don't work. But overall it is almost fully operational without WiFi. I really like this game, and suggest it to you.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your kind words, Noah Caceres! We truly appreciate your support. If you have any suggestions or detailed feedback, feel free to share it with us at reviews@sybogames.com. Your insights are valuable as we strive to make your experience even better!

scraped_reviews.content: Hello, I've been an avid player and lover of subway surfers for over a decade, I started playing on my ipod touch at the age of 7 and I am 19 now. However, I have been disappointed at some newer changes to the game. My biggest complaint right now would be the change to the characters, and how each skin is now separate. It makes the menu really cluttered and also seems like a grab for more money from players. One of my favorite things is collecting characters, but now it is way harder to do. -Lia
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It's awesome to know you've been with us for so many years, and we truly appreciate your loyalty! Your thoughts on the character changes and menu feel are super valuable, and we‚Äôd love to hear more about your experience. Please reach out to our support team at reviews@sybogames.com. Thank you for sharing!

scraped_reviews.content: The game has always been fun, but I'm not rating it 5 stars because there's a problem. every time the state farm ads play when I'm trying to get more rewards, I can't close the ad to claim my rewards. the game just freezes and I lose all of my progress. I've even tried reporting the ad, but they keep showing it anyways. please fix this because I don't want to keep having to use my keys to replay the challenges.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback and are happy to hear you enjoy the game! Thank you for bringing the ad issue to our attention; it‚Äôs important to us. Your input is valuable, and we invite you to reach out to our support team at reviews@sybogames.com for further assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this game. Thank you for fixing the ad. I do have a couple of suggestions, it would be nice to be able to buy power ups 10, 20, 50 at a time. It would also be great if we could directly give our friends coins. power ups & keys. it would be nice to help them keep running when they are out of these items. I highly recommend this game, it's my go too game for relaxing & keeping my mind sharp.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your wonderful feedback and are glad you enjoy the game! Your suggestions are invaluable in enhancing the experience. If you have any specific thoughts or ideas, feel free to share them! Happy gaming and relaxation!

scraped_reviews.content: This game is a bit middle of the road. I think it has some fun gamemodes, could be entertaining for children younger than me, and the constant change of scenery and new characters and boards is also fun. But the game is also very repetitive, doesn't get very fast, requires huge amounts of time to unlock rewards, and is filled with ads. So I personally wouldn't recommend it, but it's not all bad if you enjoy this game type. It is mostly preference based.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We're glad you enjoy the variety of characters and scenery. We recognize the game can feel repetitive and that ads may disrupt your experience. Your insights matter, and we hope you continue to enjoy what you love! If you have more to share, please reach out to our support team at reviews@sybogames.com.

scraped_reviews.content: this is a great game, honestly. I love how you can get some bundles by watching ads, as a person who doesn't like in-app purchases. the graphics are great. the outfits and character ideas are unbelievable! I would definitely recommend this to anyone! also the hoverboard ideas. outstanding! this is a great way to pass time and I love it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much, Christina Wood! We appreciate your kind words and are delighted you enjoy the bundles and graphics! Your recommendation means a lot to us! If you have any feedback or ideas, feel free to reach out anytime.

scraped_reviews.content: Amazing game! I mean not even just the game, but the whole team and producers are so nice. I came with a problem to them, which they fixed in only a few days! And the game itself is addictive, I love just sitting down and playing it for hours or just using it to make time go faster. From all the different events to the game play, it is very difficult to get bored. And even if you are gone for a while it's easy to get back into. I recommend this game highly!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your kind words, Cassandra B√∏yum! We really value your support and would love to hear any detailed feedback you have to help us improve even further. If you encounter any issues, feel free to reach out to our support team at reviews@sybogames.com. Your input truly matters!

scraped_reviews.content: Amazing graphics and extra features. Pestered constantly to spend real money. Game is great, the graphics are impressive but the options are confusing. When I downloaded it again I found that Restore Purchases doesn't show that I paid for No Ads!!! EDIT.... title: Secure Camera
description: This is a modern camera app focused on privacy and security. It includes modes for capturing images, videos and QR / barcode scanning along with additional modes based on CameraX vendor extensions (Portrait, HDR, Night, Face Retouch and Auto) on devices where they're available. Modes are displayed as tabs at the bottom of the screen. You can switch between modes using the tab interface or by swiping left/right anywhere on the screen. The arrow button at the top opens the settings panel and you can close it by pressing anywhere outside the settings panel. You can also swipe down to open the settings and swipe up to close it. Outside of the QR scanning mode, there's a row of large buttons above the tab bar for switching between the cameras (left), capturing images and starting/stopping video recording (middle) and opening the gallery (right). The volume keys can also be used as an equivalent to pressing the capture button. While recording a video, the gallery button becomes an image capture button for capturing images. The app has an in-app gallery and video player for images/videos taken with it. It currently opens an external editor activity for the edit action. Zooming via pinch to zoom or the zoom slider will automatically make use of the wide angle and telephoto cameras on Pixels and other devices supporting it. It will become more broadly supported over time. By default, continuous auto focus, auto exposure and auto white balance are used across the whole scene. Tapping to focus will switch to auto focus, auto exposure and auto white balance based on that location. The focus timeout setting determines the timeout before it switches back the default mode. The exposure compensation slider on the left allows manually tuning exposure and will automatically adjust shutter speed, aperture and ISO. Further configuration / tuning will be provided in the future. The QR scanning mode only scans within the scanning square marked on the screen. The QR code should be aligned with the edges of the square but can have any 90 degree orientation. Non-standard inverted QR codes are fully supported. It's a very quick and high quality QR scanner able to easily scan very high density QR codes from Pixels. Every 2 seconds, it will refresh auto focus, auto exposure and auto white balance on the scanning square. It has full support for zooming in and out. The torch can be toggled with the button at the bottom center. The auto toggle at the bottom left can be used to toggle scanning for all supported barcode types. Alternatively, you can select which barcode types it should scan via the menu at the top. It only scans QR codes by default since that provides quick and reliable scanning. Most other types of barcodes can result in false positives. Each enabled type will slow down the scanning and will make it more prone to false positives especially with difficult to scan barcodes such as a dense QR code. Camera permission is the only one that's required. Images and videos are stored via the Media Store API so media/storage permissions aren't required. The Microphone permission is needed for video recording by default but not when including audio is disabled. Location permission is only needed if you explicitly enabling location tagging, which is an experimental feature. By default, EXIF metadata is stripped for captured images and only includes the orientation. Stripping metadata for videos is planned but not supported yet. Orientation metadata isn't stripped since it's fully visible from how the image is displayed so it doesn't count as hidden metadata and is needed for proper display. You can toggle off stripping EXIF metadata in the More Settings menu opened from the settings dialog. Disabling metadata stripping will leave timestamp, phone model, exposure configuration and other metadata. Location tagging is disabled by default and won't be stripped if you enable it.

scraped_reviews.content: It dawned on me that I should be using a third party camera app so I can finally take pictures without blurry text. Samsung's camera app is horrendous and will blur text around the sides of the image after the post processing gets applied. I searched for third party ones and saw GrapheneOS in the list, which pleasantly surprised me. It takes proper photos without the annoying extras. Thank you for making the world a better place.

Gotta be honest, I don't see the privacy aspect of this app or what it's supposed to be doing, but all things considered, I don't care much because ever since my phone's stock camera app became unusable, all I wanted was a simple and straightforward alternative and this is the closest thing I have found. Though I have a single complaint. Photos taken isn't very sharp and sometimes blurry. Looking through the camera on the app, image looks crisp. It's only when the photo is taken it got "soft"
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It supports a bunch of privacy-focused features such as recording videos without audio, muting audio while recording a video, EXIF metadata stripping for photos, choosing photo location via the system file picker and many security-focused design choices. The blurriness you're reporting sounds like a bug in your device's Camera2 implementation.

scraped_reviews.content: A useful alternative to the original camera which produces bad pictures due to AI processing (smearing of fine detail). Secure Camera gives sharper results, however the pictures are sometimes slightly on the dark side compared to the built in camera app.
great, I love such simple apps which simply just work. just a suggestion, Can you make a photo gallery app . i am so fed up with other apps asking for login each time.

I just wanted to say thank you for this amazing app. Whoever designed it knows a lot about scenery and how to capture colors without compromising. This is really a simple and clean camera. Perfect experience.
I'm using a Pixel 9 Pro XL. When I download the app, it keeps on saying, app crashed and I'm unable to find it in my app folder. Help.
my goal is minimum amount of unreasonable permissions, and this delivers...i compared the picture quality to other applications and this gets you very good quality
wow so much better than the Samsung camera app. the image processing is good, really happy with this app. hope it stays this way or better. thanks
User interface is very nice. Very easy to use and Clear photo quality.
Nice and simple, and works with the power button double click shortcut. Thanks!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Good start. UI elements hidden in tiny drop down bar in corner. Text menu shows Video, Camera, Night, QR. Why not an easier independent Camera/Video toggle button? I like the idea of a safe Google camera replacement, but at least somewhat copy the quality of life elements that Google's camera has, since afterall, this app is meant on replacing it. Additionally, pixels users can't replace the double-tapping of the Power button as a shortcut. This app should override that option and include itself
I love it, Wait for focus lock should be on by default.

A solid camera app. Fast autofocus, reliable autoexposure. (My default camera app takes ages to focus.) The settings and adjustments are intuitive and easy to find, and cover all the basics of still camera and video. There is an option to remove EXIF info should one need it. No problem saving the files. No-frills and intelligently-designed. Ad-free as well.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks, consider spreading the word about it to other people!

scraped_reviews.content: Simple, quick and easy to use. Video still sometimes lags when recording after two or three videos have been shot but stopping and restarting the app helps.

I think this is the best alternative for the default cam of every android with AI feature on its camera. Though one problem that I encounter is that the 'Save image as previewed" doesn't work on the front camera on my phone. Cause whenever I check the captured photo on my default gallery, It's mirrored. I wish you could fix this. thanks üëçüèº

Works fine but a little buggy. I will take photos sometimes and the app crashes leaving me with half a photo and the other half blacked out. Not the biggest issue when compared to file size. File size can vary between 300kb amd 13mb. I've tried adjusting the image quality to reduce the file size but hasn't achieved anything. If there is a way to reduce the file size that would be amazing otherwise I'm going to have to look elsewhere. No there are no updates for my device it is fully up to date
scraped_reviews.replyContent: These sound like issues with the device's Camera2 implementation. Is there an OS update available for your device?

scraped_reviews.content: I really like where this app is going, it has great potential! Old comment: One important improvement point for me would be to support the telephoto camera on my Galaxy S22+ - 3x photos seem to be using digital zoom instead, judging by the quality of the photo. One nit-pick: the zoom slider is not linear, it goes smoothly from 1x to 3x, but then from 3x to 10x the transition is quite abrupt. Update: OK, it seems like if I zoom in a bit more, until 3.1x, it switches, so there's a small UI bug
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Our app supports ultrawide and telephoto on devices with support for Camera2 multi-camera. We do use linear zoom which means displayed zoom level increases faster as you zoom in more: 1x to 2x is much more zooming than 5x to 6x. Samsung's app may display slightly scaled zoom integer instead of low-level zoom level so it'd slightly mismatch ours.

scraped_reviews.content: Not as fancy as stock yet, but it still takes a good picture, and QR scanning is a great convenience. Being able to adjust quality so thoroughly is highly appreciated, file sizes can get absurd and stock doesn't go low enough. If you want a libre camera app, it's either this or Open Camera, and I'm using this. Edit: Reworded a little, was unclear about my appreciation of quality adjusting
scraped_reviews.replyContent: You already have control over the JPEG quality in More Settings and can change it to match the quality used by Google Camera or other apps if you want to have smaller file sizes rather than higher quality. Default quality for Latency mode is 95% and it's 100% for Quality mode which is currently the default. We may raise it to 100% for both modes.

scraped_reviews.content: This is a great camera app. Ease of use and navigating the controls sre a snap. I haven't tried all the options available yet. So far, so smooth. I use 720p for my video shots as quick to upload and share. I found it is best for the counter to hit 1 second before narrating your video whatever. Can wait longer as in-app edits are easy to crop the length or use that footage as intro to put your type in. Same as outro for credits. Thanks Graphene developers, excellent. Photos are crystal.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: This is the first open source camera with truly great image quality and user interface. The only missing feature I would consider basic is 60fps for 1080p video (at least on my Pixel 4a). Most people don't realise the amount of private info stored in their photos, and this app gives that control and safety back to the individual. Highly recommended.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Control over frame rate is planned but it isn't supported by CameraX yet and we can't use Camera2Interop to implement it like we did with EIS support for video. CameraX is being very actively improved and it's likely we'll be able to add this within the next 6 months.

CameraX vendor extension modes will also become much more broadly available.

scraped_reviews.content: Works perfectly on Samsung Galaxy Z Fold3. Best used when unfolded if you use a folding phone as the viewfinder then fills the entire screen. Supports features like HDR, night mode, and portrait mode but doesn't ask for excess permissions or leave metadata. Only issue is photos are a few MB more than stock camera. Unsure why but no big deal. Still highly recommend.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks! You can decrease the size of photos by lowering the JPEG quality. The stock app likely uses a significantly lower quality by default and it's not easily perceptible.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is unable to take photos, if you zoom into the object it crashes. Unable to take photos most of the time. Will usually allow for photo taking if I don't zoom in. Defeats the purpose of having this phone. The issue happens when I zoom in, the screen freezes and the app is unresponsive. I would love help with fixing this issue if possible
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please try version 63 which is now available as a stable release via the Play Store. We haven't seen other issues with problems on the Pixel 7 Pro. It would be a good idea to clear the app data, make sure you have no accessibility services enabled which may be interfering, etc.

scraped_reviews.content: just a black screen can't take any pictures like that

I haven't found the manual focus feature but it's still cool. I can choose the video resolution, pause while recording a video, control the exposure manually. Yes, simple requirements but I've been searching for an app for 35 minutes on Google Play. P.S. Also, I recommend the Open Camera app.

This app has 3 permissions in the additional permissions section (which are initially hidden for nefarious/spying reasons); my default app had 14. These 14 included 'have full network access' which allowed my previous camera app to spy on me and send data wherever it's going. I have some confidence this GrapheneOS Camera app is not malicious, based on this. I don't know if disabling the default app actually did what it said it did, since it could be lying, but this is better than nothing.

my built in phone camera does a lot of weird AI stuff that I don't want like skin smoothing and I can't really turn it off so this app worked great for me. doesn't do any weird background stuff that I don't want, has the standard tools I need, and doesn't have any annoying ads!! props to the developer this is a great clean app. I'm very pleased with how my pictures come out on this. EDIT: I changed it to 5 stars lol. the only reason I didn't at first is bc I haven't used it for very long :)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: There are many improvements planned but most depends on Android's CameraX library improving. Many features are already available but require device support such as zoom-based multi-camera, HDR, Night, Portrait, etc. It has full feature set on latest Samsung flagships. Even Pixels need to catch up.

scraped_reviews.content: Superior quality! Brilliant colors! Let's you shoot like a pro with a range of advanced features! Very easy to use! Privacy and security focused. Frequently updated and best of all, it's free. Kind of a makes this a no brainer, a must-install and best camera app for Android!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Perfect as a small app for taking small photos. The default camera on my phone doesn't have any option to reduce image quality, so can only take giant photos, useless for receipts or email attachments. This solves that problem.

Great, simple. Only things I'm missing is the ability to set video framerate and set any app as the "gallery" app to open, but the latter is something that I haven't seen offered in any other Android camera app, so I guess there are some technical limitations to it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Video frame rate configuration is in the process of being implemented. A lot of work on the app is going to start in February. An external gallery can't be properly integrated so we dropped trying to do it. You're currently on a fairly outdated release according to the Play Store review info (68). Version 75 is stable and 76 is in beta right now.

scraped_reviews.content: Solid open source camera that's almost perfect. I knocked off one star for now because it doesn't support the wide angle front camera on the Pixel 3, and it doesn't have panorama mode, so I can't get rid of GCam just yet. Would also be nice to have slow motion and motion photo. Will update review as more features are added.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Pixel 3 lacks Camera2 multi-camera with virtual zoom like Pixel 4+. We support it elsewhere. Pixel 3 is EOL since Oct 2021. CameraX has rejected hard-wired per-device workarounds for it. Panorama is not planned unless CameraX adds extension. Slow motion is planned but requires CameraX support. Motion photo would very likely need CameraX support.

scraped_reviews.content: my mototola normal camera last update was in 2023 outdated and it started to crash and not work with this app it doesn't crash the app and the picture looks better

It's the great camera app for its storage! The only problem is just it is unable to record short videos (20s-10s less), "Recording too short to be saved" even though i permitted all its permissions needed. I hope this be fixed. Overall, this is one of the best camera i've installed so far!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: You should be able to record short videos. This is likely an issue with the device's Camera2 implementation.

scraped_reviews.content: Save image as previewed Save output image as visible on preview (fixes inversion in front camera) not working please fix

Nice Fast and Easy to Handle Camera with not much complicated settings and works in a straight forward manner, but there should be some provision to select the image resolution instead of quality of jpg in the settings and there is a serious issue with the selfie video shoot mode, it captures a very dark selfie video where it is merely impossible to see who is in the video, stock camera of my realme narzo Android 11 does it like a charm but I can't select custom resolution.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Support for using other resolutions is planned. The issue you're having with the front camera is likely an issue with your device's support for Camera2. Realme is likely doing post-processing of the front camera pictures in a way that's not available for other apps or there's an issue with their EIS support. Try turning off EIS if it's available.

scraped_reviews.content: An amazing open source camera app from GrapheneOS. It works perfectly compared to my normal camera app and has an amazing array of scanning features built in. I love the way it's laid out with pictures to show you what each code looks like. Genuinely the best open source camera app I know about.

Unfortunately the Video mode is not reliable. I thought I was filming my niece today but the 500+mb MP4 is not playable by the phone or QuickTime/VLC. The camera has error messages about the storage not existing (SD card) but it's there with plenty of space. There are no useful error messages. The video works again after clearing app storage but the incorrect error still appears. The response from the developer is not good or useful customer service.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Video mode in the app is reliable. It works well for a huge number of users with reported issues mainly having to do with devices with a broken EIS implementation due to us enabling it by default when the device says it has a working implementation. Your device seems to have issues with Camera2 APIs or storage APIs. It's the first report like this.

scraped_reviews.content: Been a fanboy of GrapheneOS since long and love this concept of getting that camera app on my other devices via playstore as well. Overall it's the great app, but sometimes I like to have manual controls in videos and Photos allowed via Camera2api, so if something like that can be added in future it would be the only camera app on my devices.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We plan to add more camera control features. We've just had higher priorities than the Camera app for a while and it has been neglected recently. We're trying to find a developer to work on it and our other standalone apps full time.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this application and I appreciate developer for made this type camera app thanks üëç
The best camera app but the first seconds on recording is laggy if you fix this it will be great
easy to use very nice

Thank goodness I'm not depending on this camera. It refused to open unless I updated it. I haven't authorised an update but since I've come to the playstore it has started working again. This is really no use, no matter how good or otherwise the camera turns out to be. I am satisfied with the few pictures I have taken so far.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: That's a Play Store notification rather than something from our app. It was used to help people who were on an older version with a bug. It's possible to say no and continue using the app. Can you reconsider leaving a 1 star review for this? You seem to like the app.

scraped_reviews.content: Although I never installed the app, and the clones user on my phone did, I have no right to give one star, however you get 5 because you cared about the integrity of your work and responded. Thank you

Very good app and much mUch more responsive/faster than my stock camera app, 60fps on video would be great. maybe more custom controls (like using volume buttons as zoom?). I love the privacy focus this app has. wished we had more apps like these! my old galaxy note9 is showing its age but this app is definitely helping by a large margin

Private and secure camera app which doesn't track me. Doesn't even have network permissions. Privacy is very important to me, and it's also nice to use with several nice features. It seems actively developed and new camera features keep being added.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks! Our pace of development for the app will be much faster with a lot more photography and privacy features being added this year than the slow pace of improvement last year. We have a developer actively working on it.

scraped_reviews.content: I need a camera app since I'm using custom ROM which don't have camera app built in. People recommended OpenCamera which are much more feature rich but often I'll just need a quick snap without tinkering exposure and such. And this camera is the closest thing to a simple default camera app in a phone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: decided to get an alternative camera app since the one that came with the phone flipped the selfie preview (text flipped, but not in the taken photo) and I did not like that. tried this and Fossify Camera (F-droid), and this one is better. BUT THE SELFIE PREVIEW IS STILL FLIPPED, WITH NO OPTION TO STOP THAT! really a 4.5‚≠êrating

This camera app has a lot going for it. Commendably small footprint at this time, plus location off by default & option to remove most Exif metadata is really good. In truth, I can't see any difference in quality in decent light between images recorded with this app and the installed Google Pixel camera app on my 5. That is a compliment to the Devs of this app in itself. I await further improvements for more challenging optical situations with expectation. Thanks & well done, GrapheneOS Devs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Is there anything specific you want to see for it to be worth a 5 star rating? Pixels have fallen behind on shipping CameraX vendor extensions. On most recent Samsung devices, we already have modes for HDR, Night, Portrait, etc. Pixel 6 is in the process of having the CameraX Night extension implemented. It will appear in our app once it's there.

scraped_reviews.content: Trustworthy & ad-free beautiful app. Sometimes we need to record date, time & location (eg recording pollution, garbage, crime, etc). Though these things are there but it'd be better if i could put them as watermark along with exif.

Does just what I need. Optimizing for latency works great, whereas my stock camera app would still be trying to focus, and I appreciate being able to lower the video quality to 480p to make videos smaller to send in messages.

4 star. Yes, my bad there is no ad in the app. I was looking to record timelapse in 480p. Great camera app. Still features like the default is missing but it's really good app. Yes, my bad. There is no ad in this app. My apologize. Camera app with ad is ios16 or something. Extremely sorry. Regards Ro7an
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We plan to add many features over the next few years including frame rate control and alternate video recording formats. Most of these features depend on improvements to the new Android CameraX API which we use instead of the traditional Camera2 API. Time lapse is a possible future feature but not something that's possible with CameraX right now.

title: Hexa Sort
description:
Hexa Sort offers a delightful mix of tile stacking, tile sorting, tile puzzle challenges, strategic matching, and satisfying tile merging experience. Perfect for fans of tile games and brain puzzles, Hexa Sort Challenges your mind with stimulating brainteaser games that involve clever puzzle solving and logical maneuvers, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a mental workout. 
 
Hexa Sort introduces a unique twist to the classic sorting puzzle concept, inviting players to explore the art of shuffling, connecting, matching and organizing hexagon tile stacks. With the goal of achieving color matches, players can dive into the excitement of challenging puzzles and enjoy the calming effects of tile stacking brainteasers for adults. Each level presents challenges to meet collection goals, providing a perfect balance of excitement and stress relief for those who prefer relaxing casual games. 
 
RELAX & UNWIND
- Enjoy a soothing, visually stunning color palette with calming gradients that create a serene, zen-like atmosphere
- Immerse yourself in a world of color puzzles, sorting challenges, and block stacking ‚Äî designed as a relaxing escape and a form of free therapy
- Appreciate the clean, minimalistic design that keeps the focus on satisfying gameplay
- Explore fully-rendered 3D graphics that let you view and interact with the puzzle board from every angle
- Experience the joy of stacking, matching, and merging tiles in a uniquely immersive and satisfying way

 
DISCOVER THE ULTIMATE RELAXING PUZZLE GAME
- Enjoy a captivating and free puzzle game that combines brain teasers, tile puzzles, and colorful challenges
- Stimulate your mind with creative tasks that require sorting, stacking, and merging hexagon tiles
- Experience a game that's both addictive and calming, striking the perfect balance between challenge and relaxation
- Progress through engaging levels designed to test and improve your puzzle-solving skills
- Perfect for players seeking a fun and soothing way to unwind while keeping their minds sharp

 
KEEP YOUR MIND SHARP
- Unlock new levels designed to keep your brain sharp and engaged
- Enjoy a relaxing and therapeutic color-matching puzzle experience
- Perfect for fans of color fill 3D games and hexagon tile challenges
- Invite friends to join the fun and compete for the highest scores
- Share the excitement of completing vibrant and satisfying puzzles
- Master the art of color matching by skillfully sorting and organizing tiles in Hexa Sort


 
FEATURES: 
- Easy-to-play & relaxing gameplay 
- Tons of challenging color match puzzles and brain teasers for adults and children 
- Smooth 3D gameplay graphics 
- Vibrant colors & gradients 
- Power-ups & boosters to help solve puzzles 
- Satisfying ASMR gameplay sound effects 
 
Embark on a captivating journey of color matching, tile sorting, block stacking and tile merging with Hexa Sort. Whether you're a fan of block games, crave stress relief, or enjoy colorful brain teasers, this game promises a harmonious fusion of entertainment and mental stimulation. Sort, match, stack and merge your way to victory in this exciting and challenging puzzle adventure! 
 
Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game! 
 
From the Studio that brought you Wordle!, Match 3D, Happy Glass, Cake Sort Puzzle 3D and many, many more! 
 
Follow us to get news and updates on our other Award Winning titles; 
https://lionstudios.cc/ 
Facebook.com/LionStudios.cc 
Instagram.com/LionStudioscc 
Twitter.com/LionStudiosCC 
Youtube.com/c/LionStudiosCC
